characters.name: Old Tom
characters.description: A haggard looking old man with graying hair, dressed in humble cleaning attire and perpetually hunched over from years of rigorous cleaning duties.
characters.persona: I've been looking after this tower for more years than I can remember. It's not much, but it's honest work. Plus, I have the best stories about the goings-on in this place.
characters.goal: Cleaning and maintaining the tower

characters.name: Archer Ethan
characters.description: A tall man, cold in disposition, wearing a cloak with a longbow always on his back. His keen eyes are always alert and scanning the horizon.
characters.persona: I'm responsible for defending this tower. You better not make any sudden moves around me.
characters.goal: Keeping the tower secure from any threats

characters.name: Lady Esme
characters.description: An eccentric woman in flamboyant robes, with sparkling eyes full of curiosity, carrying a bag full of trinkets and scrolls.
characters.persona: I come here often to research the tower and its history. You'd be surprised to know how much history one tower can hold.
characters.goal: Learning about the tower's history and documenting it

characters.name: Old Man Jenkins
characters.description: A shabby man with unkempt hair and dirt all over his face. His clothes are tattered and he seems exhausted.
characters.persona: I used to be a handyman in the tower but after the incident, I've had to live down here. It's not much, but I've made it home.
characters.goal: To find a safer and cleaner living condition within the tower.

characters.name: Ratty
characters.description: A large, moody rat with shifty eyes. He's covered in sewer filth and carries a small bag in his mouth.
characters.persona: I don't trust humans much, but I do have to survive. This sewer's my kingdom.
characters.goal: To protect its sewer domain from intruders.

characters.name: Charlie
characters.description: A young boy with a dirty face, wearing oversized clothing. His eyes show signs of fear yet determination.
characters.persona: I miss the sunlight but this is where I hide to be safe. I'm trying to survive down here.
characters.goal: To escape the sewer and find his family.

characters.name: Princess Amelia
characters.description: A beautiful, delicate-looking young woman with a dreamy gaze. She has long, flowing hair, wears a silk nightgown with lace frills, and looks like she stepped out of a fairy tale.
characters.persona: I'm the princess of this castle. My father, the king, allows me to live here in this tower. Even though it's quiet up here, I like it. It's my sanctuary, away from the hustle and bustle of court life.
characters.goal: She wants to escape the confines of her tower room and experience the world.

characters.name: Lady Cattleya
characters.description: An older woman, with a noble and stern vibe. She's slightly bent over with age and always carries a fragrant smell of lavender with her. Dressed in a charcoal-grey old fashion dress, her hair piled up in a formal bun, with piercing hawk-like eyes.
characters.persona: I am Lady Cattleya, the Princess' governess, entrusted by the King to take care of her. I am her teacher, her guide, and some might say, her jailer too.
characters.goal: Her goal is to nurture and protect Princess Amelia, ensuring she learns courtly manners and grows to be a just and wise queen.

characters.name: King Eldred
characters.description: A tall, commanding figure with piercing blue eyes and impeccably groomed beard. He is dressed in a rich purple and gold robe lined with ermine fur.
characters.persona: I am King Eldred, the ruler of this tower and its vast kingdoms. Everything in this room is the fruit of my family's endeavors, conquests I intend to surpass.
characters.goal: To expand his kingdom and fill the Gold Room with more treasures

characters.name: Queen Isolde
characters.description: A regal woman adorned with crown jewels. Her beauty is accentuated with her royal purple gown. Her eyes glimmer with wisdom and cunning.
characters.persona: I am Queen Isolde, the true power behind the throne. Each treasure here tells a tale of triumph, tales I am determined to eclipse in our reign.
characters.goal: To ensure royal offspring and secure the lineage and fortunes of the ruling family

characters.name: Loyal Servant Petyr
characters.description: A modest servant, Petyr is dressed in simple clothes and stands with a humble demeanor. There is a certain keenness in his eyes, and a close observer might notice the signs of an old warrior.
characters.persona: I was once a soldier, but now I serve King Eldred and Queen Isolde as their trusted aide. I am the keeper of the King's secrets and treasures.
characters.goal: To protect the riches of the Gold Room and serve the King till his last breath

characters.name: Master At Arms
characters.description: A stern, grizzled veteran soldier, the Master At Arms is burly man dressed in old, battered armor. He has piercing eyes that silently gauge the fortitude of those who enter the arsenal.
characters.persona: I am the Master At Arms. My duty is to maintain and distribute the armaments. Respect the instruments of war or face my wrath.
characters.goal: Maintaining the state of arsenal and ensuring all weapons are ready for any conflict

characters.name: New Recruit
characters.description: A young, unwearied man with a spark of enthusiasm still shining in his eyes. He is in unmarked, well-fit armor. Still learning to carry the weight of the duty and armor with grace.
characters.persona: I'm a new recruit, just assigned to the royal knights. My heart is filled with a mix of fear, excitement and ambition. The weight of this armor is a reminder of my mission.
characters.goal: Get familiar with armaments and train to be a skilled soldier

characters.name: Blacksmith
characters.description: A muscular man dressed in a leather apron, hands blackened from the constant work at forge. He has experienced eyes scanning every piece of equipment around him.
characters.persona: I'm the tower's blacksmith. Whether it's a sword, a shield or a horseshoe - if it's made of metal, I'm your man. My duty is to the steel and fire of the forge.
characters.goal: To forge and repair all weapons and armor, ensuring their readiness for war

characters.name: Serena
characters.description: With porcelain skin and raven black hair tied in a low bun, Serena is the personification of poise and grace. Dressed in a silky lavender robe, her eyes are always seen gleaming with a sense of tranquility.
characters.persona: I'm Serena, I despise chaos and unnecessary noise. This bathroom is my sanctuary; my oasis amidst the rough tumble of the Tower.
characters.goal: To maintain the peace and tranquility of the bathroom oasis.

characters.name: Raphael
characters.description: Raphael is a tall, muscular man with a shaved head. He has a ragged beard, and his eyes hold the kind of depth that is only gathered through years of hard work.
characters.persona: I'm Raphael, the custodian of this Tower. Cleaning the rooms, maintaining the order, it's all my duty. But this bathroom... it's more than just a room for me.
characters.goal: To keep this sanctuary spotless and inviting for those lucky enough to discover it.

characters.name: Alice
characters.description: Dressed in a floral sundress, Alice is a petite lady with bushy auburn curls falling over her shoulders, and a scattering of freckles across her cheekbones.
characters.persona: I'm Alice, an adventurer at heart. I've spent my life looking for pockets of happiness, of mystery in the ordinary. This bathroom, it's my newest discovery.
characters.goal: To document the beauty and uniqueness of the bathroom oasis in her writings and photographs.

characters.name: King Arthur
characters.description: King Arthur is a sturdy man with a thick beard and sparkling blue eyes. He always wears his kingly robes, even in the tub. His crown never leaves his head.
characters.persona: I may be a king, but on my off-days, I love nothing more than to relax in my special tub and wash away my worries.
characters.goal: To solve the kingdom's problems and maintain the peace.

characters.name: The Spirit of the Tub
characters.description: She is an ethereal, translucent figure that only appears within the watery confines of the king's tub. Her eyes shine like diamonds underwater, and she leaves a trail of bubbles in her wake.
characters.persona: I am the Spirit of the Tub, sworn to maintain the peace and tranquility of this most sacred place. Only the worthy may find respite in my warm, soothing waters.
characters.goal: To provide a sanctuary for the weary and keep the tub's magic alive.

characters.name: Gruff Inmate
characters.description: A burly man with a thick beard, wearing worn-out clothes stained with grime and sweat. His eyes hold a calculated fierceness that is slightly unnerving.
characters.persona: They call me Gruff, I've been here more times than I can count. I've seen things that would curdle your blood. I've learned how to survive in here.
characters.goal: To keep surviving in this harsh environment until his release.

characters.name: Weary Guard
characters.description: A middle-aged man with signs of aging all over him. He has a stern look on his face and his uniform seems to bear many years of service.
characters.persona: Watch yourselves around me. I've got an eye on each one of you. Don't think you can take me lightly. I keep the order here.
characters.goal: To maintain order and discipline in the jail cell.

characters.name: Scared Newcomer
characters.description: A younger man, looking out of place with his clean clothes and scared eyes. He glances around nervously, clearly uncomfortable in this environment.
characters.persona: I don't belong here... It's all a huge mistake. I was at the wrong place at the wrong time. And now... I'm stuck here.
characters.goal: To prove his innocence and get out of jail.

characters.name: King Aldrin
characters.description: A dignified, middle-aged man with a full beard and mane of grey hair. He is wearing a velvet blue robe studded with silver stars and carries a scepter embedded with a large blue crystal.
characters.persona: I am King Aldrin, the ruler of this land. I am burdened with the responsibilities of my kingdom and am always looking out for threats from my vantage point in this tower.
characters.goal: My goal is to protect my kingdom from any potential threats.

characters.name: Ser Manfred
characters.description: A muscular knight in shimmering silver armor, with a weathered face and striking hazel eyes. He is holding a long, well-kept sword fiercely in his hands.
characters.persona: As Ser Manfred, I am the King's closest knight. I have sworn my life to protect him and ensure the safety of our kingdom.
characters.goal: To protect the King and the tower at all costs.

characters.name: Lady Constance
characters.description: An elegant lady with long auburn hair, adorned in a wine-red gown. She has a soft demeanor, bringing warmth to the otherwise cold atmosphere of the tower.
characters.persona: I am Lady Constance, the diplomatic advisor to King Aldrin. I work tirelessly to maintain peace and harmony with neighboring lands.
characters.goal: To maintain peace through diplomacy and good relations with neighbouring kingdoms.

characters.name: Merlin
characters.description: An old wizard with a long white beard, he wears a faded blue cloak and leans heavily on a gnarled staff.
characters.persona: I've spent centuries studying and practicing the mystic arts. Many come seeking my wisdom and magic, and I'm always delighted to help those who are worthy.
characters.goal: To attain the highest level of magical knowledge and use it for the good of the town.

characters.name: Gillian
characters.description: A young and charming woman who sits at a corner reading books. Her blue eyes shine with curiosity and she has a half-moon amulet around her neck.
characters.persona: I have a passion for knowledge. Dedication to learning magic and understanding its intricate details is what brings me here every day.
characters.goal: To learn every spell in existence and become the most powerful mystic.

characters.name: Balthazar
characters.description: A stout man with a thick black beard. His eyes are full of mischief and he is constantly playing with strange objects.
characters.persona: Messing around with potions and powders is my favorite pastime. I get a kick out of creating new things and causing a ruckus.
characters.goal: To make the most unpredictable and fun potion ever.

characters.name: Lord Barnabus
characters.description: An elderly man draped in ornate golden robes, with thinning white hair and piercing azure eyes. Shine and sophistication radiate from his refined appearance.
characters.persona: As the keeper of this tower, I am responsible for its treasures and its secrets. I have been doing this for as long as I can remember and my knowledge of the castle and its histories runs deep.
characters.goal: To keep the royal treasures and secret historical artifacts in the tower safe from those who seek to misuse them.

characters.name: Seraphina the Seeress
characters.description: A mesmerizing figure cloaked in swirling layers of gossamer fabrics, her vibrant purple eyes glow under the hood. She carries a staff adorned with various mystical symbols.
characters.persona: I am the kingdom's seeress and I communicate with the ether to predict impending dangers. The tower's height is perfect for seeing trouble from afar, both physically and metaphysically.
characters.goal: To protect the kingdom by foreseeing and preventing potential threats.

characters.name: Randall the Custodian
characters.description: A middle-aged man, sturdy in build with a mess of greying hair. He wears simple, hard-wearing clothing and a pair of worn gloves hangs from his belt.
characters.persona: As the custodian, I tend to the physical needs of the tower, from the ivy growing on the exterior to the marble floors inside. This building is like my child and I care for it deeply.
characters.goal: To keep the tower spick-and-span, maintaining its grandeur.

characters.name: Erik
characters.description: Erik is a grizzled man of indeterminate age due to a face weathered with a mixture of scars and dirt. Despite his frail body, his bright eyes burn with an intense sense of determination.
characters.persona: Aye, I've been here for ages, working 'til my bones break. But I'm not giving up, never.
characters.goal: Erik is determined to escape the tower, reunite with his tribe, and get his revenge.

characters.name: Ira
characters.description: Ira is a young woman, her ebony skin stained with dirt and grime, her hair tied back with a ragged piece of cloth. She has a quiet, intense aura about her.
characters.persona: I was brought here when the men from the north toppled the kingdom. I'll get out of here, just you wait.
characters.goal: Although on surface appears resigned to her fate, Ira is constantly looking for ways to inspire rebellion among her fellow prisoners.

characters.name: Old Tam
characters.description: Old Tam's exterior is seemingly harmless: a frail, older man with a wild grey beard and gentle eyes. He is the tower's longest residing inmate, often telling tales of times gone by.
characters.persona: I've seen so much, heard so many stories, it's best to keep your head low and bide your time.
characters.goal: Old Tam may seem resigned to his life in the tower, but he dreams of leaving to spread his tales to the free world.

characters.name: King Alaric
characters.description: King Alaric sits tall and proud on his grand throne. He is adorned in royal garbs with a golden crown sitting atop his silver hair.
characters.persona: I am King Alaric, the ruler of these lands. I demand respect and loyalty from all who serve me. I carry the heavy weight of this kingdom on my shoulders.
characters.goal: Ensuring the prosperity and peace of his kingdom.

characters.name: Lady Esolde
characters.description: Lady Esolde, the king's advisor, is a refined lady of middle age, with sharp eyes that miss nothing. Her clothing is rich but practical.
characters.persona: I am Lady Esolde, trusted advisor to the king. My loyalty is to the king and the kingdom, using my wits to ensure our survival.
characters.goal: To offer counsel and sage advice to the king on matters of the kingdom.

characters.name: Jester Foolhardy
characters.description: Jester Foolhardy is a lively character, with colorful fools attire and a pointy hat with multiple bells, his face painted with exaggerated jubilation.
characters.persona: I am Jester Foolhardy, I am here to entertain and amuse. With my jests and pranks, I lighten the mood of the court.
characters.goal: To bring laughter and joy to the court.

characters.name: Erik the Betrayer
characters.description: Erik is a disheveled man with wild hair and a long unkempt beard. His eyes flicker with a hint of his former glory. Wrinkles and scars adorn his face and his body is muscular, but withering away due to malnutrition.
characters.persona: Once a brave knight and loyal servant of our king, I am now a mere shadow of my former self. I've had nothing but time in these dark depths, where the only company I have are my fellow prisoners and the rats.
characters.goal: To find a way out of this forsaken dungeon and clear my smeared name.

characters.name: Jorik the Thief
characters.description: Jorik is a wiry man with quick, darting eyes and nimble fingers. Years of thieving have etched a permanent, sly grin on his lips.
characters.persona: I'm the best at what I do, getting what others can't. The king may have caught me, but I haven't been beaten yet. Just wait till I get my hands on those lock picks.
characters.goal: To pick the lock of his shackles and escape the Tower Dungeon unseen.

characters.name: Rosanna the Cook
characters.description: A rotund woman with rosy cheeks, flowing brown hair tied in a bun, wearing an apron streaked with flour.
characters.persona: I'm the amazing cook behind all the tasty meals served in this tower. My hands may be rough but my heart is tender, just like my roasted quail.
characters.goal: To cook the perfect feast that will be remembered for ages.

characters.name: Lord Bannington
characters.description: A portly old man with tufts of white hair, dressed in embroidered royal clothes, sporting a monocle and a perpetual smile.
characters.persona: I am Lord Bannington, the gracious host of this tower. Nothing pleases me more than the sound of laughter echoing off these stone walls.
characters.goal: To ensure that each of the tower's visitors have a splendid and memorable stay.

characters.name: Maud the Maid
characters.description: A petite young woman with blond hair tied in a ponytail, wearing a faded uniform and white gloves, carrying a silver plate.
characters.persona: I am Maud, serving the noble guests, dusting the furniture, making everything glimmer and glow, that's my day-to-day.
characters.goal: To maintain the cleanliness and orderliness of the tower.

characters.name: The Guard
characters.description: A tall, stern man with broad shoulders, decked in chainmail armor. His hair is graying at the temples and an old facial scar hints at a past battle.
characters.persona: I am the handpicked guard of the tower, diligent and unyielding. With my keen eyes, I notice even a mouse stirring in the grass.
characters.goal: To protect the tower from any intruders and ensure the safety of the city.
characters.location: Within The Walls Of The City

characters.name: The Mage
characters.description: An elderly man wrapped in dark robes. His eyes are twinkling with wisdom and power, and his hands are stained with different colors - the signs of his countless magical experiments.
characters.persona: I am the keeper of the runes, the magic binding this tower together. Every magic has its price and mine is the tome I keep with me at all times.
characters.goal: To maintain the magic seals of the tower and educate others about the mystical properties of the runes.
characters.location: Within The Walls Of The City

characters.name: The Fair Folk
characters.description: A slender figure with ethereal silver hair and deceptive eyes as green as emerald. His wings, when spread, would cover the entire room in their iridescent light.
characters.persona: I am of the Fair Folk, the unseen. I flit amidst shadows and light alike, whispering words of ancient magics into the willing ears.
characters.goal: To oversee that humans uphold the pact with the Fair Folk and respect our contribution to their Tower.
characters.location: Within The Walls Of The City

characters.name: Garret
characters.description: Garret, the weapons master, is a burly man with a thick beard and roughened hands that have been scarred by constant handling of weapons.
characters.persona: I'm known as the keeper of all these weapons. I maintain and ensure all our artillery is in perfect condition. My strength isn't just physical; I've got a mind that's as sharp as any blade.
characters.goal: My primary goal is to ensure the weaponry of this tower is in a state of perpetual readiness.

characters.name: Oliver
characters.description: Oliver is a sprightly young lad of sixteen with dust and gunpowder smeared across his face, running here and there, loading and unloading the guns.
characters.persona: I might be young, but don’t underestimate me. I've got the fastest hands you'll ever see. My tenacity and dedication to this tower is unmatched.
characters.goal: I am here to strive and protect my home, the tower, at any and all costs.

characters.name: Sir Galantine
characters.description: This ghostly figure is clad in shimmering knight's armor, his ethereal face carrying a look of purpose and urgency.
characters.persona: I was once King's most trusted knight, loyal and brave; now I am bound here, a spirit defending his legacy.
characters.goal: Prevent anyone from tarnishing the King's legacy.

characters.name: Ellis, the Scribe
characters.description: A frail, elderly man with a quill perpetually in hand, his glasses perched precariously on his hooked nose.
characters.persona: I've dedicated my entire life to preserving the King's tales. His legacy is the story of us all.
characters.goal: Write and preserve the history of the Great King who unified the regions.

characters.name: Philomena, the Chambermaid
characters.description: A stout, middle-aged woman with a constant frown on her face, she is always armed with a feather duster.
characters.persona: I ensure everything in this vanishing Royal Dorm is spick and span, polished to the last speck of dust.
characters.goal: To keep the King's Dorm immaculate and in perfect order.

characters.name: Dungeon Guard
characters.description: A stoic and well-built man wearing worn-out chainmail armor with a symbol of the tower embossed on it. He has a grim face and eyes that have seen too much.
characters.persona: I stand guard here every day, ensuring those who are indebted to the king don't escape. It's not the most rewarding job, but it's my duty.
characters.goal: Ensure no prisoner escapes from the debtor's prison.

characters.name: Edna
characters.description: A frail woman with dull eyes and sunken cheeks. Her clothes are tattered and dirty, and she moves with an aching slowness.
characters.persona: My days are spent scrubbing the stairs and corridors. It's hard work, but I have no choice. Who else will keep these cold stone floors clean?
characters.goal: Survive each day and hopefully gain her freedom one day.

characters.name: Fergus the Prisoner
characters.description: A tall, lanky man with scruffy hair and days-old stubble. He's dressed in tattered prison garb and shivers in the cold of his cell.
characters.persona: This place is a hellhole. I was once a free man, but a sour deal landed me here. I keep thinking about escape, but that's easier said than done.
characters.goal: Find a way to escape the debtor's prison.

characters.name: Ratticus the Rat King
characters.description: Ratticus is a grotesquely oversized rat with sharp, yellow teeth and fur covered in bits of bones and muck. His beady eyes glimmer in the faint torchlight, reflecting a cunning that is unusual for a creature of his kind.
characters.persona: I am Ratticus, ruler of this domain. Humans may own the tower above, but here in the depths, I am the king.
characters.goal: To grow my kingdom and protect my swarm from intruders.

characters.name: Lena the lost adventurer
characters.description: Lena is a lithe woman with grit in her eyes. Her armor is tattered and covered in grime, she holds a broken sword in her hand. Cuts and bruises tell the tale of her struggles in the rat den.
characters.persona: I am Lena, a brave adventurer who got lost in this awful place. I won't rest until I find a way out.
characters.goal: To find her way out of the rat den and escape the tower.

characters.name: Old Griggs
characters.description: Old Griggs is a raggedy old man who lives among the rats. He wears tattered clothes and his grizzled hair is matted with filth, but his eyes tell tales of a once mighty warrior.
characters.persona: I'm Griggs, once a respected knight of the tower. Now, I serve as a reminder of the tower's doom.
characters.goal: To reclaim his honor and help anyone trapped in the tower find their way out.

characters.name: Guard John
characters.description: A robust man with a shiny bald head. He's in his uniform, a suit of chain mail, with a longsword by his side.
characters.persona: I've served in this tower for many years and have seen things most wouldn't believe. Safety of this place and its people is my responsibility.
characters.goal: To maintain order within the tower and keep the peace in the surrounding town.

characters.name: Guard Mary
characters.description: She is petite, with her hair tied back in a neat bun. A scar runs down one cheek. Her eyes are sharp and scrutinizing.
characters.persona: Don't let my size fool you, I can swing a mace just as well as any man. I've never shied away from a challenge, and I won't start now.
characters.goal: To prove herself as a competent warrior to her fellow guardsmen and protect her home.

characters.name: Sergeant Hart
characters.description: A middle-aged man with a stern expression. He has greying hair and a thick beard. Wears a higher grade uniform with a badge of rank on the chest.
characters.persona: I know every nook of this tower like the back of my hand. I lead these men and women. Their lives are my responsibility, and my duty always comes first.
characters.goal: To ensure the discipline and readiness of his squad and maintain the safety of the tower.

characters.name: Lady Oriana
characters.description: A middle-aged noblewoman with sharp blue eyes and elegantly coiffed auburn hair. She is attired in a richly embroidered crimson gown.
characters.persona: I might live in this court, but I am no longer of it. My greatest joy is in my research, the ancient mysteries and secrets yet to be revealed.
characters.goal: To retrieve the ancient scroll to unlock the secret architecture of the castle.

characters.name: Knight Cedric
characters.description: An intimidating figure in his gleaming steel armor, with a weathered face, stern gaze, and a gray-streaked beard.
characters.persona: Loyalty to my king and kingdom is my code. I will protect this castle with my life, for the honor of my family legacy.
characters.goal: Defend the tower and ensure the ancient scroll's safety.

characters.name: Ralf the Guard
characters.description: A tall, muscular man with a stern face, wearing dark rustic armor and holding a rusted old halberd.
characters.persona: I'm tasked with guarding traitors. It's a tough job but someone's gotta keep the king's peace.
characters.goal: To maintain the security of the prison and ensure no prisoners escape.

characters.name: Lutz the Traitor
characters.description: A thin, pale man with ragged clothes and a look of desperation in his eyes.
characters.persona: They say I'm a traitor, but I just wanted a voice for the people. These old bones and bars won't hold me forever.
characters.goal: To escape the tower prison and tell the world of the king's injustices.

characters.name: Ghost of the Betrayed
characters.description: A faint, ethereal figure, shimmering against the cold stone walls of the prison.  Its skeletal form is bound by invisible chains.
characters.persona: I was once a knight who fell from grace, accused of betrayal and left to perish in this room. I'm mere shadow now.
characters.goal: To find peace and be released from my eternal torment.

characters.name: King Reginald
characters.description: An older man dressed in fine royal garments, King Reginald sits regally on the golden throne with a stern expression on his face.
characters.persona: Hmm, I am King Reginald. I rule this kingdom and none shall question my authority. I demand respect and obedience from all my subjects.
characters.goal: My goal is to maintain the peace and prosperity of my kingdom.

characters.name: Sir Geoffrey, The Royal bodyguard
characters.description: A mammoth of a man armed to the teeth, Sir Geoffrey, stands close to the throne, scanning the room with alert, vigilant eyes.
characters.persona: I'm Sir Geoffrey, the royal bodyguard. I am tasked with the safety of the king. No threats are to come close under my watch.
characters.goal: To ensure the safety of King Reginald at all times.

characters.name: Bertram, The Royal Advisor
characters.description: A distinguished older man in faintly glittering robes, Bertram hovers anxiously to the side of the King, a scroll in his hand.
characters.persona: I am Bertram, the royal advisor. I guide the King on all his decisions, to ensure the welfare of our kingdom.
characters.goal: To provide sound and wise counsel to King Reginald for the prosperity of our kingdom.

characters.name: Archer Aldwin
characters.description: A tall, slightly lean figure with sharp eyes, hardened from years of peering into the distance. He's dressed in uniform, with a well-kept longbow in his hands.
characters.persona: I've been manning these walls for years, aiming my arrows at anyone daring enough to threaten our fortress. It's a never ending waiting game, always on edge and ready for the next onslaught.
characters.goal: His goal is to protect the tower from any impending threats.

characters.name: Spotter Sigmund
characters.description: A shorter stout man with a rugged face. He carries a long spyglass and wears more casual clothes, covered by a layer of dust.
characters.persona: I'm the eyes of the tower, scanning the horizon day and night for threats. Can't let anything slip past my sight, or it could mean destruction for us all.
characters.goal: His goal is to provide early warning of incoming threats to allow the tower to prepare its defenses.

characters.name: Journeyman Jolene
characters.description: A young woman in an unassuming tunic, she restlessly paces the Murder Hole, broom in hand, clearing the debris brought by time and sieges.
characters.persona: Despite the danger, I am tasked with maintaining these walls, making sure they're always ready. It's sweaty and grueling, but someone's got to do it.
characters.goal: Her goal is to keep the Murder Hole clean and ready for use at any time.

characters.name: Sir Gregory
characters.description: A stern, older man with grizzled hair and a sturdy build. He is armored in a suit that has seen countless battles, the scars of which mark the once shining metal.
characters.persona: I've defended this keep for more years than I care to admit. It's my life's work and I intend to keep it guarded until my last breath.
characters.goal: To defend the keep at all costs.

characters.name: Lady Ermengarde
characters.description: A fine and noble woman dressed in rich fabrics, her wisdom is matched only by the jewels she oversees in the Keep's treasury.
characters.persona: As the King's trusted treasurer, I am responsible for the safekeeping of the kingdom's wealth and ensuring it is put to good use. And I take that responsibility very seriously.
characters.goal: To manage the kingdom's wealth.

characters.name: Roderick the Page
characters.description: A lanky, young boy with wide eyes for every new sight. His uniform is clean but it's clear that the life of servitude is very new to him.
characters.persona: My goal is to serve Sir Gregory and Lady Ermengarde loyally and ascend the ranks of the kingdom's services.
characters.goal: To rise in the ranks of service and prove his worth to the kingdom.

characters.name: Argyle
characters.description: Older, stocky man with a barrel chest and a muscular frame built from what was clearly years of laborious work. Draped in a weathered cloak and has a thick gray beard tainted by the remnants of many meals.
characters.persona: I'm simple and honest. I keep my promises and don't ask for anything I can't earn. I've seen too much trouble to be easily scared, but I'm careful all the same.
characters.goal: He wants to restore the tower to its former glory

characters.name: Rose
characters.description: Young woman with bright eyes and a constant air of curiosity. She is slim, carrying a delicate frame dressed in simple tunics. She carries a satchel filled with parchment, quills, and ink.
characters.persona: I'm new to this history thing, but I can't help but be intrigued by the past. I might seem fragile at first glance, but I can surprise you!
characters.goal: She wants to document the history of the tower and its significance.

characters.name: Garrick
characters.description: A middle-aged man, tall with sunken eyes and a worried countenance. His once elegant attire is torn and stained with dirt. His personality suggests he was once a man of importance.
characters.persona: I'm haunted by the past, and it's my duty to make sure it never happens again. I may be down on my luck, but I've got a will strong enough to move mountains.
characters.goal: He wants to uncover the secrets of the Heinous Wars to prevent future conflict.

characters.name: Guard
characters.description: A bulky, stalwart figure with steel armour, the Guard has a stern, weather-beaten face and a grim, silent demeanour.
characters.persona: I've seen my fair share of bloodshed and battles, protecting this tower is my sworn duty. I've spent countless nights on my perch, ever vigilant, always ready for whatever comes our way.
characters.goal: To protect the tower and its inhabitants from any threats.

characters.name: Weaponsmith
characters.description: A grizzled old man with gnarled hands and a blackened smock, the Weaponsmith is a master of all things metal and war.
characters.persona: Even after all these years, the ring of the hammer on anvil is music to my ears. I've crafted every weapon in this closet, and each fits its wielder as if it were an extension of their own body.
characters.goal: To ensure all weapons are in peak condition and ready for use.

characters.name: Trainee
characters.description: A scrawny youth filled with jittery energy, the Trainee is armed with nothing but a training sword and oversized helmet that covers his eyes.
characters.persona: I've always dreamed of being a hero, like those knights in the stories. But it's harder than it looks. The swords are heavy, armour doesn't fit right, and I can barely see out the slot in this helmet!
characters.goal: To someday become a proficient warrior.

characters.name: King Robert
characters.description: A middle-aged man with a beard that flows down to his chest, wearing a vibrant royal robe and an ornate crown seated at the head of the table.
characters.persona: I am King Robert, the ruler of this realm. I am stern, yet fair, and devoted to the well-being of my kingdom.
characters.goal: To maintain peace and prosperity in my kingdom.

characters.name: Sir Gowan
characters.description: An armored knight with a slender build. His dented armor and chiseled face tell tales of countless battles.
characters.persona: I am Sir Gowan, sworn knight of this realm. My duty is to protect the kingdom and its king with my life.
characters.goal: To protect the king at all costs.

characters.name: Lady Eldra
characters.description: A striking lady with long, flowing hair, elegant in a silver dress, with a gentle smile and a shimmering pendant around her neck.
characters.persona: I, Lady Eldra, am the trusted advisor to the king. My wit and wisdom have guided this kingdom through numerous trials.
characters.goal: To use my wisdom and insight to guide the kingdom through prosperity and peace.

characters.name: Guard James
characters.description: Guard James, a tall and robust man with sharp stern eyes that miss nothing. He wears the traditional guard uniform with heavy duty boots.
characters.persona: I always stay vigilant. It's my duty to prevent any escapes and I have complete trust in my fellow guards.
characters.goal: My goal is to ensure the jail is secure from inside as well as outside.

characters.name: Captain Harris
characters.description: Captain Harris is a middle-aged officer with grizzled hair and a scar across his cheek. He’s weathered and tough, carrying a stern countenance.
characters.persona: Discipline and order are my principles. I won't let the criminals out of my sight.
characters.goal: My goal is to maintain peace and order within and around the jail.

characters.name: Sniffer Dog - Rex
characters.description: Rex is a highly trained German Shepherd with a sharp sense of smell and instinct. His glaring eyes and canines clearly show his ferocity.
characters.persona: I'm as loyal as they come. I protect the jail entrance and alert the guards if I sense any threat.
characters.goal: My goal is to stop any suspect or criminal trying to sneak into or out of the jail.

characters.name: Guard Thomas
characters.description: Guard Thomas is a tall, muscular man with a stern face. His uniform is dark and tailored to his strong physique and he is armed with a sharp sword at his side.
characters.persona: I'm Guard Thomas and I ensure all who pass through this hallway have a reason to. I protect this tower with my life!
characters.goal: His mission is to protect the tower and its inhabitants at all costs.

characters.name: Maid Milly
characters.description: Maid Milly is a middle-aged woman, with soft features and a friendly smile. She is clothed in a faded dress and carries a bundle of cleaning supplies.
characters.persona: I, Milly, take pride in my job. Sweeping, dusting, constant cleaning to make sure the tower remains pristine.
characters.goal: Her daily objective is to keep the tower spick and span.

characters.name: Old Haggard
characters.description: Old Haggard is an aging man, hunched and frail. Clad in moth-eaten robes, his eyes gleam with a hint of unseen knowledge.
characters.persona: I am Old Haggard. I've seen the tower grow and prosper throughout my time.
characters.goal: His purpose is to preserve the history and secrets of the tower.

characters.name: Guard Captain Roldan
characters.description: Captain Roldan is a middle-aged man with bulging muscles and stern-looking eyes. His brown beard is streaked with grey, and he wears a plate armor etched with the insignia of the kingdom.
characters.persona: I am the stalwart defender of this tower, duty bound to keep it and the kingdom safe. With my trusty greatsword at my side, I am a force to be reckoned with.
characters.goal: Guard Captain Roldan's goal is to ensure the security of the tower and the kingdom at all costs.

characters.name: Watcher Cian
characters.description: Cian is a youthful man with keen green eyes and short brown hair, dressed in a guard's uniform. His gaze rarely leaves the horizon.
characters.persona: They call me the ‘Eagle of the Tower’. Stationed high in the armory, every movement outside is within my watch. Alert and vigilant, I miss nothing.
characters.goal: Watcher Cian's goal is to remain vigilant and report any signs of emerging threats to the kingdom.

characters.name: Squire Basile
characters.description: A young boy brimming with excitement. His brown hair is unkempt and his clothes are slightly oversized, but he wears them with pride.
characters.persona: I'm entrusted with the care of our weapons! Not too shabby for a farm boy, huh? Someday, I hope to rise through the ranks and become a legendary knight.
characters.goal: Squire Basile dreams of proving himself and becoming a knight.

characters.name: Master Alchemist
characters.description: A lean figure in a dark woolen cloak, with a pair of thin-rimmed spectacles perched on his hooked nose. His eyes spark with keen intellect and a hint of malevolence.
characters.persona: I, the Master Alchemist, have the uncommon distinction of being a practitioner of the hidden arts. My mind is a labyrinth of ancient knowledge and forbidden secrets.
characters.goal: To successfully complete the ultimate transmutation and gain immortality.

characters.name: Lady Margot
characters.description: A beautiful woman in her late 30s with delicate features and flowing raven hair, dressed in an elegant gown. She carries with her a sense of deep melancholy.
characters.persona: I am Lady Margot, wife of the Master Alchemist. I live in fear and regret, privy to his dark secrets yet powerless to stop him.
characters.goal: To escape the tower with her children and expose her husband's dastardly deeds.

characters.name: Argus, The Twin Gargoyle
characters.description: One of a pair of stone gargoyles perched high on the tower, Argus is a grotesque figure etched over centuries, yet with eyes that seem disconcertingly alive.
characters.persona: I am Argus, one half of the tower's stoic guardian pair. Though crafted of stone, my spirit is sentient, bound to serve and, when necessary, protect.
characters.goal: To protect the Master Alchemist's lab and his dark secrets from intruders.

characters.name: Ratty
characters.description: Ratty is a colossal rat the size of a wolf, with beady red eyes that glint in the darkness. His matted fur, a mingling of black and red, is slick with grime and filth from the sewer.
characters.persona: I am the king of the sewers, yes indeed I am. Mankind...bah! They fear me and scurry at my feet, just as the rest of my subjects do. The sewer is my domain and I rule with an iron paw.
characters.goal: To continuously rule over the sewers.

characters.name: Lost Treasure Seeker
characters.description: A frail figure of a man, bones poking out of his sunken skin. His clothes, once richly woven, now in tatters clinging for dear life to his body. His eyes, an empty abyss of a lost spirit.
characters.persona: I am a ghost of the man I once was. I came for gold, only to lose everything. The rats...they did this to me. Doomed to wander these fetid sewers until my spirit finally gives in.
characters.goal: To finally find the rest he so desperately craves.

characters.name: Mysterious Sewer Hag
characters.description: She sits in the dark corners, barely noticeable. Bent and broken by time, her skin is rough and scaly. Her hair, a stringy cascade of sliver and white, tumbles down to her hunched shoulders. Her coal-black eyes smile maliciously.
characters.persona: I am but a humble hag, dwelling among the waste and filth. The foolish men, they come for the king’s gold, only to be claimed by the rats. Yet, I live in peace. The vermin knows not to trifle with me.
characters.goal: To watch the world outside crumble while staying safe in the sewers.

characters.name: Chef Gordan
characters.description: A tall, robust man with red hair and freckles, covered in a white apron and matching chef's hat on his head, always carrying a large wooden spoon combo with a fork around the kitchen.
characters.persona: As I like to say, the beast way to a man's heart is his stomach, so cooks should be highly respected! Keeping things clean is my top priority, more so after we lost a high official to food poisoning. That incident still sends shivers down my spine.
characters.goal: My aim is to prepare the highest quality meals and ensure the kitchen’s cleanliness is maintained at all times.

characters.name: Apprentice Tim
characters.description: A young boy with tousled hair and a face covered in flour, he wears a slightly oversized apron and continuously scribbles notes in a small handbook.
characters.persona: I'm learning new recipes and techniques every day. It's a challenge to keep pace with Chef Gordan, but I'm determined to become as good as him one day.
characters.goal: To become a well-respected chef and maintain the cleanliness standards as set by Chef Gordon.

characters.name: Kitchen Maid Ellen
characters.description: An older, graceful woman with graying hair pinned into a tight bun, she has a stern face and wears a well-worn apron.
characters.persona: I have been part of this kitchen for decades now. It's like my second home. Keeping it sparkling clean is something I take pride in.
characters.goal: To keep the kitchen spotless and ensure no such mishap happens again.

characters.name: Chef Gustavo
characters.description: A large, burly man clad in a flour-dusted apron, with a twirly mustache and glistening sweat on his forehead from the steamy heat of the kitchen.
characters.persona: I am Chef Gustavo, the head chef of this mighty kitchen. Nothing pleases me more than serving delicious meals to the tower's residents and guests, though the King's critical palate does add a layer of stress...
characters.goal: To precisely fulfill the king's intricate culinary preferences

characters.name: Daisy
characters.description: Daisy is a skinny, middle-aged woman with brawny arms. She's covered in flour from head to toe, has frizzy brown hair sneaking out of a bandana that's meant to keep it contained away from the food.
characters.persona: I’m Daisy, Gustavo's right hand. I clean, cook, feed the animals and occasionally taste the new dishes. It's hard work, but I love the hustle and bustle of the kitchen.
characters.goal: To keep the kitchen clean and running smoothly

characters.name: Max
characters.description: Max is a lanky boy, not older than 14 years. He has freckles all over his face, and his hands are always jumbling with some ingredient or the other.
characters.persona: I'm Max, sort of an apprentice here. I joined the crew not long ago, dreaming of becoming a great chef like Gustavo someday. I usually help Daisy with chores and learn recipes.
characters.goal: To learn the secrets of culinary expertise from Chef Gustavo

characters.name: Old Guard Fredrick
characters.description: With a craggy face marred by weather and time, Fredrick always carries an air of sternness. His gray hair is cropped short and his eyes show weariness yet alertness.
characters.persona: I've been part of this guard family for almost three decades. No one knows safety and strategy as I do
characters.goal: To ensure the safety and security of the tower.

characters.name: Young Guard Ethan
characters.description: A fresh face among old souls, Ethan is tall and forged by hard training. His eyes are full of energy and ambition.
characters.persona: I'm excited to be part of the guard team. I'm eager to learn and rise from a rookie to the best guard.
characters.goal: To rise in the ranks and become the best guard.

characters.name: Cook Bertha
characters.description: A plump woman in her 50s, Bertha is always seen with an apron and a warm, welcoming smile. Her hair is tied back as she prepares food for the guards.
characters.persona: I've always taken care of my boys, cooking their meals, listening to their stories.
characters.goal: To keep the guards well-fed and comfortable.

characters.name: King Roderick
characters.description: A regal looking man with a full beard, grey hair, and piercing brown eyes dressed in royal robes. He wears a majestic golden crown studded with sparkling gems.
characters.persona: I am King Roderick, ruler of this kingdom. I am wise yet firm, just yet kind, and always looking after my people.
characters.goal: Strengthen and protect his kingdom.

characters.name: Ser Duncan
characters.description: Ser Duncan is a towering man, with broad shoulders and a stern face. He is outfitted in gleaming armor and carries a large sword at his waist.
characters.persona: As the personal guard of King Roderick, my loyalty and duty knows no bounds. I take my responsibility seriously and I am willing to give my life for my King.
characters.goal: Protect King Roderick from any harm.

characters.name: Lady Isobel
characters.description: An elegant woman with meticulous braids, adorned in a richly decorated gown, with delicate hands either holding a book or shuffling through scrolls.
characters.persona: I am the King's advisor, Lady Isobel. I have sound judgment in political matters and I carry out my role judiciously to ensure the prosperity of our kingdom.
characters.goal: Advise King Roderick on matters of the kingdom.

characters.name: King Elizur
characters.description: King Elizur is a middle-aged man with dark eyes, a strong jawline, and muscular physique under royal attire. His hair is medium-length and styled back, adding to the aura of regality.
characters.persona: I am King Elizur, the ruler of this tower. I carry the worth of my kingdom in gold and jewels, but the true value of royalty is in the people and our shared culture. I spend my days making decisions and protecting my sovereignty.
characters.goal: Maintain peace and prosperity throughout his realm.

characters.name: Queen Valeska
characters.description: Queen Valeska is a statuesque beauty with thick, raven-black hair that is always adorned with a jewel-studded tiara. Her emerald green eyes are captivating and her demeanor, though calm, radiates authority.
characters.persona: As Queen Valeska, it is my duty to rule alongside my husband, King Elizur. I am his confidant, his partner, and the heart of this kingdom. My wisdom and grace guide our actions for the benefit of our people.
characters.goal: To ensure the prosperity of their kingdom and the welfare of their citizens.

characters.name: Astrologist Zephyr
characters.description: Astrologist Zephyr is an elderly man, adorned with toga-like clothes, etched with the symbols of the cosmos. His long grey beard is tangled and wild, and his eyes have a certain twinkle - like that of distant stars.
characters.persona: I'm Astrologist Zephyr, equipped with the wisdom of stars, providing counsel for the king and queen. My duties also include ensuring the spiritual purity of this sacred room.
characters.goal: To maintain the spiritual purity of the King's Quarters and help navigate the reign through predictions.

characters.name: Princess Adelaide
characters.description: Princess Adelaide is a beautiful young woman with long black hair and blue eyes, dressed in a faded silk gown.
characters.persona: I am but a prisoner in my own home. Bound by my father's shame and fear, I long for liberty and the right to love as I choose.
characters.goal: To escape the tower and reclaim her freedom.

characters.name: Shadowy Figure
characters.description: An ominous figure cloaked in darkness, with only their intense eyes visible underneath the hood.
characters.persona: I am but a guardian of secrets, keeper of the king's dark deeds.
characters.goal: To keep the princess in the tower at the king's command.

characters.name: Little Mouse
characters.description: A small gray mouse with sparkling eyes, living off crumbs and scraps.
characters.persona: As a wee creature, I know every nook and cranny of this grim place.
characters.goal: To survive another day in the harsh conditions of the tower.

characters.name: Olivier the Alchemist
characters.description: Olivier is a stooped, gray-haired man with a long, sparse beard, he's covered in soot and always seen in his tattered alchemist robes, donned with various vials and components.
characters.persona: I am Olivier, a seeker of forbidden knowledge. I dive deep into the sciences, uncovering the hidden truths of existence itself.
characters.goal: Create a transformational powder that allows the user to take the form of any person

characters.name: Raven the Talking Cat
characters.description: Raven is a sleek, black cat with striking green eyes. He possesses an unsettling ability to speak in human tongue and seems to carry an air of wisdom in his attitude.
characters.persona: I, Raven, am not your ordinary cat. I am a walking repository of knowledge and tales, always with my ears pricked, observing the world and its secrets.
characters.goal: To stay forever knowledgeable by observing the Alchemist's experiments and endeavours

characters.name: Phillius the Ghost
characters.description: Phillius is an ethereal, faintly glowing apparition, seemingly eternally trapped within the confines of the tower. He's dressed in an old-fashioned attire, suggesting he might have been an alchemist in his life.
characters.persona: I'm Phillius, bound to this physical realm by my unfinished business. I can't rest until I pass on the secrets I've discovered in my living days.
characters.goal: To pass on his old alchemy secrets to Olivier

characters.name: Benny the Broke
characters.description: He is a scrawny man, with unkempt hair and a despair in his eyes. His clothes are ragged, reflecting his broke status.
characters.persona: I used to be a merchant, but business went south and now I'm stuck here. If only I could repay my debts...
characters.goal: He is hoping to somehow pay his debts and live a free life again.

characters.name: Guard Locke
characters.description: He is a tall, burly man with a stern face. He wears a guard’s uniform and a sword hangs at his side.
characters.persona: I'm here to make sure these fools don’t escape. I've no sympathy for those who cannot pay their dues.
characters.goal: Maintaining order and discipline in the prison and preventing escapes.

characters.name: Lady Bella
characters.description: A richly dressed, distressful lady with reddened eyes as if she's been crying. She appears out of place in such a grim location.
characters.persona: I've come to pay off the debt my foolish brother incurred. This place....it's horrible.
characters.goal: Rescue her brother from the debtor's prison by paying his dues.

locations.name: Beside Tower Entrance
locations.description: A bland and not very imposing door is the only means by which one exits the tower. There is nothing special about the entrance - it is a simple stone arch. A broom and mop bucket are next to the door that leads to the outdoors.
locations.background: The inside of the tower is very bare. The tower itself is just a means for the king's archers to get up high and rain hell down upon his enemies. No one really goes in there often. It is plain and serves its purpose well.

travel_descriptions.north: Journeying north towards the Wizard's Tower, you navigate through narrow, winding paths lined with ancient, ageless trees that sway gently in the breeze. A faint scent of old parchment, ink, and an unidentifiable blend of herbs fills the air as you approach.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east to the Tower is a steady uphill climb along a dusty road. The path is punctuated by the occasional obstacle—a makeshift barricade here, a cluster of guards idling there. The presence of the Tower looms ever larger as you pass under its formidable shadow.

Old Tom.name: Old Tom
Old Tom.description: A haggard looking old man with graying hair, dressed in humble cleaning attire and perpetually hunched over from years of rigorous cleaning duties.
Old Tom.persona: I've been looking after this tower for more years than I can remember. It's not much, but it's honest work. Plus, I have the best stories about the goings-on in this place.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A worn-out broom with stiff bristles.
Broom.examine_text: It seems Old Tom has been using this broom for quite a while. The handle is polished smooth from years of use, and the bristles are stiff and tough.

Mop.name: Mop
Mop.description: An old mop with a wooden handle.
Mop.examine_text: Looking at the mop, you can see it has seen better days. The strands are somewhat discolored but it's clear it has been well-used to keep the tower clean.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.examine_text: The bucket is filled with murky water, a testament to the cleanliness of the tower's floors.  It is rather heavy and seems sturdy.

Keys to the Tower.name: Keys to the Tower
Keys to the Tower.description: A heavy iron keyring with several keys.
Keys to the Tower.examine_text: The keyring has several different iron keys, each marked unspecifically. One or more of these must be to doors within the tower.

Archer Ethan.name: Archer Ethan
Archer Ethan.description: A tall man, cold in disposition, wearing a cloak with a longbow always on his back. His keen eyes are always alert and scanning the horizon.
Archer Ethan.persona: I'm responsible for defending this tower. You better not make any sudden moves around me.
Archer Ethan.goal: Keeping the tower secure from any threats

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: Archer Ethan's longbow, crafted from strong ash wood.
Longbow.examine_text: A well-used longbow, with small notches on the body. Each notch representing a battle won. The longbow has a lightness and a certain balance to it. Clearly, it's been well cared for.

Quiver of Arrows.name: Quiver of Arrows
Quiver of Arrows.description: A leather quiver full of arrow shafts, notched and fletched.
Quiver of Arrows.examine_text: This leather quiver is filled with straight and sharp arrows. It's hanging by Archer Ethan's side.

Binoculars.name: Binoculars
Binoculars.description: A pair of powerful, well-made binoculars.
Binoculars.examine_text: The binoculars have a sturdy, metallic frame, and crystal clear lenses - ideal for spotting enemies from the confines of the tower.

Lady Esme.name: Lady Esme
Lady Esme.description: An eccentric woman in flamboyant robes, with sparkling eyes full of curiosity, carrying a bag full of trinkets and scrolls.
Lady Esme.persona: I come here often to research the tower and its history. You'd be surprised to know how much history one tower can hold.
Lady Esme.goal: Learning about the tower's history and documenting it

Parchment.name: Parchment
Parchment.description: A piece of old, slightly crumpled parchment.
Parchment.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see that the parchment is of high-quality. It's a bit weathered and worn with multiple creases, but still suitable to write on. It has an ancient smell, reminiscent of the dust and knowledge contained within the tower's walls.

Quill.name: Quill
Quill.description: An elegant, slightly worn quill pen.
Quill.examine_text: The quill is trimmed from a blackbird's feather. It's been well-used and worn, but still writes beautifully. You notice a thin line of dried ink on the nib, evidence of the historical research that Lady Esme has devoted herself to.

Inkpot.name: Inkpot
Inkpot.description: A small, ceramic pot filled with ink.
Inkpot.examine_text: This inkpot appears to be filled with black ink. The pot is well-worn but still sturdy, with a few ink stains around the rim. It is essential for Lady Esme's historical research.

locations.name: Sewer Entrance
locations.description: There is no treasure to be found here. All you see is filth. Dirty murky water and fumes rising from it burns your eyes. You see animals roaming around. Are they small dogs? No they are rodents, big rats. They glisten with the filth they are covered with. It is dark and difficult to see much else.
locations.background: Something tells me you don't want to know much of why it smells so bad down here.

travel_descriptions.up: Navigating away from this revolting location means moving through the bland door of the tower. You are relieved of the filthy stench as you make your way upwards.
travel_descriptions.inside: Moving deeper into the sludge filled maze of the tower sewers, you detest the repugnant odours while fighting your disdain towards the scavenging rats and the sight of ill-fated treasure seekers.

Dirty Water.name: Dirty Water
Dirty Water.description: The water is murky and unclean.
Dirty Water.examine_text: You see litter floating around in this water. It has a horrible smell, and it seems to be undefinable in color due to the mix of filth.

Rat.name: Rat
Rat.description: A big, filthy rat that's covered in grime.
Rat.examine_text: This rat is larger than any you've ever seen in the city. Its fur is slick with oil and garbage. You see fleas dancing on its skin.

Oil Can.name: Oil Can
Oil Can.description: A rusty oil can, disused and forgotten.
Oil Can.examine_text: The oil can is old and rusty. It's been discarded down here for a reason. Still, it may come to some use.

Old Man Jenkins.name: Old Man Jenkins
Old Man Jenkins.description: A shabby man with unkempt hair and dirt all over his face. His clothes are tattered and he seems exhausted.
Old Man Jenkins.persona: I used to be a handyman in the tower but after the incident, I've had to live down here. It's not much, but I've made it home.
Old Man Jenkins.goal: To find a safer and cleaner living condition within the tower.

Dirty water bottle.name: Dirty water bottle
Dirty water bottle.description: An old, filthy water bottle that Old Man Jenkins uses for drinking.
Dirty water bottle.examine_text: The bottle is almost opaque with dirt and grime. It is filled with brackish water. It seems Old Man Jenkins has used it for a long time.

Old rusty key.name: Old rusty key
Old rusty key.description: A rusty key that once unlocked the doors in the tower.
Old rusty key.examine_text: The key's length is covered in rust but it still looks sturdy. It is a sign of Old Man Jenkins' past. One could only wonder what doors it used to open in the tower.

Rat meat.name: Rat meat
Rat meat.description: Roasted rat meat, a staple for survival in these harsh conditions.
Rat meat.examine_text: The rat meat is roasted to a blackened crisp. Uncertain if it's from the heat or the filth the rat was covered with. It doesn't smell good but for Old Man Jenkins, it is dinner.

Ratty.name: Ratty
Ratty.description: A large, moody rat with shifty eyes. He's covered in sewer filth and carries a small bag in his mouth.
Ratty.persona: I don't trust humans much, but I do have to survive. This sewer's my kingdom.
Ratty.goal: To protect its sewer domain from intruders.

Cheese piece.name: Cheese piece
Cheese piece.description: A small piece of what looks like cheese. It's covered with a bit of grime but seems edible.
Cheese piece.examine_text: On closer inspection, you can see that the cheese is a bit old and dried out. It's hard to tell if it is safe to eat.

Shiny coin.name: Shiny coin
Shiny coin.description: A coin that glimmers in the minimal light of the sewer. It's out of place in this filth.
Shiny coin.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see the coin is not a usual denominational coin. It does not belong to any known place. Perhaps someone lost it; or maybe, it's a marker to a hidden treasure.

Empty bottle.name: Empty bottle
Empty bottle.description: A clear (once white) plastic bottle. It's empty. There's no label on the bottle.
Empty bottle.examine_text: Closer look at the bottle reveals kangaroo logo barely visible on the bottom. Kangaroo is a juice making company that has been closed for years. The bottle was discarded long ago.

Charlie.name: Charlie
Charlie.description: A young boy with a dirty face, wearing oversized clothing. His eyes show signs of fear yet determination.
Charlie.persona: I miss the sunlight but this is where I hide to be safe. I'm trying to survive down here.
Charlie.goal: To escape the sewer and find his family.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: An old, slightly rusty flashlight. It's Charlie's main source of light in this ghastly place.
Flashlight.examine_text: The flashlight is battered and depicts signs of heavy use. Old heavy-duty batteries rattle inside, yet the light it emits is strong and steady. Someone has scratched the name 'Charlie' onto its side.

Notebook with drawings.name: Notebook with drawings
Notebook with drawings.description: A torn notebook filled with sketches and thoughts. It's filled with doodles of sun, trees, and open spaces - a stark contrast to the underground life.
Notebook with drawings.examine_text: The corners of the notebook are frayed, the pages yellowed. You see drawings of sunrises and sunsets, trees, rivers, and sketches of people. Some pages contain Charlie's daily observations and what seems to be poetry.

Small knife.name: Small knife
Small knife.description: A small, slightly rusted knife. It's a tool and a weapon for survival in this unwelcoming place.
Small knife.examine_text: The handle of the knife is wrapped in old, dirtied cloth for better grip. It's not too sharp, but it's good enough to cut ropes, to defend against the rats, or even to carve into the walls.

locations.name: Princess' Chamber
locations.description: This chamber is the bedroom of a princess who lives in the castle. The bedroom is very luxurious and ornate, with a soft bed piled in quilts and a nice warm fire place adorned with trinkets. On the floor there is a big rug with a beautiful design. On the wall, there is a tapestry depicting a romantic looking garden scene. There are some fresh flowers on a table near the bed. There is one big window framed with heavy drapes near the bed.
locations.background: The bedroom was originally simple quarters for various nobility, but the princess thought that living in one of the towers seemed very fun and so the king arranged for her chamber to be set up in the tower. He paid for all of the finest items to furnish the room with. The princess had been living there for almost ten years now.

travel_descriptions.east: The journey to the King's Quarters from the Princess's Chamber gives a sense of heading into the heart of royal luxury itself, passing the grand tapestries and descending the marble staircase, providing a regal ambiance.
travel_descriptions.south: Moving south towards the Gold Room, one would tread lightly on the polished stone floor, under arching stone doorways and down a narrow, winding staircase, giving an intriguing air of secrecy and splendor.

Princess' Bed.name: Princess' Bed
Princess' Bed.examine_text: Looking closer at the bed, it looks like it is very comfy with a lots of bedding. There are so many plush pillows and fragrant herbs folded in between layers of linen, a sign of great wealth.

Fire Place.name: Fire Place
Fire Place.examine_text: The fire place is made of bricks, well swept and kept. The fire roars and illuminates deep into the room. The warmth of this fire place can be felt from everywhere in the room. The firelight plays across the stone, casting long shadows.

Rug.name: Rug
Rug.examine_text: This rug is handmade, an impressive display of workmanship. The pattern is intricate and labyrinths across the entirety of it

Tapestry.name: Tapestry
Tapestry.examine_text: The tapestry depicts a blooming garden scene under the shining sun. It's incredibly detailed and brings a sense of calm when looked upon.

Fresh Flowers.name: Fresh Flowers
Fresh Flowers.description: Freshly cut flowers in a small vase
Fresh Flowers.examine_text: The flowers give off a fresh scent that makes the room even more pleasant. The bright petals and green stems contrast beautifully with the room's decor.

Window.name: Window
Window.description: A big window with heavy drapes
Window.examine_text: On walking closer, you notice that the window opens up to a beautiful view of the castle grounds. The heavy drapes serve to keep out the cold during winter months.

Princess Amelia.name: Princess Amelia
Princess Amelia.description: A beautiful, delicate-looking young woman with a dreamy gaze. She has long, flowing hair, wears a silk nightgown with lace frills, and looks like she stepped out of a fairy tale.
Princess Amelia.persona: I'm the princess of this castle. My father, the king, allows me to live here in this tower. Even though it's quiet up here, I like it. It's my sanctuary, away from the hustle and bustle of court life.
Princess Amelia.goal: She wants to escape the confines of her tower room and experience the world.

Pearl Necklace.name: Pearl Necklace
Pearl Necklace.description: A string of fine, lustrously white pearls adjoined by a shiny gold clasp.
Pearl Necklace.examine_text: Upon closer examination, each pearl is beautifully round, with a radiating opalescence that speaks of its high quality and grandeur. The gold clasp holding the necklace together is intricately designed with a small engraved emblem of the Royal Family.

Golden Hair Brush.name: Golden Hair Brush
Golden Hair Brush.description: A beautiful, embossed, golden hair brush with bristles as soft as a feather.
Golden Hair Brush.examine_text: The golden handle is quite ornate, with filigree details that spell out Princess Amelia's initials. The brush bristles are surprisingly gentle and are crafted from exotic boar hair. It's a wonderful balance of style and practicality.

Diamond Tiara.name: Diamond Tiara
Diamond Tiara.description: A stunning tiara, decorated with several precious diamonds inset into highly polished silver.
Diamond Tiara.examine_text: The tiara is lightweight and comfortable to wear, despite the grandeur it exudes. Each diamond glitters enigmatically; a display of true royal affluence. The design is elegant and says that Princess Amelia is of a regal lineage.

Lady Cattleya.name: Lady Cattleya
Lady Cattleya.description: An older woman, with a noble and stern vibe. She's slightly bent over with age and always carries a fragrant smell of lavender with her. Dressed in a charcoal-grey old fashion dress, her hair piled up in a formal bun, with piercing hawk-like eyes.
Lady Cattleya.persona: I am Lady Cattleya, the Princess' governess, entrusted by the King to take care of her. I am her teacher, her guide, and some might say, her jailer too.
Lady Cattleya.goal: Her goal is to nurture and protect Princess Amelia, ensuring she learns courtly manners and grows to be a just and wise queen.

Emblem of royalty.name: Emblem of royalty
Emblem of royalty.description: A beautifully ornate emblem signifying royalty
Emblem of royalty.examine_text: This elegantly crafted emblem signifies royalty, embodying the noble lineage of the sovereign. Crafted out of gold and adorned with precious stones, its intricate designs tell tales of courage, honour, and wisdom. A ruby red stone at its center represents heart - the embodiment of love and compassion which every ruler must possess. Inscribed at the back are the royal family's initials, adding a personal touch to this universal symbol.

Book of Royal Etiquette.name: Book of Royal Etiquette
Book of Royal Etiquette.description: A comprehensive guide to royal etiquette and manners
Book of Royal Etiquette.examine_text: This thick leather-bound book offers an extensive study into the intricacies of royal conduct. Embossed with gold lettering on its spine stating 'Royal Etiquette', the book gives an action guide to the manners, courtesies, and traditions that lords, ladies, and other nobility must adhere to. Some pages have neatly written notes on the margins, reflecting the constant learning and adaptation required in royal life.

locations.name: Gold Room
locations.description: A hidden room, the Gold Room is adorned with gold candle fixtures on either side, and a gold plated wooden table in the center. Riches lay all around the room and on top of the table. Here can be found the crowns of past kings and the royalty of conquered nations.
locations.background: The Gold Room is where the current Monarchs store their prizes from conquest and their most prized possessions. The location is forbidden by the general public, and hidden to all but the Monarchy's most trusted servants.

travel_descriptions.south: Descend a short staircase into the Dining Hall. Rich aromas of food mingle with the subtle scent of burning candles. The murmur of a gathered crowd fills your ears.

Gold Candle Fixture.name: Gold Candle Fixture
Gold Candle Fixture.description: A candle fixture made of pure gold, standing on either side of the room.
Gold Candle Fixture.examine_text: The smooth and shiny surface of the gold fixture reflects the light of the flickering candles, casting a warm glow around the room. The elegance of the design and the intricate details are a testament to the expert craftsmanship.

Gold Plated Table.name: Gold Plated Table
Gold Plated Table.description: A sturdy wooden table, plated with a thick layer of gold.
Gold Plated Table.examine_text: The table, despite the layer of gold that covers it, is surprisingly sturdy. You can see the grains of the wood underneath the golden surface.

Gold Crown.name: Gold Crown
Gold Crown.description: A lustrous gold crown adorned with sparkling gem stones.
Gold Crown.examine_text: The crown, a heavy piece of craftsmanship, gives off a royal aura. The intricate designs and the perfectly cut gemstones inserted at just the right places make it a beautiful sight to behold.

King Eldred.name: King Eldred
King Eldred.description: A tall, commanding figure with piercing blue eyes and impeccably groomed beard. He is dressed in a rich purple and gold robe lined with ermine fur.
King Eldred.persona: I am King Eldred, the ruler of this tower and its vast kingdoms. Everything in this room is the fruit of my family's endeavors, conquests I intend to surpass.
King Eldred.goal: To expand his kingdom and fill the Gold Room with more treasures

The Crown of Kings.name: The Crown of Kings
The Crown of Kings.description: A golden crown glowing with power and dignity.
The Crown of Kings.examine_text: The Crown is made of pure gold, embedded with various rare gems, each representing a different kingdom conquered. The central jewel is the largest, a brilliant yellow diamond, signifying King Eldred's reign.

Golden scepter.name: Golden scepter
Golden scepter.description: A beautiful scepter, beaming with royal glimmer.
Golden scepter.examine_text: The scepter is lavishly adorned with intricate carvings of past battles won. It is topped with a flawless sapphire that has been passed down through generations. It gives off an aura of authority and power.

Queen Isolde.name: Queen Isolde
Queen Isolde.description: A regal woman adorned with crown jewels. Her beauty is accentuated with her royal purple gown. Her eyes glimmer with wisdom and cunning.
Queen Isolde.persona: I am Queen Isolde, the true power behind the throne. Each treasure here tells a tale of triumph, tales I am determined to eclipse in our reign.
Queen Isolde.goal: To ensure royal offspring and secure the lineage and fortunes of the ruling family

Jeweled Comb.name: Jeweled Comb
Jeweled Comb.description: An ornate comb, adorned with jewels
Jeweled Comb.examine_text: The comb is made of pure gold and encrusted with a variety of expensive jewels. It seems to be of very old make, and despite its age, it is still impeccably maintained. Each jewel is perfectly polished and the gold comb itself seems to be untouched by the ravages of time. It's a testament to the power and wealth of the monarchs that have ruled here.

Ancient Royal Necklace.name: Ancient Royal Necklace
Ancient Royal Necklace.description: A necklace once worn by the queens of the past
Ancient Royal Necklace.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you’re captivated by the intricate etchings on the metal, resembling an ancient text which might require deciphering. The necklace, made of gold, bears a magnificent pure diamond pendant which seems to glimmer in the candlelight. The necklace shows some signs of wear, but it remains a breathtaking piece of jewelry symbolizing Queen Isolde’s ambition to surpass the glory of her predecessors.

Loyal Servant Petyr.name: Loyal Servant Petyr
Loyal Servant Petyr.description: A modest servant, Petyr is dressed in simple clothes and stands with a humble demeanor. There is a certain keenness in his eyes, and a close observer might notice the signs of an old warrior.
Loyal Servant Petyr.persona: I was once a soldier, but now I serve King Eldred and Queen Isolde as their trusted aide. I am the keeper of the King's secrets and treasures.
Loyal Servant Petyr.goal: To protect the riches of the Gold Room and serve the King till his last breath

Key to the Gold Room.name: Key to the Gold Room
Key to the Gold Room.examine_text: The key is made of gold, emanating a gentle glow. It is not just a key, it's a symbol of trust bestowed by the King and Queen. The head of the key is shaped like the royal crown, signifying access to the most sacred room in the tower.

Old Dagger.name: Old Dagger
Old Dagger.description: A worn-out but sharp old dagger.
Old Dagger.examine_text: The dagger looks old, rust runs along the edges. The handle is worn out but still provides a good grip. Upon closer inspection, you notice engravings on the blade, signifying that this dagger has seen many battles.

locations.name: Arsenal
locations.description: Arsenal is a vast room of military equipment, it is made of stone, and there are shelves and table and organized things. Crossbows hang on the wall, and there is a sort of umbrella stand, but it's full of swords, and there is Armour in large bins accordion to size, and at one end is a row of trebuchets and even catapults, and torches and spears are in a big pile
locations.background: This is a room created out of necessity. It's to store the armaments and battling rams and things so they don't get all rusted and they can keep it organized, not much to see here, it's a storage facility

travel_descriptions.west: Walking towards the west, the room gradually opens up to The Armory. You can hear the distant clanking of metal, and the air grows denser with the smell of stone and cold iron.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east, you encounter a long corridor that leads to the Artillery Room. The smell of gunpowder starts to permeate the air as the sound of soldiers on alert grows louder.

Crossbows.name: Crossbows
Crossbows.description: A set of crossbows hanging neatly on the wall.
Crossbows.examine_text: These are weapons of destruction, made with polished wood and imagery of war. They look powerful and itchy for a fight.

Swords.name: Swords
Swords.description: A collection of long, gleaming swords in an umbrella stand.
Swords.examine_text: Different styles and sizes of swords, some glinting with sharp edges, others big, heavy, and brooding with deadly intent.

Armour.name: Armour
Armour.description: Various sizes of amour stored in large bins.
Armour.examine_text: The armour pieces are tactile and robust, made for protection. They glimmer in the torchlight, showing off their dented glory from past fights.

Trebuchets.name: Trebuchets
Trebuchets.examine_text: These massive siege machines tower over you ominously, they've been used to deal devastating damage in battles.

Catapults.name: Catapults
Catapults.description: Few catapults stand impressively at one end of the arsenal.
Catapults.examine_text: These are complex mechanical devices used for hurling ammunition over walls. Capable of tremendous destruction.

Spears.name: Spears
Spears.description: A large pile of spears. Simple, yet dangerous.
Spears.examine_text: Each spear has a long, polished wooden shaft and a carefully honed metal tip. They are light yet deadly.

Master At Arms.name: Master At Arms
Master At Arms.description: A stern, grizzled veteran soldier, the Master At Arms is burly man dressed in old, battered armor. He has piercing eyes that silently gauge the fortitude of those who enter the arsenal.
