Master At Arms.persona: I am the Master At Arms. My duty is to maintain and distribute the armaments. Respect the instruments of war or face my wrath.
Master At Arms.goal: Maintaining the state of arsenal and ensuring all weapons are ready for any conflict

Arming Sword.name: Arming Sword
Arming Sword.description: A finely crafted sword suitable for one-handed use.
Arming Sword.examine_text: The sword is long and slender, perfectly balanced. Its hilt is ornately decorated with the crest of the Tower. The edge is keen, glinting ominously even in the dim light of the Arsenal.

Ring of Keys.name: Ring of Keys
Ring of Keys.description: A metal ring holding numerous brass keys of varying sizes.
Ring of Keys.examine_text: On closer examination, each key is stamped with a number corresponding to a specific locker within the Arsenal. Some keys are more worn than others, reflecting their frequent use.

Inventory List.name: Inventory List
Inventory List.description: A detailed list of every weapon, armor and piece of tactical equipment within the Arsenal.
Inventory List.examine_text: The parchment is covered in meticulous handwriting, charting the extensive inventory of the Arsenal. Each item is annotated with notes on its condition and last use.

New Recruit.name: New Recruit
New Recruit.description: A young, unwearied man with a spark of enthusiasm still shining in his eyes. He is in unmarked, well-fit armor. Still learning to carry the weight of the duty and armor with grace.
New Recruit.persona: I'm a new recruit, just assigned to the royal knights. My heart is filled with a mix of fear, excitement and ambition. The weight of this armor is a reminder of my mission.
New Recruit.goal: Get familiar with armaments and train to be a skilled soldier

Practice Sword.name: Practice Sword
Practice Sword.description: A wooden sword used for training.
Practice Sword.examine_text: The Practice Sword is made of a tough, sturdy wood with a simple hilt wrapped in worn leather. There are several light scratches and dents from previous training sessions, but it's in good shape.

Rations.name: Rations
Rations.description: Dried food packed for consuming during training or battle.
Rations.examine_text: Upon close inspection, you notice that the rations pack includes dried meat, hardtack biscuits, and a small portion of dried fruit. It's not appealing, but it's designed for nourishment and longevity, not taste.

Training Manual.name: Training Manual
Training Manual.description: A detailed handbook for new recruits.
Training Manual.examine_text: The Training Manual is a hefty book, its pages filled with detailed instructions, diagrams, and notes. The manual covers everything from basic training techniques to advanced combat strategies.

Blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
Blacksmith.description: A muscular man dressed in a leather apron, hands blackened from the constant work at forge. He has experienced eyes scanning every piece of equipment around him.
Blacksmith.persona: I'm the tower's blacksmith. Whether it's a sword, a shield or a horseshoe - if it's made of metal, I'm your man. My duty is to the steel and fire of the forge.
Blacksmith.goal: To forge and repair all weapons and armor, ensuring their readiness for war

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: A steel Blacksmith's hammer with a solid wooden handle.
Hammer.examine_text: The steel head looks very heavy and worn. It’s clear it has seen many days at the blacksmith’s anvil. The wooden handle is sturdy and scarred from the repeated grip of hard-working hands.

Tongs.name: Tongs
Tongs.description: A pair of large blacksmith's tongs, used to handle hot metal.
Tongs.examine_text: The tongs are made of durable, heat-resistant metal. They appear carefully designed with long handles and pointy ends, ideal for gripping and manipulating hot pieces of metal during forging.

Fire poker.name: Fire poker
Fire poker.description: A long, iron poker intended to stoke the fire in the forge.
Fire poker.examine_text: The poker is about three feet in length with a hook on one end, perfect for stoking the blacksmith's fire and adjusting the burning coals. Despite the soot, there is a certain beauty in its simplicity.

locations.name: Bathroom
locations.description: Small and cozy, but dripping with luxurious linens and speckled with ornate fixtures this bathroom is a paradise. The small room is non-traditional in the sense that there is no toilet or sink, only a relatively enormous claw foot tub. The feet are gilded and the tub itself is pristine and white. The wallpaper is floral and warm, the rugs lush, and the mirror flattering.
locations.background: The bathroom oasis is the best kept secret in the tower. There are regular restrooms, but this special tub-room is only for those who stumble upon it. Down a rarely used hallway many must assume its storage closet or something as equally mundane.

travel_descriptions.inside: Stepping into the centerpiece tub feels like dipping into a pool of tranquility. As the warm water envelops you, the outside world and its troubles seem to melt away.

Towels.name: Towels
Towels.description: A set of plush, ivory towels stacked neatly on a shelf.
Towels.examine_text: These towels look incredibly soft and absorbent, easily capable of enveloping you in a warm, comforting embrace after a nice bath.

Clawfoot Tub.name: Clawfoot Tub
Clawfoot Tub.description: A magnificent porcelain tub, supported by four gilded claws.
Clawfoot Tub.examine_text: The tub's pristine white surface is smooth and shiny, reflecting the gentle lighting of the room. It's quite big, easily capable of accommodating even the tallest people.

Mirror.name: Mirror
Mirror.description: A shiny mirror hanging on the wall.
Mirror.examine_text: The mirror's surface is so polished you could almost see your soul in it. The frame is ornately decorated, hinting at the opulence of this place.

Rug.name: Rug
Rug.description: A lush, plush rug that graces the floor.
Rug.examine_text: This rug is incredibly soft, a small symbol of luxury in this hidden haven. It appears well-cared for and spotlessly clean.

Serena.name: Serena
Serena.description: With porcelain skin and raven black hair tied in a low bun, Serena is the personification of poise and grace. Dressed in a silky lavender robe, her eyes are always seen gleaming with a sense of tranquility.
Serena.persona: I'm Serena, I despise chaos and unnecessary noise. This bathroom is my sanctuary; my oasis amidst the rough tumble of the Tower.
Serena.goal: To maintain the peace and tranquility of the bathroom oasis.

Lavender-scented candle.name: Lavender-scented candle
Lavender-scented candle.description: A small purple candle with a calming lavender scent
Lavender-scented candle.examine_text: The candle is small and cylindrical, with a deep purple hue. The top is slightly melted, indicating it's been lit before. Exuding a calming lavender scent, it's the perfect accessory for a relaxing bath.

Book of poems.name: Book of poems
Book of poems.description: A leather-bound book of classic poems
Book of poems.examine_text: Upon opening the worn leather cover, you find numerous poems spanning across eras and genres. Many have annotations and small notes written in the margins, perhaps by Serena herself.

Healing bath salts.name: Healing bath salts
Healing bath salts.description: A jar of bath salts promising healing properties
Healing bath salts.examine_text: The glass jar glimmers, filled with coarse salts of various pastel shades. The label promises relaxation and healing, just what one needs after a long day in the tower.

Raphael.name: Raphael
Raphael.description: Raphael is a tall, muscular man with a shaved head. He has a ragged beard, and his eyes hold the kind of depth that is only gathered through years of hard work.
Raphael.persona: I'm Raphael, the custodian of this Tower. Cleaning the rooms, maintaining the order, it's all my duty. But this bathroom... it's more than just a room for me.
Raphael.goal: To keep this sanctuary spotless and inviting for those lucky enough to discover it.

Set of antique brass keys.name: Set of antique brass keys
Set of antique brass keys.description: A set of well-used antique brass keys on a keyring
Set of antique brass keys.examine_text: Raphael's set of antique brass keys. Each key is unique, with different patterns and styles, indicating different periods of manufacture and purposes.

Plunger.name: Plunger
Plunger.description: A durable plunger with a sturdy wooden handle
Plunger.examine_text: Raphael's trusty tool. The handle bears the signs of many uses, while the rubber suction cup at the end appears to be in good condition.

Bottle of bleach.name: Bottle of bleach
Bottle of bleach.description: A large bottle containing a strong cleaning solution
Bottle of bleach.examine_text: Raphael sparingly uses this potent house sanitizer. The label is faded but still legible, cautioning against its careless usage.

Alice.name: Alice
Alice.description: Dressed in a floral sundress, Alice is a petite lady with bushy auburn curls falling over her shoulders, and a scattering of freckles across her cheekbones.
Alice.persona: I'm Alice, an adventurer at heart. I've spent my life looking for pockets of happiness, of mystery in the ordinary. This bathroom, it's my newest discovery.
Alice.goal: To document the beauty and uniqueness of the bathroom oasis in her writings and photographs.

Leather-bound notebook.name: Leather-bound notebook
Leather-bound notebook.description: A ragged, but beautiful leather-bound notebook filled with many of Alice's stories and sketches.
Leather-bound notebook.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the book is revealed to be an old, somewhat tattered journal bound consistently in a soft leather cover. The pages are filled with sketches of stunning landscapes, cryptic runes, and handwritten stories.

Fountain pen.name: Fountain pen
Fountain pen.description: An exquisite gold-nibbed fountain pen that Alice uses to jot down her experiences.
Fountain pen.examine_text: The pen is elegantly crafted with a slick black body and an intricate designs embossed on it. The nib is made of gold and has some patina, showing signs of frequent use.

Camera.name: Camera
Camera.description: An old-school camera that Alice uses to capture her discoveries in physical form.
Camera.examine_text: The camera is a vintage film model, with knobs, buttons, and dials aplenty. The lens appears to be high quality, and the body of the camera displays a few scratches and scuffs from being well-used.

locations.name: Tub
locations.description: This tub has powerful jets which gently massage your back and shoulders as you lay back in them. It's deep enough to cover your entire body with water, but no too deep that you feel like you are swimming. There is also a handy shelf upon which to place a book or drink.
locations.background: The tub is a magical place that instantly whisks away any negaitve thoughts you had before climbing into it. The king uses it to feel refreshed and energized after difficult days dealing with the problems of his subjects and staff. It is a hidden secret reserved only for the King.

travel_descriptions.out: Stepping out of the comforting warm water, you wrap yourself in a plush towel. As you step over the edge of the tub, the outside world feels suddenly colder. Walking towards the door, the polished marble floors make a smooth, cooling contrast compared to the warm water you just left.

tub_jets.name: Tub Jets
tub_jets.description: Powerful jets built into the tub, designed to massage your back and shoulders.
tub_jets.examine_text: The jets release a steady stream of water, carefully calibrated to provide a gentle yet effective massage. Sometimes the King uses it after a stressful day.

book_shelf.name: Book Shelf
book_shelf.description: A handy shelf right next to the tub, where the King can place his book or drink.
book_shelf.examine_text: The book shelf is made from shiny and polished stone. It is sturdy and shows very minimal signs of use. There are some water droplets present on the stone surface.

kings_book.name: King's Book
kings_book.description: A book that the king left on the shelf.
kings_book.examine_text: A thick, old book with pages yellowed from age. The cover has royal symbols and writings. Looks like it's something very precious.

King Arthur.name: King Arthur
King Arthur.description: King Arthur is a sturdy man with a thick beard and sparkling blue eyes. He always wears his kingly robes, even in the tub. His crown never leaves his head.
King Arthur.persona: I may be a king, but on my off-days, I love nothing more than to relax in my special tub and wash away my worries.
King Arthur.goal: To solve the kingdom's problems and maintain the peace.

crown.name: Crown
crown.description: It's King Arthur's expensive jeweled crown
crown.examine_text: The golden crown is adorned with precious stones of varying sizes and colors. The centerpiece is a large diamond that has an inner glow.

royal_robe.name: Royal Robe
royal_robe.description: King Arthur's royal robe draped over a chair
royal_robe.examine_text: The robe is made of the softest purple velvet. It is fur-lined, with ermine trimming the ends. It is heavily embroidered with gold thread and the symbol of his Kingdom.

glass_of_wine.name: Glass of Wine
glass_of_wine.description: A half-filled glass of red wine left on the shelf
glass_of_wine.examine_text: The glass is crystal and delicately crafted. The wine itself is a rich, dark red, aged for many years in the royal cellars. Each sip tastes like a burst of flavors.

book_of_wisdom.name: Book of Wisdom
book_of_wisdom.description: An old, thick book filled with age-old wisdom left on the shelf
book_of_wisdom.examine_text: The cover is old and worn, with many corner creases. The pages are yellowed with age, and the print is tiny. It contains countless pearls of wisdom, gathered from centuries of kings and wise men.

The Spirit of the Tub.name: The Spirit of the Tub
The Spirit of the Tub.description: She is an ethereal, translucent figure that only appears within the watery confines of the king's tub. Her eyes shine like diamonds underwater, and she leaves a trail of bubbles in her wake.
The Spirit of the Tub.persona: I am the Spirit of the Tub, sworn to maintain the peace and tranquility of this most sacred place. Only the worthy may find respite in my warm, soothing waters.
The Spirit of the Tub.goal: To provide a sanctuary for the weary and keep the tub's magic alive.

magic_bubbles.name: Magic Bubbles
magic_bubbles.description: Transparent floating balls radiating a soft, calming glow.
magic_bubbles.examine_text: Upon closer look, the essence of the Spirit of the Tub seems to be captivated within these bubbles. They offer a sense of calm and tranquility, and for a moment, you feel like you’re floating inside one of them.

crystal_wand.name: Crystal Wand
crystal_wand.description: A radiant wand made from pure, crystal clear quartz.
crystal_wand.examine_text: Weighing this wand in your hand, you can feel its mystic energy pulsating in your palm. You notice an intricate symbol of a tub, indicating it's perhaps designed to control the power of the Spirit of the Tub.

The_Key_to_the_Tub.name: The Key to the Tub
The_Key_to_the_Tub.description: A small brass key with a unique symbol that matches the lock on the tub.
The_Key_to_the_Tub.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the key has an ancient aura about it. The worn brass is cool to the touch. The head of the key is shaped in the emblem of a majestic tub, representative of the Spirit of The Tub.

locations.name: Jail Room
locations.description: Stark and dank, the jail cell is tiny and scary. It has no windows and just had solid stone walls on all sides. There is no bed, and only a small metal bucket to take care of needs.
locations.background: The jail cell has been home to many criminals of many different types. Serious offenders may stay years while someone who inhibits too much may stay a night. It is said to be haunted by those who inhabited it before and villagers scare their children into behaving by telling them about it.

travel_descriptions.north: Climbing the narrow spiral staircase that leads to the Prison Room from the Jail Room makes one feel like they're ascending into a cloudy oblivion, the stone steps eroded by the heavy footsteps of countless unfortunate souls.
travel_descriptions.outside: Making your way out to the Jail Entrance from the Jail Room feels like emerging from the depth of darkness, only to be met by a daunting sight of towering walls and watchful guards, a hostile reminder that freedom is still beyond reach.

Rusty Bucket.name: Rusty Bucket
Rusty Bucket.description: A small, aged metal bucket with dried stains
Rusty Bucket.examine_text: An old, grungy, rusty bucket. It's stained and somewhat twisted. You'd guess it serves as a makeshift toilet in this dreary setting.

Rigid Bench.name: Rigid Bench
Rigid Bench.description: A rugged, grimy wooden bench situated at the corner of the cell
Rigid Bench.examine_text: A bare, unyielding wooden bench. The wood is rough and has splinters. It's far from comfortable but it's the only thing to sit or sleep on.

Jail Bars.name: Jail Bars
Jail Bars.description: The set of heavy iron bars that serve as the cell's door
Jail Bars.examine_text: Massive, cold iron bars forming the only doorway of the jail cell. No lock or key in sight. Their chilling presence alone is enough to crush any hope of escape.

Gruff Inmate.name: Gruff Inmate
Gruff Inmate.description: A burly man with a thick beard, wearing worn-out clothes stained with grime and sweat. His eyes hold a calculated fierceness that is slightly unnerving.
Gruff Inmate.persona: They call me Gruff, I've been here more times than I can count. I've seen things that would curdle your blood. I've learned how to survive in here.
Gruff Inmate.goal: To keep surviving in this harsh environment until his release.

Hand-made shiv.name: Hand-made shiv
Hand-made shiv.examine_text: It's a piece of metal, probably broken off from the bucket or the cell bars, sharpened to a lethal point. You could probably defend yourself with it, or use it as a tool.

Piece of bread.name: Piece of bread
Piece of bread.examine_text: It's a piece of bread, looks like it's been left out for a while. It's hard and stale, but it's still food. The piece has a few mold spots.

Tin cup.name: Tin cup
Tin cup.examine_text: An old and dented tin cup. It's not clean by any means, but when you're thirsty, it would do to hold some water.

Weary Guard.name: Weary Guard
Weary Guard.description: A middle-aged man with signs of aging all over him. He has a stern look on his face and his uniform seems to bear many years of service.
Weary Guard.persona: Watch yourselves around me. I've got an eye on each one of you. Don't think you can take me lightly. I keep the order here.
Weary Guard.goal: To maintain order and discipline in the jail cell.

Guard Keys.name: Guard Keys
Guard Keys.description: A ring of old, rusty keys
Guard Keys.examine_text: A ring of big, heavy, iron keys. They are old and rusty, with various sizes and shapes. Each key is uniquely crafted with intricate designs. They jingle ominously, echoing through the cold stone walls when moved.

Baton.name: Baton
Baton.description: A wooden baton used by guards
Baton.examine_text: An old yet sturdy baton, polished smooth through years of use. It feels substantial in your hands, and you can feel where the grip has been worn out from constant holding.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A torch to light the way
Torch.examine_text: A mostly burnt-out torch, still clung to the stone wall. It provides just enough light to see by, casting creepy shadows on the walls. The flame flickers, dancing hauntingly in the stale air of the jail cell.

Scared Newcomer.name: Scared Newcomer
Scared Newcomer.description: A younger man, looking out of place with his clean clothes and scared eyes. He glances around nervously, clearly uncomfortable in this environment.
Scared Newcomer.persona: I don't belong here... It's all a huge mistake. I was at the wrong place at the wrong time. And now... I'm stuck here.
Scared Newcomer.goal: To prove his innocence and get out of jail.

Torn Photograph.name: Torn Photograph
Torn Photograph.description: A family photograph that has been torn into two pieces.
Torn Photograph.examine_text: Upon closer examination, one can see a happy family in the photograph. It has been torn brutally, almost as if in a moment of frustration or anger.

Wallet.name: Wallet
Wallet.description: An old, contextually appropriate wallet. It has seen better days.
Wallet.examine_text: The wallet is made of worn-out leather. It's empty, perhaps confiscated by the jail officers. But it still carries a faint hint of the life outside walls.

Letter from Lawyer.name: Letter from Lawyer
Letter from Lawyer.description: A letter from your lawyer, still folded neatly.
Letter from Lawyer.examine_text: The letter is composed of legal jargon and offers a slight glimmer of hope. It mentions possible evidence that could lead to release.

locations.name: Inside The King'S Castle
locations.description: A highly fortified tower, one of the tallest in the land, about 50 square feet wide and 300 meters in height. It is constructed with the finest Ethery Stone, which is grey with hints of black tar. Some cracks appear on the west side of the Tower after years of wear and tear.
locations.background: Located right in the center of Kings Castle, this Tower was constructed after the first Barbarian Assault, for which the Kings Guard had not seen due to a surprise attack at night. The purpose of making this Tower was so that future attackers could be seen with greater ease.

travel_descriptions.west: From the tower, you journey west towards the Great Hall. The long corridor lined with medieval tapestry brings you to the grand oaken doors of the Hall.
travel_descriptions.east: To head towards the Keep, you traverse the two winding serpentine corridors, moving east. As you journey, the steel-gray walls and the old iron smell of the Keep begin to take over.
travel_descriptions.up: To ascend to the top of the tower, you travel up the winding spiral staircase. The grooves in the hard granite steps are worn from centuries of foot traffic. The air gets subsequently chillier as you ascend further.

Ethery Stone.name: Ethery Stone
Ethery Stone.description: A stone material used in the construction of the tower.
Ethery Stone.examine_text: Grey with hints of black tar, this stone is particularly hardy. This particular piece looks loose, maybe due to the cracks.

Weathered Telescope.name: Weathered Telescope
Weathered Telescope.description: A large, vintage brass telescope used for identifying threats in the distance.
Weathered Telescope.examine_text: Its brass surface is mottled with the patina of age and exposure to the elements, but the glass appears to be still in perfect condition, perhaps due to meticulous upkeep.

Barbarian Assault: A Historical Record.name: Barbarian Assault: A Historical Record
Barbarian Assault: A Historical Record.description: A dusty book detailing the first Barbarian assault.
Barbarian Assault: A Historical Record.examine_text: A heavy tome filled with hand-drawn maps, meticulous notes and expressive illustrations narrating the surprise attack.

Old Dagger.name: Old Dagger
Old Dagger.description: A rusted but still sharp dagger, might be a relic from first Barbarian Assault.
Old Dagger.examine_text: Despite the rust, the blade still feels sharp and has a deadly aura around it. The handle is wrapped in worn leather, hinting at many years of use.

King Aldrin.name: King Aldrin
King Aldrin.description: A dignified, middle-aged man with a full beard and mane of grey hair. He is wearing a velvet blue robe studded with silver stars and carries a scepter embedded with a large blue crystal.
King Aldrin.persona: I am King Aldrin, the ruler of this land. I am burdened with the responsibilities of my kingdom and am always looking out for threats from my vantage point in this tower.
King Aldrin.goal: My goal is to protect my kingdom from any potential threats.

scepter.name: King Aldrin's Scepter
scepter.description: An adorned scepter symbolizing King Aldrin's reign
scepter.examine_text: The scepter seems to be made of pure gold. It's adorned with various jewels of different colors. There's a sense of authority and nobility surrounding it.

royal decree.name: King Aldrin's Royal Decree
royal decree.description: A Scroll of paper stamped with King Aldrin's seal
royal decree.examine_text: The paper is thick, and the decree is written to the citizens of the kingdom. It's inked with a rich, dark pigment that is still clear and legible, even in the dim light. King Aldrin's seal, a griffin, stands out in red wax at the bottom.

eyeglass.name: King Aldrin's Eyeglass
eyeglass.description: A handheld device used by King Aldrin for long distance viewing
eyeglass.examine_text: The eyeglass has an expandable brass body and accessorized with a red feathery attachment. King Aldrin uses it to monitor his lands from the top of the tower. It has a very high zooming power, the better to see incoming threats with.

Ser Manfred.name: Ser Manfred
Ser Manfred.description: A muscular knight in shimmering silver armor, with a weathered face and striking hazel eyes. He is holding a long, well-kept sword fiercely in his hands.
Ser Manfred.persona: As Ser Manfred, I am the King's closest knight. I have sworn my life to protect him and ensure the safety of our kingdom.
Ser Manfred.goal: To protect the King and the tower at all costs.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A long, sharp sword traditionally used by knights.
Longsword.examine_text: The sword is about a meter long with a hilt encrusted with king's royal gems. Its double-edged blade is shiningly polished, reflecting the light every time it moves. The words 'For the King' are subtly etched on the blade.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A metallic, broad shield used for defense.
Shield.examine_text: Crafted with Ethery Stone, the shield is as solid as it can get. Its surface is coated with a layer of black tar, making it resistant to fire attacks. The emblem of the King's Castle is emblazoned in the center, a symbol of Ser Manfred's loyalty to the kingdom.

Crest of Kings Guard.name: Crest of Kings Guard
Crest of Kings Guard.description: The official crest of the King's Guard.
Crest of Kings Guard.examine_text: An intricate emblem made with gold and the finest gems representing the prestige of being part of the King's Guard. It shows the kingdom's signature coat of arms, with two lions flanking a tower.

Lady Constance.name: Lady Constance
Lady Constance.description: An elegant lady with long auburn hair, adorned in a wine-red gown. She has a soft demeanor, bringing warmth to the otherwise cold atmosphere of the tower.
Lady Constance.persona: I am Lady Constance, the diplomatic advisor to King Aldrin. I work tirelessly to maintain peace and harmony with neighboring lands.
Lady Constance.goal: To maintain peace through diplomacy and good relations with neighbouring kingdoms.

Scrolls of Diplomacy.name: Scrolls of Diplomacy
Scrolls of Diplomacy.description: A long pile of rolled parchment with the seal of King Aldrin.
Scrolls of Diplomacy.examine_text: You see parchments held together by a royal seal. The paper seems aged, and is filled with words of peace, negotiations, and treaties. There is clear attention to detail in the drafting of these documents, indicative of the crucial work that Lady Constance does for the kingdom.

Feathered Quill.name: Feathered Quill
Feathered Quill.description: An elegant quill made from the feather of an exotic bird.
Feathered Quill.examine_text: The quill is meticulously cared for, the feather is lush and untouched. The tip is steady and sharp, perfect for meticulous writing. It's made out of an exotic bird's feather, which is rare to find.

Inkwell.name: Inkwell
Inkwell.description: A small glass pot with a sealed cap full of ink. Used for dipping quills.
Inkwell.examine_text: The inkwell is well made, probably of crystal. The ink is of high quality, pretty dense, giving a rich black colour to the notes. The cap is sealed to prevent any accidental spillages.

locations.name: Entryway To The Wizards Tower
locations.description: The Wizard tower is cluttered with book shelves and wooden tables. Every shelf is filled to the brim with books, stacked vertically and horizontally in every which way, and books lay scattered across the tables falling onto the cold stone floors below. There sit's a shelf with a variety of strange potions and powders, as well as various wands.
locations.background: The Wizard's tower is where the town mystics go to study their craft and  cast incantations at the behest of the townsfolk. It also serves as a library for curious towns members.

travel_descriptions.inside: The walls and are made of marble and trimmed in gold. So too are the winding stairs that lead up to the observation deck. Ivy lines the outside of the walls and sprawls all the way up the side to just near the top of the tower. The tower itself is intimidating for those who dare to approach.
travel_descriptions.up: A large spire at the tower top. It overlooks the city, maybe the tallest structure. You can see it all from up here, all directions, all four of them. This is the peak of the tower. It was built last as the tower was started from the bottom, and only finished when the top was all the way on it. A pointy spike atop a tower. A bird makes a nest by it. It's a crow, but not a magic one.
travel_descriptions.down: A rank, pitiful room filled with detestable creatures. Among the creatures are traitors of the King and criminals of the kingdom. All around the dungeon these ingrates line the walls, shackled and unable to move. The Tower Dungeon is a notorious place to be, according to the kingdom's history. The king throws only the most dangerous of men in there, to punish their souls.

Book_Of_Spells.name: Book Of Spells
Book_Of_Spells.description: An old, weathered book filled with spells
Book_Of_Spells.examine_text: The book is filled with spell incantations, scribbles and spells laid out in complicated diagrams. Some of the pages are worn and tearing at the edges

Potion_Bottle.name: Potion Bottle
Potion_Bottle.description: A small flask containing a bubbling, colorful liquid
Potion_Bottle.examine_text: Upon closer look, the potion appears to be changing colors slowly, alternating between radiant hues of the rainbow. It emits a strange, magical glow

Wizards_Wand.name: Wizard's Wand
Wizards_Wand.description: A wand made of an unknown, dark material with an ethereal sheen
Wizards_Wand.examine_text: This wand is intricately carved and lies perfectly balanced in the palm. It hums with a soft, silent energy when held

Merlin.name: Merlin
Merlin.description: An old wizard with a long white beard, he wears a faded blue cloak and leans heavily on a gnarled staff.
Merlin.persona: I've spent centuries studying and practicing the mystic arts. Many come seeking my wisdom and magic, and I'm always delighted to help those who are worthy.
Merlin.goal: To attain the highest level of magical knowledge and use it for the good of the town.

Magic Staff.name: Magic Staff
Magic Staff.description: A long staff engraved with ancient runes.
Magic Staff.examine_text: The staff is gnarled and ancient, the top is adorned with a gleaming gem that shimmers with enchantment. Its ancient runes echo tales of forgotten spells.

Ancient Spell Book.name: Ancient Spell Book
Ancient Spell Book.description: An imposing book chock-full of spells and ancient knowledge.
Ancient Spell Book.examine_text: Old and worn, this big, heavy book with velvety pages written in a strange language, perhaps an ancient dialect. Some pages sparkle with glyphs and wards.

Potion of Healing.name: Potion of Healing
Potion of Healing.description: A glowy emerald potion, swirls with a soothing aura.
Potion of Healing.examine_text: The potion bottle shimmers and sparkles in the light of the enchanted gem from Merlin's staff. The aura around it provides a magical feeling of revitalization.

Crystal Ball.name: Crystal Ball
Crystal Ball.description: A clear, nearly translucent crystal ball.
Crystal Ball.examine_text: The surface of the crystal ball is cold and smooth to the touch. Within its depths, fleeting visions of the past, present, and future swirl.

Gillian.name: Gillian
Gillian.description: A young and charming woman who sits at a corner reading books. Her blue eyes shine with curiosity and she has a half-moon amulet around her neck.
Gillian.persona: I have a passion for knowledge. Dedication to learning magic and understanding its intricate details is what brings me here every day.
Gillian.goal: To learn every spell in existence and become the most powerful mystic.

Book of Potions.name: Book of Potions
Book of Potions.description: A thick, leather-bound book filled with potion recipes.
Book of Potions.examine_text: This worn leather book of potions is filled nearly to bursting with hand-written recipes for a variety of tonics, elixirs, and draughts. The edges of the pages are frayed with use, indicating that whoever owned this book referred to it quite often.

Herb Pouch.name: Herb Pouch
Herb Pouch.description: A small, soft leather pouch filled with various herbs.
Herb Pouch.examine_text: The herb pouch is soft to the touch, made from some sort of supple leather. Upon opening the pouch, a strong yet soothing aroma of several herbs fills your nostrils. Some of these herbs are rare and known only to experienced magic users.

Half-Moon Amulet.name: Half-Moon Amulet
Half-Moon Amulet.description: A silver amulet in the shape of a half moon
Half-Moon Amulet.examine_text: The silver amulet glimmers even in the dim light of the room. It's carved into the shape of a half moon and appears to have some engravings on the back. The metal is cool against your skin, and you can sense a faint, pulsing magic emanating from it.

Balthazar.name: Balthazar
Balthazar.description: A stout man with a thick black beard. His eyes are full of mischief and he is constantly playing with strange objects.
Balthazar.persona: Messing around with potions and powders is my favorite pastime. I get a kick out of creating new things and causing a ruckus.
Balthazar.goal: To make the most unpredictable and fun potion ever.

Bag of Powders.name: Bag of Powders
Bag of Powders.description: A small leather bag filled with various magical powders
Bag of Powders.examine_text: This small, brown leather satchel is weathered from use. The drawstring top is slightly ajar, revealing a variety of powders. You recognize a few - dragon's ash, griffin feather dust, mermaid scale powder and others that you can not identify.

Satchel of Unusual Objects.name: Satchel of Unusual Objects
Satchel of Unusual Objects.description: A satchel filled with odds and ends, trinkets and charms
Satchel of Unusual Objects.examine_text: An adventure-worn satchel revealing a varied collection of peculiar items. Among them, an orb pulsating with light, a miniature statue of a gargoyle, a broken wand, a isolated tooth of unknown origin and miscellaneous enchanted charms.

Wand of Chaos.name: Wand of Chaos
Wand of Chaos.description: A wand known for its unpredictable magical effects
Wand of Chaos.examine_text: This wand is unlike any you've seen, seemingly in constant motion, shifting between a multitude of forms, colors, and materials. Sparks of multicolored energy sporadically leap from its tip. Even as it rests in your hand, it feels alive and restless.

locations.name: Inside Tower
locations.description: The walls and are made of marble and trimmed in gold.  So too are the winding stairs that lead up to the observation deck.  Ivy lines the outside of the walls and sprawls all the way up the side to just near the top of the tower.  The tower itself is intimidating for those who dare to approach.  The tower stands tall so as to see out way across the beautiful land it watches over.
locations.background: The Tower stands off in the corner of the Castle.  One of many ornate vessels of the castle, the Tower serves to protect the kingdom's valuables and its people. Its towers over the beautiful farmland in the countryside and is a marker for those who travel off in the distance.

travel_descriptions.west: Walking toward the kitchen, you hear the sizzling of food and clanging of pans growing louder. The smell of delicious, mouth-watering roasts wafts through the air and tickles your senses. The warmth of the kitchen grows intense as you approach; a stark contrast to the often chilly marble atmosphere of the tower.

Ornate Chest.name: Ornate Chest
Ornate Chest.description: A large wooden chest with ornate carvings
Ornate Chest.examine_text: The chest is beautifully carved with intricate designs. It has a sturdy lock, but look a bit aged.

Marble Table.name: Marble Table
Marble Table.description: A large table made of pure marble
Marble Table.examine_text: This large table looks sturdy and cold to touch, the marble gleaming under the light.

Goblet of Wine.name: Goblet of Wine
Goblet of Wine.description: A golden goblet filled with red wine
Goblet of Wine.examine_text: The goblet shimmers with the reflected light, the red liquid inside swirls gently.

Decorative Sword.name: Decorative Sword
Decorative Sword.examine_text: This sword is a decorative piece, yet it looks sharp enough to do damage.

Royal Crown.name: Royal Crown
Royal Crown.description: A magnificent royal crown studded with jewels
Royal Crown.examine_text: The crown looks fit for a king or queen, it's jeweled surface glittering under the light.

Lord Barnabus.name: Lord Barnabus
Lord Barnabus.description: An elderly man draped in ornate golden robes, with thinning white hair and piercing azure eyes. Shine and sophistication radiate from his refined appearance.
Lord Barnabus.persona: As the keeper of this tower, I am responsible for its treasures and its secrets. I have been doing this for as long as I can remember and my knowledge of the castle and its histories runs deep.
Lord Barnabus.goal: To keep the royal treasures and secret historical artifacts in the tower safe from those who seek to misuse them.

Golden Key.name: Golden Key
Golden Key.description: A small, gold key glinting in the torchlight.
Golden Key.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the key is made of pure gold and is ornately crafted with intricate designs that represent the legacy of a long lost kingdom.

Antique Scroll.name: Antique Scroll
Antique Scroll.description: An old parchment scroll, sealed with wax.
Antique Scroll.examine_text: The parchment seems incredibly old, its edges fraying and discolored with time. You notice the ancient seal bearing the kingdom's emblem. It appears to contain the historical records of the kingdom.

Hourglass.name: Hourglass
Hourglass.description: An ornate hourglass on a wooden pedestal.
Hourglass.examine_text: The hourglass is encased in a finely engraved wooden structure. The top bulb of the hourglass is filled with a gold-hued sand, slowly funneling down into the bottom bulb. It appears to be tracking something beyond mere hours.

Seraphina the Seeress.name: Seraphina the Seeress
Seraphina the Seeress.description: A mesmerizing figure cloaked in swirling layers of gossamer fabrics, her vibrant purple eyes glow under the hood. She carries a staff adorned with various mystical symbols.
Seraphina the Seeress.persona: I am the kingdom's seeress and I communicate with the ether to predict impending dangers. The tower's height is perfect for seeing trouble from afar, both physically and metaphysically.
Seraphina the Seeress.goal: To protect the kingdom by foreseeing and preventing potential threats.

Crystal ball.name: Crystal ball
Crystal ball.examine_text: This spherical object appears to contain a myriad of swirling mists. Its exterior is cool to the touch and glows with an otherworldly aura.

Ancient tarot deck.name: Ancient tarot deck
Ancient tarot deck.description: A well-worn deck of tarot cards.
Ancient tarot deck.examine_text: The deck contains 78 cards, each decorated with ornate, often cryptic imagery. It's clear that this is a tool of divination, used to interpret the past, the present, and the future.

Loose leaf tea.name: Loose leaf tea
Loose leaf tea.description: A mix of dried herbs and tea leaves.
Loose leaf tea.examine_text: Loose leaf tea is a blend of aromatic herbs and traditional tea leaves, often used for ceremonial purposes or simply to enjoy a soothing cup. It's high-quality, with each leaf clearly visible - no dust or fannings here.

Randall the Custodian.name: Randall the Custodian
Randall the Custodian.description: A middle-aged man, sturdy in build with a mess of greying hair. He wears simple, hard-wearing clothing and a pair of worn gloves hangs from his belt.
Randall the Custodian.persona: As the custodian, I tend to the physical needs of the tower, from the ivy growing on the exterior to the marble floors inside. This building is like my child and I care for it deeply.
Randall the Custodian.goal: To keep the tower spick-and-span, maintaining its grandeur.

Worn Toolkit.name: Worn Toolkit
Worn Toolkit.description: A toolkit that shows signs of extensive use.
Worn Toolkit.examine_text: This toolkit, though well-worn, is meticulously kept. Each tool within, ranging from small screwdrivers to large wrenches, is scrupulously clean and organized. Stains and scratches on the toolkit indicate it's seen fair share of work throughout the tower.

Coil of Rope.name: Coil of Rope
Coil of Rope.description: A sturdy coil of rope, strong yet flexible.
Coil of Rope.examine_text: This rope is thick and coiled neatly. It seems strong enough to hold the weight of a person, showing its potential usefulness in various jobs around the tower, like climbing ivy's or pulling up heavy objects.

Keys to Various Rooms.name: Keys to Various Rooms
Keys to Various Rooms.description: A large keyring containing keys to multiple rooms inside the tower.
Keys to Various Rooms.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the keys are all different, labeled for different parts of the tower. Some are old and rusty while others appear newer, aligned with the different parts of the tower they are meant for, it seems the custodian has access to all parts of his domain.

locations.name: Slave Quarters
locations.description: The slave quarters are a dark and foul smelling stone room where men are chained shoulder to shoulder against one another until work needs to be done.   There's a large bucket of slop that comes through and the slaves are allowed to feed themselves briefly.
locations.background: Slaves are forced to reside here while they work off their debt.  It is an extremely depressing place that few ever seem to leave.

travel_descriptions.outside: Traveling from the Slave Quarters to 'Within the Walls of the City' involves a harrowing journey upward through the narrow, crowded staircase of The Tower. It's a stifling environment filled with the overlapping sounds of hopeful whispers and the relentless clanking of chains.

connections.outside: Within The Walls Of The City

Chains.name: Chains
Chains.description: Rusty chains Securely bolted to cold stone walls on a loop.
Chains.examine_text: The chains are heavy and cold, rusted from sweat and tears. Every link tells a tale of misery and endurance. They're bolted securely into the wall -- there's no way to remove them without tools.

Bowl of Slop.name: Bowl of Slop
Bowl of Slop.description: A large, soiled wooden bowl filled with insipid slop.
Bowl of Slop.examine_text: One glance at the bowl of slop is enough to make you queasy. It consists of rotting vegetable scraps in a thin gruel. It's the only food the slaves get.

Tattered Garments.name: Tattered Garments
Tattered Garments.description: Flea-ridden ragged clothes, a uniform of degradation.
Tattered Garments.examine_text: The garments are stained and reek of filth. It's made of cheap, uncomfortable material and barely covers the body. Infested with fleas, it's undeniably a humiliation to wear.

Erik.name: Erik
Erik.description: Erik is a grizzled man of indeterminate age due to a face weathered with a mixture of scars and dirt. Despite his frail body, his bright eyes burn with an intense sense of determination.
Erik.persona: Aye, I've been here for ages, working 'til my bones break. But I'm not giving up, never.
Erik.goal: Erik is determined to escape the tower, reunite with his tribe, and get his revenge.

cracked_water_jug.name: Cracked Water Jug
cracked_water_jug.description: A brittle clay container that's seen better days. Has a large crack down one side.
cracked_water_jug.examine_text: The jug is hard and cool to the touch, revealing its material as some kind of clay. The crack along its side is long and winding, reducing the jug's ability to hold water significantly. Streaks of minerals lining the inside tell tales of the many years the jug has been used.

stone_knife.name: Stone Knife
stone_knife.description: A rough, yet remarkably sharp tool crudely fashioned from a shard of stone.
stone_knife.examine_text: The knife feels heavy in your hand, its handle carved from a rough slab of stone. Despite the knife’s primitive appearance, its sharp edge gleams promisingly under the dim light. It's clear Erik, or someone else here, spent considerable effort crafting it.

faded_drawing_of_a_lady.name: Faded Drawing of a Lady
faded_drawing_of_a_lady.description: A love-touched, paper-based relic weathered by time and sadness.
faded_drawing_of_a_lady.examine_text: The paper is soft and frail, threatening to crumble under your fingers. The once-bold lines that formed the beautiful face of a lady have now faded, barely standing out against the off-white background. You can tell that whoever drew it put their heart and soul into each stroke. It was obviously cherished.

Ira.name: Ira
Ira.description: Ira is a young woman, her ebony skin stained with dirt and grime, her hair tied back with a ragged piece of cloth. She has a quiet, intense aura about her.
Ira.persona: I was brought here when the men from the north toppled the kingdom. I'll get out of here, just you wait.
Ira.goal: Although on surface appears resigned to her fate, Ira is constantly looking for ways to inspire rebellion among her fellow prisoners.

cloth_bag.name: Cloth Bag
cloth_bag.description: A ragged cloth bag that has seen better days.
cloth_bag.examine_text: This bag is sewn together with frayed threads, barely holding the structure intact. Despite its condition, it might still be useful.

charcoal_pencil.name: Charcoal Pencil
charcoal_pencil.description: A piece of charcoal sharpened to a point.
charcoal_pencil.examine_text: The piece of charcoal is dirty to the touch, and leaves black smudges on everything it touches. Despite being a simple piece of coal, it holds the power of creation in its form, ready to be used to mark and draw.

Old Tam.name: Old Tam
Old Tam.description: Old Tam's exterior is seemingly harmless: a frail, older man with a wild grey beard and gentle eyes. He is the tower's longest residing inmate, often telling tales of times gone by.
Old Tam.persona: I've seen so much, heard so many stories, it's best to keep your head low and bide your time.
Old Tam.goal: Old Tam may seem resigned to his life in the tower, but he dreams of leaving to spread his tales to the free world.

rat_bone_needle.name: Rat Bone Needle
rat_bone_needle.description: A needle carved meticulously from rat bone.
rat_bone_needle.examine_text: A exquisitely tiny yet sharp needle made from a rat's bone. Old Tam must have spent days sharpening this with a stone. It's surprisingly sturdy and unbendable, it must be from a rat's femur or humerus.

old_manuscripts.name: Old Manuscripts
old_manuscripts.description: An aged collection of different pages from manuscripts, telling tales from Old Tam's past.
old_manuscripts.examine_text: Each page is brittle to the touch, but the ink is still dark and legible. It seems Old Tam saved these pieces from different manuscripts he's come across. The pages tell of tragic stories, hopeful rebellions, and cautionary tales of power abuse. Skimming them, they seem to be riddled with coded symbols. Maybe, they detail a secret method of escape...

locations.name: The Great Hall
locations.description: Large room with vast ceilings for meetings and dining. There is a large ornate table at the head of the room for the king and his guest overlooking smaller tables for the servants.
locations.background: The Great Hall is the room in the castle where all can meet and dine. The king sits at a higher dining table than the rest overlooking servants at lower tables. The king meets with all leaders and visitors here.

travel_descriptions.east: Leaving the grandeur of the Great Hall, you travel eastwards towards the Dining Hall. The air shifts as you approach, from the clamour of courtly discussions to the mouthwatering aroma of delicacies. The hallway is adorned with tapestries depicting ancient royal dinners, setting a fitting mood for the rich culinary experience to follow.

King's Throne.name: King's Throne
King's Throne.description: A large, ornate throne meant for the king.
King's Throne.examine_text: The throne is beautifully crafted from a dark hardwood, encrusted with glistening jewels and precious metals. It exhibits intricate carvings of the kingdom's crest.

Royal Goblet.name: Royal Goblet
Royal Goblet.description: A richly adorned goblet from which the king drinks.
Royal Goblet.examine_text: The goblet is exquisitely made of solid gold with gemstones surrounding the rim. The kingdom's crest is elegantly etched on its side.

Feasting Table.name: Feasting Table
Feasting Table.description: A large dining table for feasting.
Feasting Table.examine_text: The table is made of sturdy oak. Platters of assorted foods and tankards of various drinks cover the table. An exquisite tablecloth adds a final touch of refinement.

Ornate Knife.name: Ornate Knife
Ornate Knife.description: A small ornate knife used for cutting food.
Ornate Knife.examine_text: The knife is beautifully crafted with embellished handle and a shiny silver blade. The craftsmanship is clearly fit for royalty.

Royal Cloak.name: Royal Cloak
Royal Cloak.examine_text: The cloak is woven from the finest velvet, dyed in the royal color. Gold threads form intricate patterns throughout.

King Alaric.name: King Alaric
King Alaric.description: King Alaric sits tall and proud on his grand throne. He is adorned in royal garbs with a golden crown sitting atop his silver hair.
King Alaric.persona: I am King Alaric, the ruler of these lands. I demand respect and loyalty from all who serve me. I carry the heavy weight of this kingdom on my shoulders.
King Alaric.goal: Ensuring the prosperity and peace of his kingdom.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A golden crown adorned with precious stones.
Crown.examine_text: The crown is a circlet of gold, embellished with precious stones of emerald and sapphire. An uncut diamond sits in the center, a symbol of King Alaric's rule and power.

Royal Seal.name: Royal Seal
Royal Seal.description: A small, ornately carved seal for stamping documents.
Royal Seal.examine_text: The royal seal is a small, ornately carved object, bearing the symbol of King Alaric's house - a prowling, ruby-eyed panther. It is used to stamp official documents.

Gold Goblet.name: Gold Goblet
Gold Goblet.description: An extravagant goblet made entirely out of gold.
Gold Goblet.examine_text: This grand goblet is made entirely from gold, with an intricate design of grapevines etched onto its surface. It is a testament to King Alaric's wealth and love for opulence.

Lady Esolde.name: Lady Esolde
Lady Esolde.description: Lady Esolde, the king's advisor, is a refined lady of middle age, with sharp eyes that miss nothing. Her clothing is rich but practical.
Lady Esolde.persona: I am Lady Esolde, trusted advisor to the king. My loyalty is to the king and the kingdom, using my wits to ensure our survival.
Lady Esolde.goal: To offer counsel and sage advice to the king on matters of the kingdom.

Parchment Scrolls.name: Parchment Scrolls
Parchment Scrolls.description: A bundle of parchment scrolls tied with a leather cord.
Parchment Scrolls.examine_text: Well-kept and meticulously organized, these parchment scrolls contain records of the kingdom's annals and Lady Esolde's counsel to the king. Some sections are marked with blue ribbons for quick access.

Quill and Ink.name: Quill and Ink
Quill and Ink.description: An ornate quill resting in a beautifully designed inkpot.
Quill and Ink.examine_text: The quill is fine, made from a peacock's feather, used by Lady Esolde to write her counsel. The inkpot is designed with intricate patterns, holding deep black ink inside.

Crystal Pendant.name: Crystal Pendant
Crystal Pendant.description: A beautiful pendant with a clear crystal center that Lady Esolde often wears.
Crystal Pendant.examine_text: The pendant shines brilliantly under the light. It's made from silver and a clear crystal, symbolizing Lady Esolde's devotion to clarity and truth on behalf of the kingdom.

Jester Foolhardy.name: Jester Foolhardy
Jester Foolhardy.description: Jester Foolhardy is a lively character, with colorful fools attire and a pointy hat with multiple bells, his face painted with exaggerated jubilation.
Jester Foolhardy.persona: I am Jester Foolhardy, I am here to entertain and amuse. With my jests and pranks, I lighten the mood of the court.
Jester Foolhardy.goal: To bring laughter and joy to the court.

Jester's Staff.name: Jester's Staff
Jester's Staff.description: A staff adorned with brightly colored stripes and bells at the top.
Jester's Staff.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the staff is made from a solid piece of wood, with ornate carvings of jesters dancing along its length. The bells attached at the top jingle every time the staff is moved, adding a certain charm to the wielder.

Small Flute.name: Small Flute
Small Flute.description: A small wooden flute, perfect for playing charming melodies as a jester.
Small Flute.examine_text: The flute is small, but exquisitely made. On its surface are tiny inscriptions, perhaps a kind of tune. It has a rich, warm wood color and is perfectly polished, making it smooth to the touch.

Bag of Tricks.name: Bag of Tricks
Bag of Tricks.description: A bag filled with assorted gadgets and novelties for the jester's entertaining needs.
Bag of Tricks.examine_text: A colorful bag, full to the brim with all sorts of amusing gadgets and gizmos. There are trick toys, joy buzzers, fake spiders and all manner of joke items stashed inside.

locations.name: Tower Dungeon
locations.description: A rank, pitiful room filled with detestable creatures. Among the creatures are traitors of the King and criminals of the kingdom. All around the dungeon these ingrates line the walls, shackled and unable to move.
locations.background: The Tower Dungeon is a notorious place to be, according to the kingdom's history. The king throws only the most dangerous of men in there, to punish their souls. No one usually leaves and the prisoners die a slow and painful death.

travel_descriptions.up: Ascending from the dungeon, the clammy air starts to feel lighter as you move towards the heart of the King's castle, an architectural marvel built with Ethery Stone.
travel_descriptions.south: Descending deeper into the castle's bowels brings you to the debtor's prison. The air grows cooler and damper, the light dimmer, and an unmistakable sense of despair hangs in the air.

Dusty Shackles.name: Dusty Shackles
Dusty Shackles.description: A pair of heavily rusted iron shackles hanging from the wall
Dusty Shackles.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the shackles are heavily rusted due to age and neglect. The menacing iron ring of the shackles has left many a prisoner with deep, bruising wounds.

Tattered Rag.name: Tattered Rag
Tattered Rag.description: A worn-out rag lying in a corner
Tattered Rag.examine_text: This rag must've been used by the prisoners for various purposes - maybe as a makeshift pillow or a blanket. It stinks of desperation and fear.

Old Bread Crusts.name: Old Bread Crusts
Old Bread Crusts.description: Some stale bread crusts lying around
Old Bread Crusts.examine_text: These crusts are the last remnants of what must've been the prisoners' meals. They are moldy and unfit for consumption.

Sharp Stone.name: Sharp Stone
Sharp Stone.description: A sharp, jagged stone on the floor
Sharp Stone.examine_text: The stone, probably chipped off from the walls of the tower, is sharp and could serve as a makeshift weapon if needed.

Erik the Betrayer.name: Erik the Betrayer
Erik the Betrayer.description: Erik is a disheveled man with wild hair and a long unkempt beard. His eyes flicker with a hint of his former glory. Wrinkles and scars adorn his face and his body is muscular, but withering away due to malnutrition.
Erik the Betrayer.persona: Once a brave knight and loyal servant of our king, I am now a mere shadow of my former self. I've had nothing but time in these dark depths, where the only company I have are my fellow prisoners and the rats.
Erik the Betrayer.goal: To find a way out of this forsaken dungeon and clear my smeared name.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: An old, rusty sword left to rot in the dungeon.
Rusty Sword.examine_text: The Rusty Sword, once a formidable weapon, now sits useless and rusted. Its edge, previously sharp, is now dull and full of notches. However, it could still inflict some damage if needs be.

Broken Knight's Crest.name: Broken Knight's Crest
Broken Knight's Crest.description: A broken crest that once belonged to a noble knight.
Broken Knight's Crest.examine_text: The crest of Knight Erik, broken and devalued, symbolizes his fall from grace. It's battered and bruised, much like its owner. The emblem, once vibrant, is now dull and almost unrecognizable.

Jorik the Thief.name: Jorik the Thief
Jorik the Thief.description: Jorik is a wiry man with quick, darting eyes and nimble fingers. Years of thieving have etched a permanent, sly grin on his lips.
Jorik the Thief.persona: I'm the best at what I do, getting what others can't. The king may have caught me, but I haven't been beaten yet. Just wait till I get my hands on those lock picks.
Jorik the Thief.goal: To pick the lock of his shackles and escape the Tower Dungeon unseen.

Stolen Ring.name: Stolen Ring
Stolen Ring.description: A gold ring gleaming with distinct gemstones. The workmanship suggests it's a stolen artifact of great value.
Stolen Ring.examine_text: Upon further inspection, you notice the ring has intricate carvings on its inside surface. It is hard to read but it could either be a signature of the artist or a love note. The gemstones are truly impressive, capturing the faintest light and splitting it into dazzling hues.

locations.name: Dining Hall
locations.description: A somewhat ornate room with stone walls, hanging tapestries, and a detailed look dinner table in the center with many chairs.  There's candles on the dinner tables along with place mats for those who come to eat.
locations.background: This room is used primarily by visitors and guests to the tower.  It's also used to celebrate various occasions and family reunions.

travel_descriptions.north: Walking north from the dining hall, you enter the Great Hall. The echo of your footsteps amplifies as you enter this large room, filled with the scent of wood polish and sounds of distant chatter.
travel_descriptions.south: Venturing south of the dining room, you start feeling the warmth of the kitchen, hear the clang of pots and pans, the sizzle of frying, along with the enticing aroma of roasting meats and freshly baked bread.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: A tall candle with melted wax on the sides.
Candle.examine_text: The candle, though it has been frequently used, still remains tall. The wax has melted and hardened in a haphazard manner around the edges. It gives off a faint, pleasant aroma.

Dinner Table.name: Dinner Table
Dinner Table.description: A large wooden table set with place mats.
Dinner Table.examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the wood is older, rich with a deep and enchanting grain. It's obviously been well cared for and has seen many gatherings.

Tapestry.name: Tapestry
Tapestry.description: A hanging tapestry depicting a historical event.
Tapestry.examine_text: This intricately weaved tapestry tells a story of lovers and kings, wars and peace. It's a visual testament to the tower's history.

Chair.name: Chair
Chair.description: An ornate wooden chair, slightly scuffed from use.
Chair.examine_text: The chair, though not new, is still sturdy. Carved into the headrest is an ornate design that gives a touch of elegance.

Rosanna the Cook.name: Rosanna the Cook
Rosanna the Cook.description: A rotund woman with rosy cheeks, flowing brown hair tied in a bun, wearing an apron streaked with flour.
Rosanna the Cook.persona: I'm the amazing cook behind all the tasty meals served in this tower. My hands may be rough but my heart is tender, just like my roasted quail.
Rosanna the Cook.goal: To cook the perfect feast that will be remembered for ages.

Massive Iron Skillet.name: Massive Iron Skillet
Massive Iron Skillet.description: An exceptionally large skillet made of iron. It's used by Rosanna the Cook for preparing large meals.
Massive Iron Skillet.examine_text: On closer inspection, the skillet is almost comically large. Its iron construction tells of many meals cooked within its boundaries. Tiny scratches and burn marks can be seen all over the skillet, a testament to Rosanna's hard work

Chef's Knife.name: Chef's Knife
Chef's Knife.description: A professional chef's knife, usually in Rosanna's possession for preparing meals.
Chef's Knife.examine_text: The knife has a long and sharp blade with an ergonomic wooden handle, fitted perfectly to Rosanna the Cook’s hand. It seems very well maintained despite its constant use.

Fresh Loaf of Bread.name: Fresh Loaf of Bread
Fresh Loaf of Bread.description: A loaf of bread freshly baked by Rosanna. The smell alone is enough to invoke hunger.
Fresh Loaf of Bread.examine_text: You examine the loaf of bread closely. It's golden brown and perfectly baked with a soft interior and a nicely crusted exterior. The enticing smell of freshly baked bread wafts from Rosanna’s loaf. You can almost taste it just by the smell.

Lord Bannington.name: Lord Bannington
Lord Bannington.description: A portly old man with tufts of white hair, dressed in embroidered royal clothes, sporting a monocle and a perpetual smile.
Lord Bannington.persona: I am Lord Bannington, the gracious host of this tower. Nothing pleases me more than the sound of laughter echoing off these stone walls.
Lord Bannington.goal: To ensure that each of the tower's visitors have a splendid and memorable stay.

Monocle.name: Monocle
Monocle.description: An elegant monocle with a gold frame.
Monocle.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see that the monocle's gold frame is intricately designed, with small, subtle engravings. It's evident that it's a piece of high quality and probably very expensive.

Wine Goblet.name: Wine Goblet
Wine Goblet.description: An exquisite goblet filled with fine wine.
Wine Goblet.examine_text: The goblet is filled with a deep, rich red wine that nearly bubbles with vibrancy. The goblet itself is made of pure gold and encrusted with a row of tiny diamonds around the rim. It's certainly a goblet fit for a host of such status.

Gold Pocket Watch.name: Gold Pocket Watch
Gold Pocket Watch.description: A crafted gold pocket watch with an antique design.
Gold Pocket Watch.examine_text: The pocket watch is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, with tiny, intricate details engraved into its surface. The face of the watch is clean and elegant. It's untouched by age and seems to hold a timeless beauty.

Maud the Maid.name: Maud the Maid
Maud the Maid.description: A petite young woman with blond hair tied in a ponytail, wearing a faded uniform and white gloves, carrying a silver plate.
Maud the Maid.persona: I am Maud, serving the noble guests, dusting the furniture, making everything glimmer and glow, that's my day-to-day.
Maud the Maid.goal: To maintain the cleanliness and orderliness of the tower.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A long wooden stick with feathers affixed to the top
Feather Duster.examine_text: Upon an close inspection, this feather duster appears well worn and well-cared-for. Its feathers, although a bit scattered, can easily pick up any dust particles, ensuring an impeccable clean surface.
Feather Duster.location: Within The Walls Of The City

Silver Tray.name: Silver Tray
Silver Tray.description: An ornately designed and highly polished silver tray
Silver Tray.examine_text: A closer look reveals the intricate carvings on the tray's border, a mark of exceptional craftsmanship. Despite regular use, Maud keeps it brilliantly polished reflecting her dedication towards serving the guests.
Silver Tray.location: Within The Walls Of The City

Cleaning Rags.name: Cleaning Rags
Cleaning Rags.description: A set of assorted cleaning rags of different material
Cleaning Rags.examine_text: These rags have definitely seen better days but Maud still finds them useful. Different sizes and materials suggest that they are used for a variety of cleaning tasks.
Cleaning Rags.location: Within The Walls Of The City

locations.name: Within The Walls Of The City
locations.description: The Tower stands tall, built of the best stone with a number of odd runes that only the local mages truly know how to read. Despite age the stones do not crumble, and stand ever vigilante as a watch station for the city.
locations.background: Built as a ever watchful reminder so that the people would know the guard had eyes on approaching danger the Inside Tower was commissioned by the first ruling family of the area. The grand wizard of the area carved runes blessed by the fair folk so ensure that no matter what was thrown against it the tower would stand strong.

travel_descriptions.east: Travelling from the Inside Tower to the Southernmost Tower Entryway, one walks along a worn stone pathway. The hush of the city fades, replaced by the quiet soughing of wind and the distant hoot of an owl. The air becomes colder, the scent of moss and old stone is heavy as you approach the abandoned Southernmost Tower.

Stone Runes.name: Stone Runes
Stone Runes.examine_text: Upon close inspection, these runes seem to be blessed by the fair folk. Their magical glow emits a sense of security and strength. They are so finely carved into the stone, it's hard to believe they have endured the trials of time.

Guard's Quiver.name: Guard's Quiver
Guard's Quiver.description: A weathered quiver filled with arrows, left by a watchful guard.
Guard's Quiver.examine_text: The quiver leather is worn from use and weather. The numerous arrows within are uniform, their fletchings a dark feather, and their heads sharpened to a deadly point.

Watcher's Goblet.name: Watcher's Goblet
Watcher's Goblet.description: A finely made silver goblet, often used by the watchmen during their long vigils.
Watcher's Goblet.examine_text: Despite being noticeably used, the goblet is still shiny, its silver gleaming in the ambient light. Some kind of insignia is etched into its side, possibly the seal of the ruling family.

Tower Lantern.name: Tower Lantern
Tower Lantern.description: A large lantern hanging from an iron hook, it lights up the whole tower.
Tower Lantern.examine_text: Rust spots indicate the age of the lantern, yet its flame is bright and unwavering, casting a welcoming, golden light across the stone surface of the tower.

Carved Stone Table.name: Carved Stone Table
Carved Stone Table.description: A sturdy table formed from the same stone as the tower itself.
Carved Stone Table.examine_text: A closer inspection shows that the table is adorned with the same mysterious runes as the walls of the tower. It has a cold, yet comforting, touch.

The Guard.name: The Guard
The Guard.description: A tall, stern man with broad shoulders, decked in chainmail armor. His hair is graying at the temples and an old facial scar hints at a past battle.
The Guard.persona: I am the handpicked guard of the tower, diligent and unyielding. With my keen eyes, I notice even a mouse stirring in the grass.
The Guard.goal: To protect the tower from any intruders and ensure the safety of the city.
The Guard.location: Within The Walls Of The City

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.examine_text: This is a finely crafted longsword oft used by the tower guards. It's made of steel and has some ornamental etching along the blade. It's well balanced and appears to be ready for use.

Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
Heavy Crossbow.description: A powerful crossbow with a steel frame
Heavy Crossbow.examine_text: This crossbow is heavy duty, made for long-range engagements. It's hefty and you can feel the power it contains when you pick it up. A well-placed bolt from this beast could take out nearly any opponent.

Key to the Tower.name: Key to the Tower
Key to the Tower.description: A strong iron key, designed to fit the tower’s main door lock.
Key to the Tower.examine_text: This is the key to the Inside Tower. It's made of iron and has a number of intricate engravings. It is heavy, as if it were imbued with a measure of the tower's steadfast nature.

The Mage.name: The Mage
The Mage.description: An elderly man wrapped in dark robes. His eyes are twinkling with wisdom and power, and his hands are stained with different colors - the signs of his countless magical experiments.
The Mage.persona: I am the keeper of the runes, the magic binding this tower together. Every magic has its price and mine is the tome I keep with me at all times.
The Mage.goal: To maintain the magic seals of the tower and educate others about the mystical properties of the runes.
The Mage.location: Within The Walls Of The City

Magic Staff.name: Magic Staff
Magic Staff.description: A long, elegantly-carved staff held by the mage.
Magic Staff.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see the staff is covered in intricate patterns and tiny runic carvings. It seems to hum with a power all its own.

Tome of Runes.name: Tome of Runes
Tome of Runes.description: A massive tome filled with complex diagrams and ancient runes.
Tome of Runes.examine_text: The book appears ancient. Every page is filled with hand-written entries, diagrams and runes written in a language you don't recognise. Yet the knowledge within clearly holds power.

The Fair Folk.name: The Fair Folk
The Fair Folk.description: A slender figure with ethereal silver hair and deceptive eyes as green as emerald. His wings, when spread, would cover the entire room in their iridescent light.
The Fair Folk.persona: I am of the Fair Folk, the unseen. I flit amidst shadows and light alike, whispering words of ancient magics into the willing ears.
The Fair Folk.goal: To oversee that humans uphold the pact with the Fair Folk and respect our contribution to their Tower.
The Fair Folk.location: Within The Walls Of The City

Amulet of Night.name: Amulet of Night
Amulet of Night.description: A dark, enchanted amulet, glinting under the dim candlelight.
Amulet of Night.examine_text: This intricately designed, black jewel set amulet appears to absorb all nearby light. It's rumored to have the ability to meld its wearer with the shadows, a tool provided by the Fair Folk.

Phial of Moonlight.name: Phial of Moonlight
Phial of Moonlight.description: A small, luminous vial that seems to contain an ethereal light.
Phial of Moonlight.examine_text: This delicate, tiny phial holds a shimmering liquid that glows like a sliver of moonlight. Legend has it that it's the captured glow of a full moon, a miraculous concoction gifted by the Fair Folk.

locations.name: Artillery Room
locations.description: The artillery room is dark and spacious. Weapons and gunpowder hang from the walls. A darkly set of walls line the room and tower.
locations.background: The artillery room houses the weapons and gunpowder for the tower. The tower is always on high alert for foreign invaders. The members of the tower are eager and always willing to stand their ground in defense.

travel_descriptions.west: Traveling from the Artillery Room to the Arsenal involves a short walk through stony, torchlit corridors. The chilly air replaced by warmer, metal-scented breeze hints at the approach towards the Arsenal. The distant clanging of metals intensifies gradually while the hustle and bustle of Arsenal grow clearer. It's a journey through the heart of defense mechanics of the tower.

Black powder gun.name: Black powder gun
Black powder gun.description: A vintage firearm from another era, designed for a time when slow, dangerous black powder was the only option.
Black powder gun.examine_text: Twisted barrels, unusual firing components, and a design aesthetic that speaks to the excesses of a bygone era. There's a distinct smell of blackpowder about it.

Arrow quiver.name: Arrow quiver
Arrow quiver.description: A sturdy leather quiver filled with sharp arrows.
Arrow quiver.examine_text: The leather quiver is rough under your fingers, worn from use. The arrows contained within are sharp and of varying colors, markers of different archers perhaps.

Oil lamp.name: Oil lamp
Oil lamp.description: An old oil lamp hanging from the wall, providing dim light.
Oil lamp.examine_text: The lamp, though old, has been polished to a nearly new shine. It emanates a soft, flickering glow and the smell of the burning oil is prevalent.

Gunpowder Keg.name: Gunpowder Keg
Gunpowder Keg.description: A sizable keg filled with black gunpowder.
Gunpowder Keg.examine_text: The keg is damp to the touch and has a subtle, rusty smell. It's filled with a coarse, black powder and is tightly sealed.

Garret.name: Garret
Garret.description: Garret, the weapons master, is a burly man with a thick beard and roughened hands that have been scarred by constant handling of weapons.
Garret.persona: I'm known as the keeper of all these weapons. I maintain and ensure all our artillery is in perfect condition. My strength isn't just physical; I've got a mind that's as sharp as any blade.
Garret.goal: My primary goal is to ensure the weaponry of this tower is in a state of perpetual readiness.

hammer.name: hammer
hammer.description: A hefty blacksmith's hammer used for maintenance work.
hammer.examine_text: Observing the hammer, you notice signs of constant use. However, Garret maintains it well, the metal head shiny and free of rust, while the long, durable handle provides an excellent grip.

sharpening_stone.name: sharpening stone
sharpening_stone.description: A fine-grit stone used to sharpen blades and weapons.
sharpening_stone.examine_text: This is a rectangular, fine-grit sharpening stone. It's well-worn showing a sign of regular use, yet it remains perfectly flat and smooth on all sides.

musket.name: musket
musket.description: A long-barreled firearm used for tower defense.
musket.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, this musket is old but well-maintained. It appears ready to fire at a moment's notice. The ponderous barrel is intimidating, a testament to Garret's physical strength.

Oliver.name: Oliver
Oliver.description: Oliver is a sprightly young lad of sixteen with dust and gunpowder smeared across his face, running here and there, loading and unloading the guns.
Oliver.persona: I might be young, but don’t underestimate me. I've got the fastest hands you'll ever see. My tenacity and dedication to this tower is unmatched.
Oliver.goal: I am here to strive and protect my home, the tower, at any and all costs.

pile of gunpowder.name: Pile of Gunpowder
pile of gunpowder.description: A large pile of coarse, black gunpowder.
pile of gunpowder.examine_text: The gunpowder is coarse and has a potent smell. It's stored in a controlled environment, away from fire to prevent any accidents. Its explosive properties make it very dangerous.

pile of bullets.name: Pile of Bullets
pile of bullets.description: A pile of shiny, round bullets.
pile of bullets.examine_text: These bullets are made of solid lead, shaped and polished painstakingly. The rounds are perfectly spherical and have a decent weight to them.

musket.name: Musket
musket.examine_text: The musket is a standard-issue for the tower's defence, known for its range and reliability. It has a long barrel and sturdy wooden stock. The metal parts are somewhat worn but are well-maintained.

locations.name: Tower Spire
locations.description: A large spire at the tower top. It overlooks the city, maybe the tallest structure. You cans see it all from up here, all directions, all four of them.
locations.background: This is the peak of the tower. It was build last as the tower was started at the bottom, and only finished when the top was all the way on it. A pointy spike atop a tower. A bird makes a nest by it. It's a crow, but not a magic one.

travel_descriptions.down: Descending from the spire, the wind decreases as you move through the solid, narrow stairway enclosed by the thick tower walls. Each step echoes through the stone corridor, leading you deeper into the heart of the King's Castle.

Spyglass.name: Spyglass
Spyglass.description: A shiny brass spyglass, left behind perhaps by a previous adventurer or watchman.
Spyglass.examine_text: The spyglass has a polished brass finish, with intricate engravings. Through the lens, you can see the far-off landmarks of the city.

Bird's Nest.name: Bird's Nest
Bird's Nest.description: A crow's nest, constructed in the spire's nook.
Bird's Nest.examine_text: A bundle of twigs, feathers, and other materials expertly put together. You spot tiny, blue speckled eggs inside.

Tower Spear.name: Tower Spear
Tower Spear.description: The very tip of the tower, a sharp, imposing architectural feature.
Tower Spear.examine_text: The spear is cold to the touch, the metal beaten and weather worn. It points upwards, to the sky, as a challenge to the heavens.

locations.name: King'S Dorm
locations.description: The walls are adorned with artwork of previous Kings and Queens, battles and events of note. The walls are smooth hewn marble, the floor a mosaic of colored stones quarried far away.
locations.background: This tower was once the home to the Great King who unified the warring regions and enforced peace with an iron rule. He was clever, powerful but known as fair. Examples of his deeds can be seen in the artwork, the relics, the adornments. It is a testament to both his legacy and his ego; no one who comes there later will be able to forget who created it.

travel_descriptions.south: Descending from the King's Dorm, you pass through a narrow, spiraling stairwell cut directly into the stone walls of the tower. As you travel downwards, it becomes noticeably colder, and echoes of clattering armor and muffled conversation grow louder as you approach the Guards Quarters.
travel_descriptions.east: Emerging from the King's Dorm, you cross a grand, vaulted hallway lined with statues of past kings. Each step on the carpeted floor muffles the sound around you, giving the impression of isolation within the bustling castle. As you near the Throne Room, the gleam of gold and jewels is nearly blinding in the torchlight.

Great King's Portrait.name: Great King's Portrait
