Great King's Portrait.description: A large portrait of the Great King, notable for his stern gaze.
Great King's Portrait.examine_text: The imposing portrait portrays the Great King in his regal attire. His eyes, fierce and knowing, are captured in an eternal stern gaze. The exquisite details in the painting make it feel as if he could step right out of the canvas.

Marble Throne.name: Marble Throne
Marble Throne.description: An ornately carved throne made of marble.
Marble Throne.examine_text: The Great King's throne is made of the finest marble, its frame intricately decorated with mythical creatures and scenes of victorious battles. It exudes authority and grandeur, a testament to the King's rule.

Mosaic Stone Floor.name: Mosaic Stone Floor
Mosaic Stone Floor.description: The floor is a complex mosaic of quartz and jasper stones.
Mosaic Stone Floor.examine_text: Your gaze is drawn to the floor which is a vibrant mosaic of stones in various shades of reds, blues and whites. Patterns and designs from the past form a circuitous path around the hall conveying stories of the past.

Sir Galantine.name: Sir Galantine
Sir Galantine.description: This ghostly figure is clad in shimmering knight's armor, his ethereal face carrying a look of purpose and urgency.
Sir Galantine.persona: I was once King's most trusted knight, loyal and brave; now I am bound here, a spirit defending his legacy.
Sir Galantine.goal: Prevent anyone from tarnishing the King's legacy.

Spectral Sword.name: Spectral Sword
Spectral Sword.description: A faintly glowing longsword that Sir Galantine once wielded in battle.
Spectral Sword.examine_text: The spectral blade of the sword glows with a soft pale light, ethereal and nearly transparent. It seems to hum with energy, pulsating rhythmically as if it has a heart and life of its own. You can see the elegant craftsmanship, the beautiful details on the hilt and the intricacies of its design. It carries an aura of nobility and courage, a testament to the lessons and values of Sir Galantine.

Ghostly Shield.name: Ghostly Shield
Ghostly Shield.description: A translucent, shimmery round shield that once protected Sir Galantine in numerous battles.
Ghostly Shield.examine_text: The gleaming ghostly shield is imbued with indistinct, swirling light, an imprint of Sir Galantine's gallant spirit. The shield features the emblem of the royal crown at its centre, a reminder of Sir Galantine's fidelity to the King. Though hovering in mid-air, it seems to exude a sphere of protection around itself as if it could deflect any harm that comes its way.

Ellis, the Scribe.name: Ellis, the Scribe
Ellis, the Scribe.description: A frail, elderly man with a quill perpetually in hand, his glasses perched precariously on his hooked nose.
Ellis, the Scribe.persona: I've dedicated my entire life to preserving the King's tales. His legacy is the story of us all.
Ellis, the Scribe.goal: Write and preserve the history of the Great King who unified the regions.

Ancient Parchments.name: Ancient Parchments
Ancient Parchments.description: A stack of worn, yellowed parchments.
Ancient Parchments.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the parchments are written in an ancient script. The ink has faded over time, but the stories they tell remain timeless. They seem to describe tales of epic battles and benevolent rulers, reflecting the grand legacy of the tower's previous inhabitants.

Feather Quill.name: Feather Quill
Feather Quill.description: A delicate, perfectly preserved feather quill.
Feather Quill.examine_text: It's lightweight and well balanced. The feather is smoothened over time with a sharp tip dipped in a dried black ink. The inscriptions on the quill suggest that it belonged to a famous scribe in the past, possibly Ellis, who has dedicated his life to recording the King's tales.

Ink Pot.name: Ink Pot
Ink Pot.description: A small, ceramic pot filled with ink.
Ink Pot.examine_text: The pot is made of clay, hardened and then painted with meticulous details. It has a narrow neck and wide rim for easy access. The deep black ink fills up almost to the brim. When you move it, the liquid inside swishes, and you realize that it is not dried up and still usable.

Philomena, the Chambermaid.name: Philomena, the Chambermaid
Philomena, the Chambermaid.description: A stout, middle-aged woman with a constant frown on her face, she is always armed with a feather duster.
Philomena, the Chambermaid.persona: I ensure everything in this vanishing Royal Dorm is spick and span, polished to the last speck of dust.
Philomena, the Chambermaid.goal: To keep the King's Dorm immaculate and in perfect order.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A long wooden handle with soft feathers attached at its end.
Feather Duster.examine_text: On closer inspection, the feathers are extremely soft and pliable. This tool has been used to dust off many priceless artifacts throughout the years.

Cleaning Rags.name: Cleaning Rags
Cleaning Rags.description: A bundle of old, yet clean rags.
Cleaning Rags.examine_text: Though the rags are worn and bleached from countless cleanings, they are kept meticulously clean ready for instant use. They have been used to polish this room to its pristine conditions.

Varnish.name: Varnish
Varnish.description: A can of bright, clear varnish.
Varnish.examine_text: On closer examination, the varnish is grade A quality, perfect for providing a fresh coating on the ancient artworks in the dorm. It's clear and uncolored, designed to bring out the natural beauty of wooden surfaces without altering their color.

locations.name: Staircase
locations.description: The staircase is spiral and made of stone. The stone is smooth and cold from years of friction. The staircase reaches multiple levels of the tower and is the only way up or down.
locations.background: The staircase goes from the entrance to the castle to the top floor of the tower where the Debtor's prison is located. It is the only way into the debtor's prison as there are no windows in the entire tower. It also passes the 2nd floor where the slave's quarters are located.

travel_descriptions.up: Ascending the stone staircase, you make your way towards the Princess' Chamber. The winding spiral starts to narrow as you get higher, the atmosphere changing from cold draconian stone to a more gentle and charming ambiance.
travel_descriptions.down: Descending the staircase, you go deeper within the confines of the castle. The temperature gets colder, the torchlight dims and the echo of your footsteps resonates off the sturdy walls of the castle's great tower.

Stone_Staircase.name: Stone Staircase
Stone_Staircase.description: An old smooth stone staircase spiraling towards different levels of the tower.
Stone_Staircase.examine_text: The stone scenery of the staircase seems to tell the countless years of weary footsteps. The spiraling form of the staircase offers an indirect path toward the tower's top, each round exposing a new level of the tower. Despite the functionality, there's a certain gloomy aura around it, considering it's the only path for the slaves and prisoners.

Torch_Holder.name: Torch Holder
Torch_Holder.description: An iron holder fastened to the wall, holding a torch that lights the staircase.
Torch_Holder.examine_text: The torch holder is made from iron, aged and rusty but still holding firm. The torch within it flickers, casting a wavering light that dances upon the stone walls. Although weathered, it provides a modicum of security and vision in the otherwise dark environment.

Chains.name: Chains
Chains.description: A set of heavy-duty iron chains attached to the wall.
Chains.examine_text: There are thick chains stationed along the stairway wall. They're old and rusted, marking the passage of countless prisoners through these halls. The sight of the chains is chilling, a blunt reminder of the tower's somber history.

Dungeon Guard.name: Dungeon Guard
Dungeon Guard.description: A stoic and well-built man wearing worn-out chainmail armor with a symbol of the tower embossed on it. He has a grim face and eyes that have seen too much.
Dungeon Guard.persona: I stand guard here every day, ensuring those who are indebted to the king don't escape. It's not the most rewarding job, but it's my duty.
Dungeon Guard.goal: Ensure no prisoner escapes from the debtor's prison.

Iron Key.name: Iron Key
Iron Key.description: A thick heavy key made of iron
Iron Key.examine_text: The key is heavy and rusted with a long stem and a single tooth at the end, it looks old but durable, perfect for the dungeon door

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.examine_text: The sword has a steel blade that shines in the dim light, the hilt is wrapped in faded leather, the weight is evenly distributed making it easy to handle

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: A lantern with glass sides and metal frame
Lantern.examine_text: The lantern has a sturdy handle on top for holding or hanging, inside there's a wick ready to be lit, the glass sides are a bit smoky but will still give off decent light

Edna.name: Edna
Edna.description: A frail woman with dull eyes and sunken cheeks. Her clothes are tattered and dirty, and she moves with an aching slowness.
Edna.persona: My days are spent scrubbing the stairs and corridors. It's hard work, but I have no choice. Who else will keep these cold stone floors clean?
Edna.goal: Survive each day and hopefully gain her freedom one day.

Mop.name: Mop
Mop.description: A long wooden mop with frayed strands at the end.
Mop.examine_text: This mop is worn and old with frayed strands at the end. There are signs of wear on the wooden handle from constant use. It has seen better days, but it still gets the job done.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.examine_text: This is a sturdy iron bucket with a handle. It's used for carrying water for cleaning. There are signs of rust at the bottom, but it's otherwise in good condition.

Piece of stale bread.name: Piece of stale bread
Piece of stale bread.description: A small piece of stale bread
Piece of stale bread.examine_text: It's a small piece of bread that's gone stale. It's hard, and the crust has cracked. It's not much, but it's all Edna has to eat.

Fergus the Prisoner.name: Fergus the Prisoner
Fergus the Prisoner.description: A tall, lanky man with scruffy hair and days-old stubble. He's dressed in tattered prison garb and shivers in the cold of his cell.
Fergus the Prisoner.persona: This place is a hellhole. I was once a free man, but a sour deal landed me here. I keep thinking about escape, but that's easier said than done.
Fergus the Prisoner.goal: Find a way to escape the debtor's prison.

Chalk Piece.name: Chalk Piece
Chalk Piece.description: A small, worn out piece of white chalk.
Chalk Piece.examine_text: Looking closely, you see the chalk is almost used up, with fingerprints deeply engraved on it. You guess Fergus must have used it to mark the days of his confinement, or possibly to draw on the walls to escape the boredom.

Handmade Shiv.name: Handmade Shiv
Handmade Shiv.description: It seems like a small, sharp piece of metal fashioned into a blade. It reeks of desperation and survival.
Handmade Shiv.examine_text: On closer inspection, the shiv appears to be made out of a piece of broken off metal from possibly a bucket or a plate. Its edges are rough, but it comes to a sharp point at one end. It looks like Fergus has been preparing this in case of need.

Locket with Photo.name: Locket with Photo
Locket with Photo.description: A old, dented locket. There seems to be something inside.
Locket with Photo.examine_text: You open the locket gently. Inside, there's a faded picture of a young woman holding a baby. The lady's smile is warm, but with a hint of sadness. Tears have smudged the ink in places, making you wonder how many times Fergus must have looked upon this during his time here.

locations.name: Rat Den
locations.description: The rat den is a disgusting, musty room deep inside the tower sewers. This is the area that the rats pull the bones of the treasure seekers, so they are able to get full access to all of the decomposing meat on the bones. Around the room are empty crates, that are broken and falling to pieces. Scattered glass litters the floor, broken ale bottles where some of the poor have tried to stay in the den, before the rat's had over taken it. There are torches on the wall, but dim now, as no soul wants to see the what the light would show. There are rat's nests in the corner, bits of straw, cloth and other odds and ends the rats have dug up.
locations.background: The rat den used to be a storage room, before the mad King became the ruler. It stored crates of lovely dishes, ornaments and treasures. It was kept clean, with servants coming and going to get items, as well as store them. It was actually quite a clean and nice room, where even food was stored when there was an abundance. Torches kept the room bright, the walls were in good order, clean of cobwebs.

travel_descriptions.out: Clearly, the exit from the rat den leads back to the gloomy sewer entrance. As you trudge towards it, the putrid smell of the sewers seems almost welcoming in comparison to the stench of decaying food and rat droppings. The faint echoes of dripping water and distant squeaks of rodents serve as a chilling reminder of the belly of the tower you're leaving behind.

Empty Crate.name: Empty Crate
Empty Crate.description: A broken wooden crate that was probably used for storing goods.
Empty Crate.examine_text: The crate is made of wooden boards nailed together, now rotted and crumbling. Old, faded markings barely visible suggest that it once contained some sort of goods.

Broken Ale Bottles.name: Broken Ale Bottles
Broken Ale Bottles.description: Pieces of shattered glass bottles strewn over the floor.
Broken Ale Bottles.examine_text: These are fragments of what used to be ale bottles. Some still have labels, but most are too worn to read.

Dim Torch.name: Dim Torch
Dim Torch.description: An old torch, barely giving off any light.
Dim Torch.examine_text: The torch is in a bad state. It seems like it's about to go out any moment now, the flame dancing weakly.

Rat's Nest.name: Rat's Nest
Rat's Nest.description: A rat's nest made up of various bits and pieces.
Rat's Nest.examine_text: Straw, rotten scraps of cloth, and various bits of junk. It's not very pleasant, but the rats seem to consider it home.

Ratticus the Rat King.name: Ratticus the Rat King
Ratticus the Rat King.description: Ratticus is a grotesquely oversized rat with sharp, yellow teeth and fur covered in bits of bones and muck. His beady eyes glimmer in the faint torchlight, reflecting a cunning that is unusual for a creature of his kind.
Ratticus the Rat King.persona: I am Ratticus, ruler of this domain. Humans may own the tower above, but here in the depths, I am the king.
Ratticus the Rat King.goal: To grow my kingdom and protect my swarm from intruders.

Piece of a royal crest.name: Piece of a royal crest
Piece of a royal crest.description: A faded piece of what was once part of a grand royal crest.
Piece of a royal crest.examine_text: As you pick up the piece, you can hardly make out a faint lion insignia that was once part of a grand royal crest, symbol of a forgotten kingdom's might.

Rusty crown.name: Rusty crown
Rusty crown.description: A rusty, battered crown, that has seen better days.
Rusty crown.examine_text: On closer inspection, the crown, though rusted and bent out of shape, has intricate designs etched onto it. It looks like it was once a part of a noble's regalia. This could be the crown of Ratticus, the Rat King.

Bone fragments.name: Bone fragments
Bone fragments.description: Scattered fragments of bone of varying sizes and shapes.
Bone fragments.examine_text: These are bone fragments, probably from the poor souls who tried to trespass the rat den. Careful, some of them are startlingly sharp.

Lena the lost adventurer.name: Lena the lost adventurer
Lena the lost adventurer.description: Lena is a lithe woman with grit in her eyes. Her armor is tattered and covered in grime, she holds a broken sword in her hand. Cuts and bruises tell the tale of her struggles in the rat den.
Lena the lost adventurer.persona: I am Lena, a brave adventurer who got lost in this awful place. I won't rest until I find a way out.
Lena the lost adventurer.goal: To find her way out of the rat den and escape the tower.

Broken compass.name: Broken compass
Broken compass.description: A once useful navigation tool now corrupted
Broken compass.examine_text: Lena finds an old, broken compass. The glass face is shattered and the needle spins wildly, no longer reliable as a compass point. Rust spots pepper the brass body - a clear sign of neglect over time.

Half eaten loaf of bread.name: Half eaten loaf of bread
Half eaten loaf of bread.description: A bewildering remnant of some poor lost soul's meal
Half eaten loaf of bread.examine_text: Lena looks at the half eaten loaf of bread. It's hard as a rock and covered with mold. It's been here for quite a while, she muses.

Torn map.name: Torn map
Torn map.description: A tattered piece of parchment containing elusive routes
Torn map.examine_text: Upon examination, Lena finds a piece of parchment - it's a map. Though torn & soiled in places, she can make out some bit of trails within the tower. Maybe this can lead her out of this god forsaken place.

Old Griggs.name: Old Griggs
Old Griggs.description: Old Griggs is a raggedy old man who lives among the rats. He wears tattered clothes and his grizzled hair is matted with filth, but his eyes tell tales of a once mighty warrior.
Old Griggs.persona: I'm Griggs, once a respected knight of the tower. Now, I serve as a reminder of the tower's doom.
Old Griggs.goal: To reclaim his honor and help anyone trapped in the tower find their way out.

Old sword.name: Old Sword
Old sword.description: A rusty and dull sword, abandoned and forgotten.
Old sword.examine_text: Looking closer at the sword, it's clear this weapon has seen its share of battles. Its once sharp and shiny blade is now covered in a layer of rust and its handle is worn out, any hint of a once elaborate design on the handle was now stripped off by time and neglect. It belonged to a knight a thousand stories ago.

Faded knight emblem.name: Faded Knight Emblem
Faded knight emblem.description: A very worn emblem that once signified the title of a knight.
Faded knight emblem.examine_text: With a closer look, the emblem appears to be far more faded than at first glance. It bears an almost unrecognizable insignia of a once proud knight. The edges are frayed, and the once vibrant threads are now a dull faded hue. It was the symbol of honor of Old Griggs, left behind in the gloomy rat den long after his fall from grace.

Empty ale bottle.name: Empty Ale Bottle
Empty ale bottle.description: An old, discarded bottle, once containing ale.
Empty ale bottle.examine_text: This empty ale bottle has been discarded on the floor of the rat den. It's covered in patches of dried liquid but holds no beverage now. The bottle is a reflection of despair, an attempt from Griggs to drown his sorrow over the impending doom of the tower.

locations.name: Guards Quarters
locations.description: The Guards quarters feature rows of bunk beds with large wooden chests at the base of the bed for the guardsmen to rest in and store their possessions. Above the door way there is a large iron crest representing the town's leaders. Two stone cut outs act as windows on opposite sides of the room.
locations.background: The guard quarters are where the guards sleep and store their material possessions when not in service. It is a shared residency, but exclusive to only the guards and cant be accessed by others.

travel_descriptions.north: The journey north from the Guard's Quarters to the King's Dorm is marked by numerous historical artworks. The beautifully carved marble walls that guide the way are a testament to the legacy of the Great King. As you move through, you are filled with a sense of grandeur and the strong presence of the past.

Iron Crest.name: Iron Crest
Iron Crest.description: A large iron crest hung above the door.
Iron Crest.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the crest looks old but well maintained, symbolizing the steadfast vigilance of the guards. The crest features intricate designs showcasing the town's emblem.

Bunk Beds.name: Bunk Beds
Bunk Beds.description: Rows of sturdy wooden bunk beds lined against the walls.
Bunk Beds.examine_text: Each bunk bed is designed to hold two people and they have clean white sheets neatly folded. The structure looks strong and can withstand a lot of weight.

Wooden Chest.name: Wooden Chest
Wooden Chest.description: Large wooden chests placed at the base of the bunk beds.
Wooden Chest.examine_text: The chests are made out of sturdy oak wood, with metal corners for reinforcement. They have large metal hinges and a lock to keep the contents safe.

Stone Windows.name: Stone Windows
Stone Windows.description: Stone cut outs are visible on opposite walls, functioning as windows.
Stone Windows.examine_text: These are arched windows, cut out of the existing stones, giving a bare but effective passage for light to come in.

Guard John.name: Guard John
Guard John.description: A robust man with a shiny bald head. He's in his uniform, a suit of chain mail, with a longsword by his side.
Guard John.persona: I've served in this tower for many years and have seen things most wouldn't believe. Safety of this place and its people is my responsibility.
Guard John.goal: To maintain order within the tower and keep the peace in the surrounding town.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A well-used longsword with a slightly dulled blade.
longsword.examine_text: The longsword looks like it's seen many battles. The pommel is adorned with a small crest. Despite its worn appearance, the sword feels balanced and sturdy in your hands.

pipe.name: Pipe
pipe.description: A simple wooden pipe, stained from years of use.
pipe.examine_text: It's an old, cherrywood tobacco pipe. It's has a carved spiral design around the bowl and stem. The smell of tobacco lingers in it.

key to the armory.name: Key to the Armory
key to the armory.description: A heavy iron key with an intricate design.
key to the armory.examine_text: The key is cold and heavy, a small etching of a shield signifying its purpose. It's used to lock and unlock the Armory.

Guard Mary.name: Guard Mary
Guard Mary.description: She is petite, with her hair tied back in a neat bun. A scar runs down one cheek. Her eyes are sharp and scrutinizing.
Guard Mary.persona: Don't let my size fool you, I can swing a mace just as well as any man. I've never shied away from a challenge, and I won't start now.
Guard Mary.goal: To prove herself as a competent warrior to her fellow guardsmen and protect her home.

guard's badge.name: Guard's Badge
guard's badge.description: A worn metal badge belonging to Guard Mary.
guard's badge.examine_text: The badge is in the shape of a shield, with an embossed eagle clutching a sword. It is made of silver and worn from years of use. Itings 'Tower Guard - Mary' appears neatly on the front.

healing potion.name: Healing Potion
healing potion.description: An aesthetically unalluring red mixture stored in a small flask.
healing potion.examine_text: The potion is a searing red, bubbling with a mystic force. Its healing properties are known to rapidly mend wounds and restore vitality. It is kept secured in a flask with a cork at the top. It has a faintly sweet smell, contrary to its dubious appearance.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: A hefty iron mace, well balanced for easy handling.
mace.examine_text: The mace is crafted with an iron shaft wrapped in worn leather, for a better grip at the base. The head of the weapon is a hefty lump of iron featuring several intimidating spikes, it's well balanced for a flawless destructive swing.

Sergeant Hart.name: Sergeant Hart
Sergeant Hart.description: A middle-aged man with a stern expression. He has greying hair and a thick beard. Wears a higher grade uniform with a badge of rank on the chest.
Sergeant Hart.persona: I know every nook of this tower like the back of my hand. I lead these men and women. Their lives are my responsibility, and my duty always comes first.
Sergeant Hart.goal: To ensure the discipline and readiness of his squad and maintain the safety of the tower.

rapier.name: rapier
rapier.description: A lightweight, sharp sword, prized for its speed and dexterity.
rapier.examine_text: The rapier sported by Sergeant Hart has a complex hilt design and a needle sharp, double-edged blade. It is lightweight and well-used, showing signs of many past battles.

map_of_the_tower.name: map of the tower
map_of_the_tower.description: A detailed map of the tower, frequently updated.
map_of_the_tower.examine_text: The map is detailed and well-worn. It shows all the levels and rooms of the tower, including secret passages and traps. The Sergeant always keeps it updated.

whistle.name: whistle
whistle.examine_text: The whistle is made of polished silver with a leather cord attached. When blown it creates a loud, piercing sound, able to alert the whole tower.

locations.name: A Spiral Staircase
locations.description: Made of strong granite and oak timbre, it ascends to the highest room in the tower. The granite glitters in the light from the torches that line the walls. The oak is sleek and coated in a glistening protectant.
locations.background: This staircase was built by the great grandfather of the current king. At the top of the staircase, in the highest tower, lies an vital scroll that holds the secret to protecting the castle.

travel_descriptions.down: Traveling down the spiral staircase leads you through a labyrinth of towering stone walls and ancient torches, the descent marked by the rhythm of your footsteps echoing off the granite steps.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending towards the King's Quarters, the air becomes thick with the scent of polished wood and sandalwood oil. The gleam of gold and diamond punctuates the dusky twilight of the room above, promising an experience of luxury and comfort.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: It's a wall-mounted torch made of iron, emitting a warm light.
Torch.examine_text: The torch flickers brightly against the cool stone of the tower. The handle was masterfully crafted out of iron into elaborate swirls. It provides light and a slight heat when you get close.

Granite Steps.name: Granite Steps
Granite Steps.description: They are the stone steps leading to the top of the tower.
Granite Steps.examine_text: The granite steps are worn from countless feet traipsing up and down. Each one is precisely cut and meticulously positioned, evidence of the skilled craftsmanship that built this spiral staircase. It subtly sparkles under the torchlight.

Oak Handrail.name: Oak Handrail
Oak Handrail.description: A sleek handrail made from quality oak timber runs through the length of the stairs.
Oak Handrail.examine_text: This handrail, carved from a single piece of oak, streaks elegantly along the edge of the staircase. It’s polished smooth, worn over the years by the touch of countless hands. The varnish still retains its shine, glistening under the torchlight.

Lady Oriana.name: Lady Oriana
Lady Oriana.description: A middle-aged noblewoman with sharp blue eyes and elegantly coiffed auburn hair. She is attired in a richly embroidered crimson gown.
Lady Oriana.persona: I might live in this court, but I am no longer of it. My greatest joy is in my research, the ancient mysteries and secrets yet to be revealed.
Lady Oriana.goal: To retrieve the ancient scroll to unlock the secret architecture of the castle.

gold locket.name: Gold Locket
gold locket.description: An ornate gold locket encrusted with tiny diamonds.
gold locket.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice that the gold locket is absolutely exquisite. It is wrought in what looks like pure gold, with a cluster of tiny but impressively brilliant diamonds adorning its front. A delicate heart-shaped clasp holds it shut. This trinket glints radiantly in the torch light, indicating its immense value. As you turn it over in your hands, you wonder about the secrets it may hold inside.

ancient book on architecture.name: Ancient Book on Architecture
ancient book on architecture.description: A thick, heavily bound book filled with parchment pages on tower architecture.
ancient book on architecture.examine_text: This book seems painfully old. Its leather cover is cracked and weather-worn, and its yellowing parchment pages are filled with ornate, intricate illustrations of different types of castle towers and their construction. Strange symbols fill the margins, likely notes from the many scholars who've pored over this tome before. You realize this could be invaluable for understanding the secrets of the tower.

set of keys.name: Set of Keys
set of keys.description: A heavy ring of keys of different sizes and shapes.
set of keys.examine_text: These keys are of different lengths, with various intricate designs on their bows. Each one likely opens a different door in the castle, maybe even the one to the room holding the vital scroll. The keys are old but well-maintained, suggesting that they're used often. The sheer size of the set suggests that there are many locked doors in the tower.

Knight Cedric.name: Knight Cedric
Knight Cedric.description: An intimidating figure in his gleaming steel armor, with a weathered face, stern gaze, and a gray-streaked beard.
Knight Cedric.persona: Loyalty to my king and kingdom is my code. I will protect this castle with my life, for the honor of my family legacy.
Knight Cedric.goal: Defend the tower and ensure the ancient scroll's safety.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A gleaming longsword, a symbol of a knight's honor.
Longsword.examine_text: Knight Cedric's longsword. It's longer and heavier than a regular sword, made for fighters with a strong build. The hilt is adorned with the bear sigil of his family and the blade gleams, well-cared for and sharp. It's seen its fair share of battle.

Heavy Shield.name: Heavy Shield
Heavy Shield.description: A large, durable shield, embossed with the bear sigil of Cedric's family.
Heavy Shield.examine_text: This is Knight Cedric's heavy shield, shining with polished metal and the strength of heritage. It's made of the highest quality timber, covered in steel plating and features the proud bear sigil of his family. It's been through many battles, scuffed and scratched yet stronger for it.

Flowers.name: Flowers
Flowers.description: A bouquet of wildflowers, a token for a loved one.
Flowers.examine_text: These flowers are handpicked by Knight Cedric, a simple yet meaningful gesture. The colors are vibrant - reds, purples, and yellows - a stark contrast to the constant armour and stone of the knight's life. The scent is fragrant, a hint of sweetness in the air.

locations.name: Prison Room
locations.description: it has old gray brick and it is hard to breathe because it is so high up in the sky, there are old skeletons there from previous prisoners.
locations.background: the room in the high tower is used for the king's private prison room for traitors.

travel_descriptions.south: A narrow stone stairway descends from the prison room to the south. The air grows colder and damper with each step down, carrying with it the heavy, lingering scent of despair and fear. The faint echoes of shackles clanking against stone can be heard, a grim reminder of the destination awaits.

Skeleton.name: Skeleton
Skeleton.description: A creepy old skeleton that has been left here from a previous prisoner.
Skeleton.examine_text: You see an old skeleton with a scared face that is completely white. The bones are scattered about on the floor

Old bricks.name: Old bricks
Old bricks.description: Bricks from the wall of the prison room.
Old bricks.examine_text: Looking closely, you see the grey bricks are worn out and cracked. They are cold to the touch.

Chained shackles.name: Chained shackles
Chained shackles.description: Rusted shackles attached to the wall
Chained shackles.examine_text: The chained shackles are old and rusty, a putrid smell comes from them. It seems they have been used on many prisoners before.

Ralf the Guard.name: Ralf the Guard
Ralf the Guard.description: A tall, muscular man with a stern face, wearing dark rustic armor and holding a rusted old halberd.
Ralf the Guard.persona: I'm tasked with guarding traitors. It's a tough job but someone's gotta keep the king's peace.
Ralf the Guard.goal: To maintain the security of the prison and ensure no prisoners escape.

Halberd.name: Halberd
Halberd.description: A lengthy weapon used by tower guards.
Halberd.examine_text: The Halberd feels very heavy, made with an evidence of mastery. Its sharp axe-like blade at one side, and a hook on the other, mounted on a long staff. It's used for both attacking and defending.

Tower Keys.name: Tower Keys
Tower Keys.description: A set of iron keys for the tower's rooms.
Tower Keys.examine_text: Ralf's keys are cold and hard in hand. There's a set of them, each key looks different, probably used for various locks inside the tower.

Dried Food.name: Dried Food
Dried Food.description: Sustenance for the long hours on guard duty.
Dried Food.examine_text: The food is dried, made to last for months without going bad. It doesn't taste great, but it does the job of keeping hunger away.

Lutz the Traitor.name: Lutz the Traitor
Lutz the Traitor.description: A thin, pale man with ragged clothes and a look of desperation in his eyes.
Lutz the Traitor.persona: They say I'm a traitor, but I just wanted a voice for the people. These old bones and bars won't hold me forever.
Lutz the Traitor.goal: To escape the tower prison and tell the world of the king's injustices.

Chisel.name: Chisel
Chisel.description: A small, old chisel with a worn out handle.
Chisel.examine_text: This chisel is well-used and old. The handle is worn down, and it seems to have been used to cut through tough material, perhaps the prison's stone walls. The mere possession of this tool hints at an escape plan.

Ropes.name: Ropes
Ropes.description: A set of sturdy ropes, knotted together to form a makeshift rope ladder.
Ropes.examine_text: These ropes are knotted together to form a long, crude ladder. Despite its rough appearance, it extremely strong, enough to bear the weight of a grown adult. It appears to be part of an escape strategy.

Ghost of the Betrayed.name: Ghost of the Betrayed
Ghost of the Betrayed.description: A faint, ethereal figure, shimmering against the cold stone walls of the prison.  Its skeletal form is bound by invisible chains.
Ghost of the Betrayed.persona: I was once a knight who fell from grace, accused of betrayal and left to perish in this room. I'm mere shadow now.
Ghost of the Betrayed.goal: To find peace and be released from my eternal torment.

Invisible Chains.name: Invisible Chains
Invisible Chains.description: A set of ethereal shackles that shimmer faintly in the dark.
Invisible Chains.examine_text: The chains are light, barely visible and seem to be made of a million little shimmering lights, reminiscent of the stars. They seem cold and hard but ghostly to touch. Their clinking sound echoes through the silent room, speaking volumes of the despair that once occupied this room.

locations.name: Throne Room
locations.description: Ornate and luxurious, the throne room gleams with gold and precious jewels. Priceless paintings of past kings line the sides. Underneath a vaulted ceiling, a regal red carpet connects the throne room's entrance to the golden throne itself.
locations.background: The throne room is the pride and joy of the castle. The king commissioned hundreds of craftsman to construct it's expensive interior. The king often brings important ambassadors to this room to impress them with his power.

travel_descriptions.west: Journeying west from the throne room, you pass through a grand archway and into a corridor. The walls are richly decorated with tapestries and exquisite paintings that recount the history of the kingdom. The path leads to the comfort and opulence of King'S Dorm.

Golden Throne.name: Golden Throne
Golden Throne.description: A luxurious throne crafted from pure gold
Golden Throne.examine_text: The throne is a masterpiece, encrusted with countless jewels and ornate designs that gleam in the sunlight. Sapphires, rubies, and diamonds adorn the armrests and back, creating a stunning spectacle of wealth and power.

Regal Red Carpet.name: Regal Red Carpet
Regal Red Carpet.description: A long, luxurious carpet of deep crimson, leading up to the throne
Regal Red Carpet.examine_text: The carpet is soft underfoot, with beautiful floral patterns woven into its crimson fabric. It leads elegantly from the entrance of the throne room up to the regal golden throne.

Ornate Crown.name: Ornate Crown
Ornate Crown.description: A stunning crown gleaming with rare jewels and gold
Ornate Crown.examine_text: The crown is a marvel of royal craftsmanship, set with radiant diamonds and sapphires. The gold is intricately shaped into a series of elegant, flowing designs that command respect and admiration.

King Reginald.name: King Reginald
King Reginald.description: An older man dressed in fine royal garments, King Reginald sits regally on the golden throne with a stern expression on his face.
King Reginald.persona: Hmm, I am King Reginald. I rule this kingdom and none shall question my authority. I demand respect and obedience from all my subjects.
King Reginald.goal: My goal is to maintain the peace and prosperity of my kingdom.

royal_crown.name: Royal Crown
royal_crown.description: It's a small, shiny, golden crown encrusted with lots of precious stones. This is the symbol of King Reginald's rule
royal_crown.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can notice the excellent craftsmanship of the crown. Each jewel is meticulously set, and the gold in which they are set shines brightly. The weight in your hand speaks to its value and you can't help but feel a certain air of authority and power emanating from this object.

golden_scepter.name: Golden Scepter
golden_scepter.description: This is a long, heavy rod made of pure gold, topped with a large, glistening diamond. It is the royal symbol of authority wielded by the king.
golden_scepter.examine_text: As you hold the scepter, you notice intricate carvings lining its length. Scenes of past victories, powerful beasts and glorious celebrations. The golden body of the scepter is cold to the touch and the diamond at the top gleams ominously. It's a striking item that commands power and respect.

Sir Geoffrey, The Royal bodyguard.name: Sir Geoffrey, The Royal bodyguard
Sir Geoffrey, The Royal bodyguard.description: A mammoth of a man armed to the teeth, Sir Geoffrey, stands close to the throne, scanning the room with alert, vigilant eyes.
Sir Geoffrey, The Royal bodyguard.persona: I'm Sir Geoffrey, the royal bodyguard. I am tasked with the safety of the king. No threats are to come close under my watch.
Sir Geoffrey, The Royal bodyguard.goal: To ensure the safety of King Reginald at all times.

Sword.name: Sword of Sir Geoffrey
Sword.description: This is a long, gleaming sword studded with precious gems, carried by Sir Geoffrey.
Sword.examine_text: The sword is perfectly balanced, hinting towards its expert craftsmanship. The hilt is intricately decorated with carvings and embedded with precious gems. There's a sense of power and prestige bestowed by this weapon.

Shield.name: Shield of Sir Geoffrey
Shield.description: A solid, durable shield embedded with the coat of arms of Sir Geoffrey.
Shield.examine_text: Upon closer look, the shield is forged from the finest metal in the kingdom. It is ornate, decorated with the coat of arms of Sir Geoffrey - a griffin and a castle. It is polished to a shine, reflecting the grandeur of the throne room.

Bertram, The Royal Advisor.name: Bertram, The Royal Advisor
Bertram, The Royal Advisor.description: A distinguished older man in faintly glittering robes, Bertram hovers anxiously to the side of the King, a scroll in his hand.
Bertram, The Royal Advisor.persona: I am Bertram, the royal advisor. I guide the King on all his decisions, to ensure the welfare of our kingdom.
Bertram, The Royal Advisor.goal: To provide sound and wise counsel to King Reginald for the prosperity of our kingdom.

scroll.name: Royal Scroll
scroll.description: A parchment scroll rolled up and sealed with the royal wax seal.
scroll.examine_text: The scroll is made from carefully processed animal hide and looks very ancient. It bears the royal seal on it, a sign that it contains important information. It has a smell of old books, reminding you of the wisdom it might contain.

quill.name: Bertram's Quill
quill.description: It's a large feather quill, likely from a swan. It's been honed into a fine point, perfect for penning detailed manuscripts.
quill.examine_text: The quill, upon closer observation, seems to be sturdier than it looks. It's beautiful, with each barb neatly in order, and the nib is dipped in ink, ready to document important decisions and decrees.

locations.name: Murder Hole
locations.description: A grey, stone section of the tower.  There's a small rectangular cut out in the wall to allow archers to shoot through the hole at invaders.  It's a generally hot and stifling place.
locations.background: This is a section of the tower where archers can shoot out from without generally being hit by anything.  This is especially useful during sieges and assaults they must defend against.

travel_descriptions.down: Descending from the murder hole, the scent of stone and aged wood fades, replaced by the cold, clean air of the Keep. The narrow stairs are steep and slick with age, lined with centuries-old torch sconces.

Archer's Bow.name: Archer's Bow
Archer's Bow.description: A sturdy wood and string bow resting in the corner.
Archer's Bow.examine_text: A long, well polished yew bow. It's string is made from strong, twisted animal sinew. It looks like it could project an arrow with lethal force.

Rustic table.name: Rustic table
Rustic table.description: A plain, wooden table situated positioned near the hole.
Rustic table.examine_text: This old, worn table appears to be where archers store their arrows and other necessities during long sieges. It's stained with rings from mugs and smears of oil.

Quiver of arrows.name: Quiver of arrows
Quiver of arrows.description: A leather quiver filled with arrows, placed on the table.
Quiver of arrows.examine_text: This is a full quiver of sharp, straight arrows, each fletched with dark feathers. They're lightweight, yet appear that they could penetrate armor.

Stone jug.name: Stone jug
Stone jug.description: A small, stone jug, probably used for drinking, kept on the table.
Stone jug.examine_text: This jug, made out of rough grey stone, is clearly meant for holding water or other liquids. At the moment, it's empty.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A torch, lightly burning, affixed to the wall.
Torch.examine_text: This torch provides the only source of light in the place, casting dramatic shadows around the tower. The wood is slightly charred, and the flame dances erratically.

Archer Aldwin.name: Archer Aldwin
Archer Aldwin.description: A tall, slightly lean figure with sharp eyes, hardened from years of peering into the distance. He's dressed in uniform, with a well-kept longbow in his hands.
Archer Aldwin.persona: I've been manning these walls for years, aiming my arrows at anyone daring enough to threaten our fortress. It's a never ending waiting game, always on edge and ready for the next onslaught.
Archer Aldwin.goal: His goal is to protect the tower from any impending threats.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: An old, well-crafted longbow resting against the wall.
Longbow.examine_text: The longbow, though old, is well maintained. It's made of a strong, flexible wood species, strung tight with a gutstring. It shows signs of frequent use and many successful hits, but it has been cleaned and oiled consistently. There are small notches carved into the grip, possibly counting hundreds of successful shots.

Quiver of arrows.name: Quiver of arrows
Quiver of arrows.description: A worn leather quiver, filled with feathered arrows, is leaning against the wall.
Quiver of arrows.examine_text: The quiver is made from worn, brown leather toughened by age and use. Inside are arrows, each meticulously crafted with neatly cut feathers and sharp points. They seem to have been made by an adept hand, each one capable of piercing armor with its deadly sharp tip.

Flask of water.name: Flask of water
Flask of water.description: A sturdy flask, full of cool water, lays on the ground nearby.
Flask of water.examine_text: The flask is made from hardened leather, sealed with beeswax to prevent any spills. It's remarkably cool to the touch - suggesting it was filled from a cold, deep well, not too long ago. The taste is clean and crisp, enough to satiate thirst for the time being.

Spotter Sigmund.name: Spotter Sigmund
Spotter Sigmund.description: A shorter stout man with a rugged face. He carries a long spyglass and wears more casual clothes, covered by a layer of dust.
Spotter Sigmund.persona: I'm the eyes of the tower, scanning the horizon day and night for threats. Can't let anything slip past my sight, or it could mean destruction for us all.
Spotter Sigmund.goal: His goal is to provide early warning of incoming threats to allow the tower to prepare its defenses.

Spyglass.name: Spyglass
Spyglass.description: A well-used bronze spyglass with worn leather grips.
Spyglass.examine_text: This is Sigmund's lifeline, his most used tool. When you look through it, you see a crystal clear horizon, magnified several times over. There are faint scratch marks on the bronze, where Sigmund often adjusts its length.

Notebook.name: Notebook
Notebook.description: A leather bound, faded notebook with various notes and sketches.
Notebook.examine_text: Flipping through the pages, you see numerous sketches of the nearby landscapes and coastlines, detailed notes of daily occurrences, movement maps and other tactical information. A testament to Sigmund's constant vigilance and meticulousness.

Pencil.name: Pencil
Pencil.description: A simple graphite pencil, worn down to a stub from use.
Pencil.examine_text: A testament to Sigmund's attention to detail, the pencil is heavily worn down and sharpened to a fine point. It's not special in any way, but it does its job quite well, recording every sight and observation Sigmund makes.

Journeyman Jolene.name: Journeyman Jolene
Journeyman Jolene.description: A young woman in an unassuming tunic, she restlessly paces the Murder Hole, broom in hand, clearing the debris brought by time and sieges.
Journeyman Jolene.persona: Despite the danger, I am tasked with maintaining these walls, making sure they're always ready. It's sweaty and grueling, but someone's got to do it.
Journeyman Jolene.goal: Her goal is to keep the Murder Hole clean and ready for use at any time.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A well-worn wooden broom with frayed bristles.
Broom.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the broom appears to be quite old and well-used. Despite its worn condition, it's unmistakably sturdy and perfectly suited for cleaning the stone floors of the tower.

Dustpan.name: Dustpan
Dustpan.examine_text: The dustpan, despite its rust spots, carries its own weight in assisting with the cleaning duties. Its handle is bent a little from use, but it's still quite functional.

Cloth.name: Cloth
Cloth.description: A frayed, but clean, white cloth.
Cloth.examine_text: Examining the cloth reveals countless small stains and signs of age, but it remains soft and absorbent. Its frequent use in cleaning the murder hole is evident.

locations.name: Keep
locations.description: The keep is the most fortified part of the castle. Swords, bows and arrows, lances, and armor are housed here. From the stone windows you can see past the castle walls into the surrounding fields. This is the castle's last defense.
locations.background: The keep has stood for centuries, never having been taken in battle. The keep holds weapons and armor, to be sure, but it also holds many of the king's most valued treasures. If the keep goes, so goes the kingdom.

travel_descriptions.west: Moving from the sturdy stone keep filled with treasured weapons and items, the journey westward leads one to the heart of the King's Castle. The transition takes on a clear shift from the militaristic environment to royal opulence.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A steel sword leaning against the wall.
Sword.examine_text: The sword is made of well-polished steel, its blade is sharp and unmarred. A lustrous ruby is embedded in the hilt.

Armor.name: Armor
Armor.examine_text: The armor is made of layered steel plates, all expertly crafted and fitted. It looks heavy but wearable.

Arrow.name: Arrow
Arrow.description: A bunch of arrows in a quiver.
Arrow.examine_text: The arrows are long and sleek with exceptionally sharp points. The feathers at the end are carefully fletched for accurate flight.

Lance.name: Lance
Lance.description: A long lance leaning in the corner.
Lance.examine_text: The lance looks heavy and difficult to manage, but in the hands of a skilled knight, deadly in a charge.

Treasure Chest.name: Treasure Chest
Treasure Chest.description: A large chest overflowing with jewelry and gold.
Treasure Chest.examine_text: The chest is made of dark wood with intricate carvings. Inside, it's filled with gold coins, jewels, goblets, and other treasures.

Sir Gregory.name: Sir Gregory
Sir Gregory.description: A stern, older man with grizzled hair and a sturdy build. He is armored in a suit that has seen countless battles, the scars of which mark the once shining metal.
Sir Gregory.persona: I've defended this keep for more years than I care to admit. It's my life's work and I intend to keep it guarded until my last breath.
Sir Gregory.goal: To defend the keep at all costs.

Iron Sword.name: Iron Sword
Iron Sword.description: A hefty iron sword, worn but reliable.
Iron Sword.examine_text: The sword has seen many battles, the blade is slightly dulled and there are notches along the edges. But, there's still a deadly sharp point. You notice the name 'Gregory' engraved on the hilt. The grip is wrapped with worn leather, stained from years of use.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A robust wooden shield, covered in scarred and battle-worn metal.
Shield.examine_text: Upon close inspection, you see the wood is deeply engraved with the scars of many battles. The metal cover is tarnished yet solid, painted with a faded crest of a lion – Sir Gregory's personal symbol. The inside of the shield shows wear from years of being gripped in battle.

Flask of Ale.name: Flask of Ale
Flask of Ale.description: A flask filled with a frothy brew.
Flask of Ale.examine_text: This flask is fashioned from weathered leather, held together by sturdy stitches. Through a clear window in the leather, you can see a dark liquid sloshing about. It smells of strong ale - arguably the best companion in one's late nights watching over the keep.

Lady Ermengarde.name: Lady Ermengarde
Lady Ermengarde.description: A fine and noble woman dressed in rich fabrics, her wisdom is matched only by the jewels she oversees in the Keep's treasury.
Lady Ermengarde.persona: As the King's trusted treasurer, I am responsible for the safekeeping of the kingdom's wealth and ensuring it is put to good use. And I take that responsibility very seriously.

Golden Key.name: Golden Key
Golden Key.description: A sturdy key made of pure gold.
Golden Key.examine_text: The golden key is ornately designed with intricate patterns etched onto its handle. It's hefty to hold, signifying its importance. The key, despite its age, has been kept in impeccable condition.

Kingdom's Ledger.name: Kingdom's Ledger
Kingdom's Ledger.description: An ancient, hefty ledger that keeps account of the kingdom's expenditures.
Kingdom's Ledger.examine_text: The ledger is bound in leather and filled with parchment pages, each meticulously filled out with ink detailing the kingdom's expenditures and earnings. Each line written with care, indicating the seriousness with which Lady Ermengarde handles the finances.

Emerald Necklace.name: Emerald Necklace
Emerald Necklace.description: A necklace embedded with the finest of emeralds.
Emerald Necklace.examine_text: The emerald necklace is truly a sight to behold. Each emerald is matched in size and flawlessly cut, the light reflecting off it in dazzling patterns. It is a clear symbol of the wealth and prosperity of the kingdom.

Roderick the Page.name: Roderick the Page
Roderick the Page.description: A lanky, young boy with wide eyes for every new sight. His uniform is clean but it's clear that the life of servitude is very new to him.
Roderick the Page.persona: My goal is to serve Sir Gregory and Lady Ermengarde loyally and ascend the ranks of the kingdom's services.
Roderick the Page.goal: To rise in the ranks of service and prove his worth to the kingdom.

Tray of Food.name: Tray of Food
Tray of Food.description: A large tray, filled with different kinds of delicacies like cheeses, meats, and fruits.
Tray of Food.examine_text: A grand tray heaped with food fit for a king. The meats are well-cooked, fruit fresh and luminous in appearance. The scent wafting from the assortment would make anyone's mouth water.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A duster made of soft, delicate feathers. Used for cleaning.
Feather Duster.examine_text: A long wooden handle with a gathering of soft white feathers on one end. With this, Roderick can dust off the keep and keep everything looking spick and span.

Copy of 'Courtly Manners'.name: 'Courtly Manners'
Copy of 'Courtly Manners'.description: A book on the manners and decorum expected at court.
Copy of 'Courtly Manners'.examine_text: Thick and well-bound, seems hardly touched. The pages contain lessons on how to properly address royalty, the proper way to behave in court, and a myriad of other situations. It's all essential knowledge for a page like Roderick.

locations.name: Southernmost Tower Entryway
locations.description: The rather drab tower was made of gray stones approximately all the same size. Artwork hung on the walls depicting battle scenes from long ago but even the color from these had faded with time. The cold, outside air seeped in through every small crack and crevice leaving a damp quality to the air. Sealed off rooms lined the perimeter and obviously had not been seen by human eyes for centuries.
locations.background: This tower was the first built to accompany the castle and was majestic in its heyday. It stood four stories tall, gleaming white with parapets on the top. The Southernmost Tower served as the guest quarters for visitors to the castle and was talked about throughout the land. After the Heinous Wars the castle was left to rot when its inhabitants fled for their lives. The castle and its accompanying tower stand as a footnote in history now.

travel_descriptions.north: Moving towards the North, you head into the heart of the tower. The walls grow closer as you progress, giving a sense of being enclosed within a great structure of power and might.
travel_descriptions.inside: As you step inside, you leave the exterior surroundings behind and find yourself in a new environment. The air becomes colder, the lighting dimmer and the echoes of your footsteps resound within the stone walls.

Ancient Tapestry.name: Ancient Tapestry
Ancient Tapestry.description: A faded tapestry depicting a legendary battle scene.
Ancient Tapestry.examine_text: This tapestry hangs on the wall radiating history. The threads, although time-worn and faded still hold the colors of the regiments that once took part in the legendary battle it depicts. There's a solemn aura around it, possibly from the millions of warriors it represents who fought bravely in the past.

Mossy Stone.name: Mossy Stone
Mossy Stone.examine_text: The stones making up the tower structure are all covered in a layer of damp moss that gives the ancient structure a greenish tinge, in this weather-beaten mossy stone you can see the traces of natural processes that have been happening for centuries.

Sealed Room Door.name: Sealed Room Door
Sealed Room Door.description: A heavily barricaded door that leads to a mysterious room.
Sealed Room Door.examine_text: The door is made of solid, aged oak. There are iron rods and heavy padlocks sealing it shut. It feels cold to the touch, emitting a sense of secrecy and forgotten tales. You wonder who put these barriers here and for what purpose.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: An old, rusty sword left behind from times gone by.
Rusty Sword.examine_text: The sword is heavily oxidized, its edge dulled through neglect rather than use. Yet, despite the patina of rust, the craftsmanship still shines through. A reminder of blood-letting it has seen in the past.

Argyle.name: Argyle
Argyle.description: Older, stocky man with a barrel chest and a muscular frame built from what was clearly years of laborious work. Draped in a weathered cloak and has a thick gray beard tainted by the remnants of many meals.
Argyle.persona: I'm simple and honest. I keep my promises and don't ask for anything I can't earn. I've seen too much trouble to be easily scared, but I'm careful all the same.
Argyle.goal: He wants to restore the tower to its former glory

Iron Hammer.name: Iron Hammer
Iron Hammer.description: An old, rusted hammer with a wooden handle.
Iron Hammer.examine_text: The hammer is worn but still sturdy, despite its obvious age. It's a solid tool, made for a strong hand and rough use.

Old Key.name: Old Key
Old Key.description: An ancient key, rusted with age and heavy in your hand.
Old Key.examine_text: The old key is worn and scratched, but its teeth are sharp and pristine. It has to be used to open something important.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: A dusty whose wick still entertained a flicker of flame.
Lantern.examine_text: The lantern is a vital source of light in the dark and shadowed tower. It's perhaps the only thing standing between you and some unseen peril.

Essential Tools.name: Essential Tools
Essential Tools.description: A small backpack filled with necessary instruments: a screwdriver, socket set, chisel, and pliers.
Essential Tools.examine_text: Old, battered but indispensable tools, which might come in handy at any moment in this decrepit tower. Each item appears to be well-maintained and functional despite their age.

Rose.name: Rose
Rose.description: Young woman with bright eyes and a constant air of curiosity. She is slim, carrying a delicate frame dressed in simple tunics. She carries a satchel filled with parchment, quills, and ink.
Rose.persona: I'm new to this history thing, but I can't help but be intrigued by the past. I might seem fragile at first glance, but I can surprise you!
Rose.goal: She wants to document the history of the tower and its significance.

Diary.name: Ancient Diary
Diary.description: A leather-bound diary appears old and worn.
Diary.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the diary is filled with neatly written text, seemingly from a different time. It might contain secrets of the tower's past.

Quill Pen.name: Old Quill Pen
Quill Pen.description: A faded quill pen, apparently long-unused.
Quill Pen.examine_text: The feathers are slightly frayed but the tip appears sharp. It must've been cherished by its previous owner.

Ink.name: Bottle of Ink
Ink.description: A small bottle of ink is nearly completely dried out.
Ink.examine_text: It's a small, delicate bottle with a secure cork lid. There's just a trace amount of dried ink at the bottom.

Garrick.name: Garrick
Garrick.description: A middle-aged man, tall with sunken eyes and a worried countenance. His once elegant attire is torn and stained with dirt. His personality suggests he was once a man of importance.
Garrick.persona: I'm haunted by the past, and it's my duty to make sure it never happens again. I may be down on my luck, but I've got a will strong enough to move mountains.
Garrick.goal: He wants to uncover the secrets of the Heinous Wars to prevent future conflict.

Old War Maps.name: Old War Maps
Old War Maps.description: These are worn and faded maps of battles long past.
Old War Maps.examine_text: The maps, though old and worn, still depict clear strategic points and battle paths. They're so old, you can't recognize some of the lands.

Family Crest.name: Family Crest
Family Crest.description: This is the coat of arms of Garrick's noble family, tarnished but still powerful.
Family Crest.examine_text: The crest looks old and worn. Each quadrant represents a family value: courage, wisdom, honor and strength. It reminds Garrick of home and fuels his desire for redemption.

Heirloom Sword.name: Heirloom Sword
Heirloom Sword.description: This sword has been passed down through generations in Garrick's family.
Heirloom Sword.examine_text: The sword, though old, is still in perfect working condition. It feels balanced and ready for battle. The crest of Garrick's family is etched into the hilt, a constant reminder of his duty.

locations.name: Weapon Closet
locations.description: The closet is a small dark room. There are different types of swords, axes, bows and arrows, and other types of weapons organized inside of the closet. It is just a barren, dark room with simple white walls and wooden floor.
locations.background: The closet was just a part of the tower that was built in case people needed supplies during violent times.

travel_descriptions.inside: Moving from the weapon closet to the arsenal, you traverse a short, stone corridor, lined with torches. The air grows progressively cooler as you approach the arsenal. The faint sounds of echoing metallic clangs grow louder as you get closer.

rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty_sword.description: An old, rusty sword that has seen better days.
rusty_sword.examine_text: You see a rusty sword. Its edge is dull, and it clearly has not been cared for in a very long time.

dusty_bow.name: Dusty Bow
dusty_bow.description: A long bow covered in dust and cobwebs. It seems like it was not used for years.
dusty_bow.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the bowstring seems a bit frayed but it's still taut and usable.

arrow_quiver.name: Arrow Quiver
arrow_quiver.description: A quiver filled with arrows lies discarded on the closet floor.
arrow_quiver.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the arrows seem to be in good condition, despite the dust.

battle_axe.name: Battle Axe
battle_axe.description: A heavy battle axe is leaning against the closet wall.
battle_axe.examine_text: The axe, though quite heavy, is in excellent condition and its blade is sharp. It could do some serious damage.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: A bulky, stalwart figure with steel armour, the Guard has a stern, weather-beaten face and a grim, silent demeanour.
Guard.persona: I've seen my fair share of bloodshed and battles, protecting this tower is my sworn duty. I've spent countless nights on my perch, ever vigilant, always ready for whatever comes our way.
Guard.goal: To protect the tower and its inhabitants from any threats.

Halberd.name: Halberd
Halberd.description: A heavy and impressively large weapon.
Halberd.examine_text: The halberd is an intricately decorated weapon with a combination of a large axe and a spear on a long pole. It's clearly been used in many fights, as it bears numerous nicks and scratches.

Whistle.name: Whistle
Whistle.examine_text: The small whistle is made of polished silver, worn from use. You can see the guard's initials engraved on its side.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: A sturdy, reliable source of light.
Lantern.examine_text: The lantern is old but well-cared-for. Its glass is clean and clear, and its metal frame is sturdy despite its age.

Security Key.name: Security Key
Security Key.description: A key with a small security emblem on it.
Security Key.examine_text: This key is made of heavy iron and has the security emblem of the tower engraved on it. It must open something important.

Weaponsmith.name: Weaponsmith
Weaponsmith.description: A grizzled old man with gnarled hands and a blackened smock, the Weaponsmith is a master of all things metal and war.
Weaponsmith.persona: Even after all these years, the ring of the hammer on anvil is music to my ears. I've crafted every weapon in this closet, and each fits its wielder as if it were an extension of their own body.
Weaponsmith.goal: To ensure all weapons are in peak condition and ready for use.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.examine_text: The hammer is beautifully wrought, with a polished wooden handle and a heavy, steel head. Despite its obvious age, it is impeccably maintained and seems as if it could still be used for smithing without any problem.

Tongs.name: Tongs
Tongs.description: A sturdy pair of blacksmith's tongs.
Tongs.examine_text: The tongs are heavy and robust, designed to hold hot metal without bending or breaking. Years of use have given them a deep, black color.

Heavy Apron.name: Heavy Apron
Heavy Apron.description: A rugged leather apron, designed to protect a blacksmith from sparks and flying bits of metal.
Heavy Apron.examine_text: The apron is made of thick, dark leather, singed and marked in spots from the harsh conditions of the forge. Despite the wear and tear, it does its job admirably, providing excellent protection.

Superior Steel Ingot.name: Superior Steel Ingot
Superior Steel Ingot.description: A single block of steel, carefully crafted and ready to be forged into a weapon.
Superior Steel Ingot.examine_text: The steel ingot shines with a cold, hard light. It's exceptionally pure, the result of careful refinement and craftsmanship. It's waiting to be transformed into a tool or a weapon.

Trainee.name: Trainee
Trainee.description: A scrawny youth filled with jittery energy, the Trainee is armed with nothing but a training sword and oversized helmet that covers his eyes.
Trainee.persona: I've always dreamed of being a hero, like those knights in the stories. But it's harder than it looks. The swords are heavy, armour doesn't fit right, and I can barely see out the slot in this helmet!
Trainee.goal: To someday become a proficient warrior.

Training Sword.name: Training Sword
Training Sword.description: A basic sword made of light-weight wood. Not sharpened.
Training Sword.examine_text: The sword is mostly made out of a light-weight, polished wood with an iron hilt. It's clearly meant for trainees like you who have not mastered the weight and balance of real, sharp swords. It's perfect for practicing swings and blocks.

Ill-fitting Helmet.name: Ill-fitting Helmet
Ill-fitting Helmet.description: A large metal helmet that is too big for your head.
Ill-fitting Helmet.examine_text: It's a standard knight's helmet, made of steel and quite shiny. It is, however, ridiculously large for your head. You have to struggle to keep your head up straight while wearing it, and your vision becomes severely limited when you wear it. There's no padding inside to soften the weight or improve the fit.

locations.name: Dining Hall
locations.description: The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
locations.background: This dining hall was once the center of a huge conflict between two families. The argument was between two sons at dinner shortly after their dad had passed away. They fought over who would take over the throne, which led to the first bloodbath inside the kingdom. The younger son was victorious and the older son was slain to death.

travel_descriptions.north: You find yourself walking along a cold stone corridor, the flickering torchlight casting long shadows on the walls. The closer you get to The Great Hall, the louder you hear the general hubbub and clink of silverware against plates. A sense of majesty and grandeur start to set in.
travel_descriptions.south: As you walk towards the kitchens, the delicious aroma of roasting meats, fresh herbs, and baking bread reach your nostrils. The clatter of pots and pans become louder as you approach, along with the occasional sizzle and crackle. Despite the unpleasant sight of live animals ready to be butchered, you can't help but anticipate a delightful gastronomical experience.

Elegant Wooden Table.name: Elegant Wooden Table
Elegant Wooden Table.description: A long, elegant wooden table that dominates the center of the dining hall.
Elegant Wooden Table.examine_text: The wood of the table is rich, dark and glossy, and it has been carved with intricate patterns of leaves and vines. It has seen many meals and many conflicts.

Ornate Chair.name: Ornate Chair
Ornate Chair.description: An ornate chair, upholstered with plush velvet.
Ornate Chair.examine_text: The chair's back and arms are carved with motifs of roses and thorns. It gives off an air of power and luxury. This is where the sons had their last argument.

Rustic Silverware.name: Rustic Silverware
Rustic Silverware.description: A set of rustic silverware, laid out at each place setting.
Rustic Silverware.examine_text: A complete set of silverware, including a knife, fork, and spoon, each piece ornately designed with a rustic touch. Despite its age, it's kept quite clean.

Gold Plate.name: Gold Plate
Gold Plate.description: A gold plate at each place setting.
Gold Plate.examine_text: A solid gold plate with intricate engravings along the edge. Its presence adds a layer of opulence to the dining table.

Painting of Knights.name: Painting of Knights
Painting of Knights.description: A painting of knights in battle, hung on the wall.
Painting of Knights.examine_text: The painting is large and imposing, depicting a fierce battle scene. The knights in the painting are locked in combat, faces filled with grim determination.

King Robert.name: King Robert
King Robert.description: A middle-aged man with a beard that flows down to his chest, wearing a vibrant royal robe and an ornate crown seated at the head of the table.
King Robert.persona: I am King Robert, the ruler of this realm. I am stern, yet fair, and devoted to the well-being of my kingdom.
King Robert.goal: To maintain peace and prosperity in my kingdom.

Enchanted Sword.name: Enchanted Sword
Enchanted Sword.description: A mystic weapon of King Robert laying on the table.
Enchanted Sword.examine_text: This is an exquisitely crafted weapon embedded with magical gems. It has been through many battles, yet it remains flawless and sharp.

Crown of the Elders.name: Crown of the Elders
Crown of the Elders.description: The Crown of Elders lies at the head of the table.
Crown of the Elders.examine_text: The crown is shimmering with ancient runic inscriptions and twinkling gemstones which holds magical powers blessed by the ancestors. It symbolizes the authority and leadership of the king.

Royal Decree.name: Royal Decree
Royal Decree.description: Across the table lies an unopened Royal Decree.
Royal Decree.examine_text: It's a scroll paper sealed with the royal emblem of the kingdom. The paper seems worn out but the writing is still legible. It might reveal some important information.

Sir Gowan.name: Sir Gowan
Sir Gowan.description: An armored knight with a slender build. His dented armor and chiseled face tell tales of countless battles.
Sir Gowan.persona: I am Sir Gowan, sworn knight of this realm. My duty is to protect the kingdom and its king with my life.
Sir Gowan.goal: To protect the king at all costs.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: An old, neglected sword with a dull blade and a worn-out grip.
Rusty Sword.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the sword may be rusty with age, but the blade still offers a glimmer of sharpness. The grip, while worn-out, seems to perfectly fit a hand of average size. It once belonged to a brave knight and has seen many battles.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A sturdy, large, circular shield with the emblem of the kingdom inscribed on it.
Shield.examine_text: The silver shield, though worn by time, still stands robust. The emblem of the kingdom- a fiery dragon, is inscribed at the center. It exhibits an array of faint scratches and dents from past battles. It is meant to protect its owner from any harm.

Scroll of Pardon.name: Scroll of Pardon
Scroll of Pardon.description: A historic scroll from the king, granting pardon to any crimes committed within the kingdom's realm.
Scroll of Pardon.examine_text: The scroll is made from a coarsely textured, yet delicate parchment. In elegant lettering, it grants full pardon for any crimes committed within the kingdom's realm. It has the king's seal at the bottom, embossed in golden red wax, a decree none can dispute.

Lady Eldra.name: Lady Eldra
Lady Eldra.description: A striking lady with long, flowing hair, elegant in a silver dress, with a gentle smile and a shimmering pendant around her neck.
Lady Eldra.persona: I, Lady Eldra, am the trusted advisor to the king. My wit and wisdom have guided this kingdom through numerous trials.
Lady Eldra.goal: To use my wisdom and insight to guide the kingdom through prosperity and peace.

Silver Pendant.name: Silver Pendant
Silver Pendant.description: An intricate silver pendant that once belonged to Lady Eldra.
Silver Pendant.examine_text: The pendant appears to be made of pure silver. It's storied with intricate engravings that represent the royal line of the kingdom.

Book of Prophecies.name: Book of Prophecies
Book of Prophecies.description: Lady Eldra's book of prophecies. It's filled with her visions of the future kingdom.
Book of Prophecies.examine_text: Bound in dragonhide, the rusty, ancient pages are filled with indecipherable runes. Its cryptic writings foretell of the kingdom's future trials and triumphs

Orb of Visions.name: Orb of Visions
Orb of Visions.description: A magical orb used by Lady Eldra to see into the future.
Orb of Visions.examine_text: The orb is an ever-changing mosaic of colors, seemingly full of swirling mists and shadowy figures. It gives off faint, mystical light, pulsating with a rhythm that seems as old as time itself

locations.name: Jail Entrance
locations.description: The jail entrance is massive with a huge fence. There are guards on all sides. There are barbs and dangerous things surrounding.
locations.background: The jail holds the worst criminals in the city. There are some bad people that need to be kept in jail. They guard it heavily to ensure this.

travel_descriptions.inside: The short walk from the imposing entrance to the interior of the jail is chilling. The aura is intense with an undercurrent of foreboding, and the silence only adds to the tension.

Iron Fence.name: Iron Fence
Iron Fence.description: A high fence made of strong iron bars.
Iron Fence.examine_text: The fence is exceptionally tall and formidable, a warning to any who would think to cross it. It’s topped with barbed wire, and the iron’s been worn with age, but not to a point of weakness, only serving to make the obstacle look all the more impenetrable.

Guard Tower.name: Guard Tower
Guard Tower.description: A tall tower with guards keeping a close watch on the vicinity.
Guard Tower.examine_text: The guard tower is tall and grim, with a spotlight that constantly roves the yard. Guards armed with rifles are visible behind its fortified windows. It seems impossible to pass unnoticed.

Barbed Wire.name: Barbed Wire
Barbed Wire.description: A roll of sharp, pricking barbed wire surrounding the area.
Barbed Wire.examine_text: Sharp, menacing barbs protrude from a twisted wire which is wound maliciously around the fence. This isn’t a touch and go scenario; even the slightest brush could prove seriously harmful.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: A stern, unfriendly guard watching diligently.
Guard.examine_text: Dressed in dark, uniform attire, their daunting presence suggests they are not to be messed with. Their eyes, sharp and alert, scan the area constantly, watching for any disturbance.

Guard James.name: Guard James
Guard James.description: Guard James, a tall and robust man with sharp stern eyes that miss nothing. He wears the traditional guard uniform with heavy duty boots.
Guard James.persona: I always stay vigilant. It's my duty to prevent any escapes and I have complete trust in my fellow guards.
Guard James.goal: My goal is to ensure the jail is secure from inside as well as outside.

Walkie Talkie.name: Walkie Talkie
Walkie Talkie.examine_text: A black, sturdy walkie talkie with guards' common frequency set. It looks heavily used with slight scuff markings and a strong antenna.

Keys to the Jail.name: Keys to the Jail
Keys to the Jail.examine_text: A set of large and heavy iron keys, with numbers imprinted on each to denote the corresponding doors in the jail. Attached to a large metal ring, hardly would they be misplaced.

Pepper Spray.name: Pepper Spray
Pepper Spray.examine_text: A small canister with an easy-grip surface and safety cap. It's labelled 'Guardian 5 MK-4', suggesting a high potency of capsaicin mixture for disabling any assaulting convicts.

Taser.name: Taser
Taser.examine_text: A black and yellow, standard issue X26 Taser. The small LED interface shows it's fully charged and ready to deliver incapacitating electricity to a target.

Captain Harris.name: Captain Harris
Captain Harris.description: Captain Harris is a middle-aged officer with grizzled hair and a scar across his cheek. He’s weathered and tough, carrying a stern countenance.
Captain Harris.persona: Discipline and order are my principles. I won't let the criminals out of my sight.
Captain Harris.goal: My goal is to maintain peace and order within and around the jail.

Nightstick.name: Nightstick
Nightstick.description: A heavy nightstick carried by Captain Harris.
Nightstick.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the nightstick is dark black, made of hardened plastic. It's heavily used with many scratches and dents.

Handcuffs.name: Handcuffs
Handcuffs.description: A pair of metal handcuffs on Captain Harris's belt.
Handcuffs.examine_text: These handcuffs shine in silver color, marked with police initials. They look strong enough to hold the toughest criminals.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description: A service pistol issued to Captain Harris.
Pistol.examine_text: On examining, you see a standard police pistol with a matte black finish. It is loaded and ready to use.

Sniffer Dog - Rex.name: Sniffer Dog - Rex
Sniffer Dog - Rex.description: Rex is a highly trained German Shepherd with a sharp sense of smell and instinct. His glaring eyes and canines clearly show his ferocity.
Sniffer Dog - Rex.persona: I'm as loyal as they come. I protect the jail entrance and alert the guards if I sense any threat.
Sniffer Dog - Rex.goal: My goal is to stop any suspect or criminal trying to sneak into or out of the jail.

Sniffer Dog - Rex.name: Sniffer Dog - Rex
Sniffer Dog - Rex.description: A highly trained, loyal sniffer dog known for his sharp senses and agile responses.
