Sniffer Dog - Rex.examine_text: Rex, a sniffer dog, stands at attention, his stern and alert gaze sweeping across the area. His body is lean and muscular, bristling with the energy of a trained, doubting responder. His sharp senses and intelligence are widely known, making him a crucial asset at the jail.

Guard Uniform.name: Guard Uniform
Guard Uniform.description: The standard uniform worn by all the guards at the jail.
Guard Uniform.examine_text: The uniforms are made up of a sturdy material and colored in official dark tones. Patches indicating rank and service adorn the sleeves. The uniform helps maintain a professional and reliable appearance, as well as providing protection.

Radio.name: Radio
Radio.description: A handheld device used for communication between guards.
Radio.examine_text: The radio is robust and designed for heavy-duty use. It has different frequency channels and a built-in speaker for hands-free operation. This tool plays a crucial role in ensuring effective communication among guards.

Barbed Wire.name: Barbed Wire
Barbed Wire.description: Rusty and sharp, the barbed wire is an effective deterrent for anyone thinking of breaching the jail.
Barbed Wire.examine_text: The barbed wire is strung tautly across the fence, its sharp metal prongs glinting ominously in the sun. It makes a clear statement: this place is off-limits and dangerous.

locations.name: Curved Hallway
locations.description: The curved hallway is made of large, blocky stones that provide a secure defense. The walls are streaked with dark water stains. Light from thin arrow slits streaks down at angles as the hallway curves gently to the left. An old, wooden door is tucked into the eastern side of the wall.
locations.background: The tower was built with several levels of floors, each with a small hallway surrounding an inner room.

travel_descriptions.north: Walking through the curved hallway to the north, eerie darkness engulfs the surroundings and silence permeates the air. It's cold, just like the weathered stone walls. Upon reaching the end, appears the Murder Hole.
travel_descriptions.south: Venturing south through the hallway, the scent of old stone and metal becomes pungent; a testament to the tower's age. The hallway’s torchlight flickers across countless artifacts, and finally, the Armory materializes before the eyes.

Old Wooden Door.name: Old Wooden Door
Old Wooden Door.description: An aged, hardwood door with worn metal details
Old Wooden Door.examine_text: A heavy door made from old, hard wood that's darkened with age. The metal details, although worn, are still intricate and impressive. There's no visible lock, hinting at perhaps a push to open mechanism.

Ancient Sword.name: Ancient Sword
Ancient Sword.description: A rusted, ancient sword that somehow still manages to retain its sharp edge
Ancient Sword.examine_text: Despite the obvious age and rust spots staining its once gleaming surface, the sword could probably still serve as a formidable weapon in the right hands. The handle, wrapped long ago in leather now dry and cracked, still provides a secure grip.

Lone Arrow Slit.name: Lone Arrow Slit
Lone Arrow Slit.description: A thin arrow slit cut into the stone wall
Lone Arrow Slit.examine_text: The arrow slit is just wide enough to allow a single streak of light to break the gloom of the hallway. It's positioned high on the wall, almost completely out of reach.

Guard Thomas.name: Guard Thomas
Guard Thomas.description: Guard Thomas is a tall, muscular man with a stern face. His uniform is dark and tailored to his strong physique and he is armed with a sharp sword at his side.
Guard Thomas.persona: I'm Guard Thomas and I ensure all who pass through this hallway have a reason to. I protect this tower with my life!
Guard Thomas.goal: His mission is to protect the tower and its inhabitants at all costs.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.examine_text: The sword has an ornate hilt with intricate motifs etched along its steel blade. It is slightly chipped from many years of use, but still quite sharp and deadly.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.examine_text: The shield is large and heavy, made of hardened oak and rimmed with iron bands. There’s a large emblem, a tower, etched into its front - indicating the guard’s allegiance to this tower.

Key to the eastern door.name: Key to the eastern door
Key to the eastern door.examine_text: The iron key is weighty and slightly rusted over time. The head of the key is decorated with a crest that matches the tower's - a certain indication that it opens something within this structure.

Maid Milly.name: Maid Milly
Maid Milly.description: Maid Milly is a middle-aged woman, with soft features and a friendly smile. She is clothed in a faded dress and carries a bundle of cleaning supplies.
Maid Milly.persona: I, Milly, take pride in my job. Sweeping, dusting, constant cleaning to make sure the tower remains pristine.
Maid Milly.goal: Her daily objective is to keep the tower spick and span.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A long, wooden broom that looks well used.
Broom.examine_text: This is a long, sturdy broom made of wood. The bristles are slightly frayed and worn, showing its regular use. There's even a small golden label that reads 'Property of Maid Milly'.

Duster.name: Duster
Duster.description: A feather duster, tinged gray from dust.
Duster.examine_text: Looking more closely, you can see that this feather duster is made from a collection of fine, soft feathers bound to a wooden handle. They're dense and slightly gray, having gathered dust from much use.

Cleaning Solution.name: Cleaning Solution
Cleaning Solution.description: An old bottle of homemade cleaning solution.
Cleaning Solution.examine_text: This is an old, glass bottle that carries a liquid with a sharp, clean scent. The label on it is handwritten, likely by Milly, it reads 'Milly's Magic Cleanser'.

Old Haggard.name: Old Haggard
Old Haggard.description: Old Haggard is an aging man, hunched and frail. Clad in moth-eaten robes, his eyes gleam with a hint of unseen knowledge.
Old Haggard.persona: I am Old Haggard. I've seen the tower grow and prosper throughout my time.
Old Haggard.goal: His purpose is to preserve the history and secrets of the tower.

Glasses.name: Glasses
Glasses.description: Old, bifocal glasses with gold frames. They look as though they've seen many years of use.
Glasses.examine_text: Upon close examination, you notice the lenses of these glasses are thick and worn. The thin gold frames slightly bent, giving an idea about how truly old these are. The glasses seem to have been meticulously maintained despite their age.

Cane.name: Cane
Cane.description: An old yet sturdy cane made of carved oak. It's style is timeless, complementing its age.
Cane.examine_text: Examining the cane closer, it shows signs of wear, but the craftsmanship is noteworthy. The cane ends with a beautifully carved dragon's head with eyes made of small garnets. Anyone wielding this would stand with a sense of confidence and dignity.

Ancient book.name: Ancient book
Ancient book.description: A large, weathered book. Its title is unrecognizable, having been worn through time.
Ancient book.examine_text: Upon examining, you notice the brown leather cover faintly etched with sigils and symbols that are alien to the common eye. Inside, the pages are filled with the Old Haggard's notes, diagrams, and scratches in a language that is not understandable without proper examination. This must be the ancient book of tower history, known to only a few.

locations.name: The Armory
locations.description: The near top of the tower 6 feet before the very top. Where the watchers keep their eye out for trouble. It's made of stone and has doors to several places including the outside. there are weapons from all over the world held within the armory.
locations.background: The great tower in the kingdom has held visage over the royal city for many years. Every guard would give their live to keep the tower standing. If the tower to ever fall the Royal city will surely fall with the tower.

travel_descriptions.north: Leaving the armory, you step into the dimly lit Curved Hallway. The stone underfoot is smooth and solid, a testament to its age. Your footsteps echo in the silence as you navigate through the bend of the hallway, guided by faint streams of light filtering through the small arrow slits in the wall.

Broad Sword.name: Broad Sword
Broad Sword.description: A large, double-edged sword made of high-quality steel.
Broad Sword.examine_text: The sword has a well-crafted hilt that's adorned with emeralds. The blade gleams as it catches the light, showing signs of meticulous care.

Chainmail Vest.name: Chainmail Vest
Chainmail Vest.description: A protective garment made from small metal rings linked together in a pattern to form a mesh.
Chainmail Vest.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the chainmail appears to be made out of thousands of tiny, interlinked rings. They seem to be still strong, providing excellent protection.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A large, round wooden shield, used for deflecting or bluntly striking.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is large and round, made from solid oak, reinforced by an inner ring of metal. The edges are worn from use, but it's still perfectly functional.

Helmet.name: Helmet
Helmet.description: A protective headgear made of metal
Helmet.examine_text: The helmet is smooth, finished in a dull grey. It is lined with leather on the inside for comfort, and provides a narrow slit for vision.

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.examine_text: The arrows are sleek and light. Each arrow tip is wickedly sharp; perfect for piercing targets.

Guard Captain Roldan.name: Guard Captain Roldan
Guard Captain Roldan.description: Captain Roldan is a middle-aged man with bulging muscles and stern-looking eyes. His brown beard is streaked with grey, and he wears a plate armor etched with the insignia of the kingdom.
Guard Captain Roldan.persona: I am the stalwart defender of this tower, duty bound to keep it and the kingdom safe. With my trusty greatsword at my side, I am a force to be reckoned with.
Guard Captain Roldan.goal: Guard Captain Roldan's goal is to ensure the security of the tower and the kingdom at all costs.

greatsword.name: greatsword
greatsword.description: A hefty, impressively crafted greatsword. It feels powerful in hand.
greatsword.examine_text: The greatsword carries the insignia of the kingdom on the hilt. Its long, double-edged blade lends itself well to fluid, deadly swings. It's obvious this is Guard Captain Roldan's weapon of choice.

heavy plate armor.name: heavy plate armor
heavy plate armor.description: A full suit of heavy plate armor, shining with a well-kept gleam.
heavy plate armor.examine_text: The armor is covered in the emblems of the kingdom. The plates are masterfully crafted and fitted, providing maximum protection without hindering movement. This armor is likely what keeps Guard Captain Roldan safe from danger.

tower key.name: tower key
tower key.description: A large, ornately designed key. It has the look of importance.
tower key.examine_text: On closer look, the key is covered with intricate patterns that match those on the doors in the tower, implying it unlocks something of significance here. This key probably unlocks the entrance to the top of the tower.

Watcher Cian.name: Watcher Cian
Watcher Cian.description: Cian is a youthful man with keen green eyes and short brown hair, dressed in a guard's uniform. His gaze rarely leaves the horizon.
Watcher Cian.persona: They call me the ‘Eagle of the Tower’. Stationed high in the armory, every movement outside is within my watch. Alert and vigilant, I miss nothing.
Watcher Cian.goal: Watcher Cian's goal is to remain vigilant and report any signs of emerging threats to the kingdom.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.description: A long and sturdy bow used by Watcher Cian.
longbow.examine_text: The bow is long and sturdy, crafted from a fine yew tree. The string is tight and ready to let loose an arrow at a moment's notice. It shows signs of frequent use but is maintained well.

quiver of arrows.name: Quiver of Arrows
quiver of arrows.description: A leather quiver filled with sharp arrows.
quiver of arrows.examine_text: The quiver is made of sturdy, weather-worn leather and filled with arrows. Each arrow has been crafted with careful precision and a keen eye for detail. The feathered fletching on the arrows are well-groomed and of various colors.

spyglass.name: Spyglass
spyglass.description: A finely crafted spyglass for keeping a close watch on far-off movements.
spyglass.examine_text: The spyglass is crafted of brass and has a polished sheen. It's extendable, the various sections sliding smoothly. The glass at either end is clear, providing a sharp and focused view of the world beyond.

Squire Basile.name: Squire Basile
Squire Basile.description: A young boy brimming with excitement. His brown hair is unkempt and his clothes are slightly oversized, but he wears them with pride.
Squire Basile.persona: I'm entrusted with the care of our weapons! Not too shabby for a farm boy, huh? Someday, I hope to rise through the ranks and become a legendary knight.
Squire Basile.goal: Squire Basile dreams of proving himself and becoming a knight.

cleaning_kit.name: Cleaning Kit
cleaning_kit.description: A kit used for cleaning weapons
cleaning_kit.examine_text: The cleaning kit is well-used. It includes different sizes of brushes, oils, and cloths. Each item shows signs of regular use, and there's even some rust on the scraps of cloth from the last cleaning.

spare_weapon_parts.name: Spare Weapon Parts
spare_weapon_parts.description: Assorted spare parts for various weapons
spare_weapon_parts.examine_text: The spare parts are organized neatly; you see various blades, hilts, and pieces of all shapes and sizes. Each component seems to gleam in the light, meticulously maintained to be ready at a moment's notice.

sturdy_boots.name: Sturdy Boots
sturdy_boots.description: A pair of sturdy leather boots
sturdy_boots.examine_text: These boots are made of thick, robust leather and have heavy-duty soles. You can see scratch marks and scuffing on them, but they are well taken care of and still perfectly functional.

locations.name: Alchemists Lab
locations.description: The alchemists lab is a hidden, mysterious chamber at the top of the tower. There are all sorts of beakers and potions laid out on wooden tables. Smoke and light emanate from the experiments. A large shelf holds jars of strange ingredients, and in the center of the room there is some sort of huge vat of brewing liquid, bubbling and steaming.
locations.background: The alchemist masquerades as a simple noble man, living in the tower with his family and court. Secretly, he is an evil alchemist who is plotting strange things in this hidden tower chamber.

travel_descriptions.east: You leave the chaotic and mysterious atmosphere of the Alchemists Lab behind, entering a simple hallway before stepping into the Alchemist’s intimate, secret sanctum: his bedroom. The anticipation and curiosity hangs heavy on your shoulders as you make the transition.

Alchemist's Table.name: Alchemist's Table
Alchemist's Table.description: A worn wooden table covered in various scientific equipment and strange concoctions.
Alchemist's Table.examine_text: Looking closer, you see beakers, flasks, and tubes with colorful liquid inside them. Scratches and burn marks show the age and heavy use of the table.

Shelf of Ingredients.name: Shelf of Ingredients
Shelf of Ingredients.description: A tall, wooden shelf, filled with glass jars containing various mysterious substances.
Shelf of Ingredients.examine_text: Each jar carries a different item, some are organics like leaves and animal parts, others are minerals or unknown substances.

Brewing Vat.name: Brewing Vat
Brewing Vat.description: A large vat containing a bubbling brew, it gives off a peculiar scent.
Brewing Vat.examine_text: It's steaming hot and the bubbles are a strange assortment of colors. It seems like some kind of magical brew.

Alchemist's Robe.name: Alchemist's Robe
Alchemist's Robe.description: A long, dusty robe, dark in color, laying on a hanger.
Alchemist's Robe.examine_text: Made of a rich brocade, embroidered with strange symbols. It seems to be imbued with powerful magic.

Master Alchemist.name: Master Alchemist
Master Alchemist.description: A lean figure in a dark woolen cloak, with a pair of thin-rimmed spectacles perched on his hooked nose. His eyes spark with keen intellect and a hint of malevolence.
Master Alchemist.persona: I, the Master Alchemist, have the uncommon distinction of being a practitioner of the hidden arts. My mind is a labyrinth of ancient knowledge and forbidden secrets.
Master Alchemist.goal: To successfully complete the ultimate transmutation and gain immortality.

Glowing Potion.name: Glowing Potion
Glowing Potion.description: A mysterious potion, glowing with a luminescent light.
Glowing Potion.examine_text: The potion appears to contain the very essence of the cosmos, swirling with tiny, distant stars. When you look into the potion, it feels like you are gazing into another world, full of possibilities.

Ancient Alchemic Tome.name: Ancient Alchemic Tome
Ancient Alchemic Tome.description: The Master Alchemist's tome, filled with alchemic studies and arcane mysteries.
Ancient Alchemic Tome.examine_text: The tome is ancient, its leather cover almost crumbling with age. It is filled with the Master Alchemist's notes, equations, and schematics. The text is filled with the symbols of the old alchemic language, a cipher known only to a select few.

Jeweled Dagger.name: Jeweled Dagger
Jeweled Dagger.description: A dagger, encrusted with jewels. It looks expensively dangerous.
Jeweled Dagger.examine_text: The dagger glistens with gemstones from all varieties: sapphire, ruby, emerald, and diamond. Their colors shimmer and dance in the candlelight, hypnotic in their beauty.

Lady Margot.name: Lady Margot
Lady Margot.description: A beautiful woman in her late 30s with delicate features and flowing raven hair, dressed in an elegant gown. She carries with her a sense of deep melancholy.
Lady Margot.persona: I am Lady Margot, wife of the Master Alchemist. I live in fear and regret, privy to his dark secrets yet powerless to stop him.
Lady Margot.goal: To escape the tower with her children and expose her husband's dastardly deeds.

Silver Locket.name: Silver Locket
Silver Locket.description: An old, beautifully crafted silver locket that belongs to Lady Margot.
Silver Locket.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see intricate engravings on the locket. It's slightly cold to the touch. Opening it reveals a tiny oil portrait of a younger Lady Margot, before all this darkness consumed her life.

Small Vial of Antidote.name: Small Vial of Antidote
Small Vial of Antidote.description: A small vial of an unknown antidote that Lady Margot has managed to pilfer stealthily.
Small Vial of Antidote.examine_text: The vial is carefully sealed with a small cork. The liquid inside is pale blue and shimmers slightly when shaken. It's hard to tell what this antidote is specifically for, but it's clearly important.

Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins.name: Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins
Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins.description: A small velvet pouch filled with gold coins - savings from Lady Margot's personal cache.
Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins.examine_text: The rich, soft texture of the velvet contrasts with the hard, cool feel of the coins inside. Counting the coins reveals quite a substantial amount. This pouch could be Lady Margot's ticket to freedom from this prison of a tower.

Argus, The Twin Gargoyle.name: Argus, The Twin Gargoyle
Argus, The Twin Gargoyle.description: One of a pair of stone gargoyles perched high on the tower, Argus is a grotesque figure etched over centuries, yet with eyes that seem disconcertingly alive.
Argus, The Twin Gargoyle.persona: I am Argus, one half of the tower's stoic guardian pair. Though crafted of stone, my spirit is sentient, bound to serve and, when necessary, protect.
Argus, The Twin Gargoyle.goal: To protect the Master Alchemist's lab and his dark secrets from intruders.

Stone Shield.name: Stone Shield
Stone Shield.description: A sturdy shield made from solid stone, it is a part of Argus's body.
Stone Shield.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the shield is not just stone, but intricately carved with ancient runes. It looks extremely heavy, but you suppose Argus, being a gargoyle of stone, handles it with ease.

Rusted Metal Key.name: Rusted Metal Key
Rusted Metal Key.description: A rusted, old key found in the alchemist’s lab.
Rusted Metal Key.examine_text: The key looks ancient and fragile. The rust on it is very thick, it might break if you tried to force it into a lock.

locations.name: Tower Sewers
locations.description: A rank maze of sewers that lie below the tower. They course with filthy ooze from the experiments of the mad king. Rats patrol its smelly walkways. Bones of treasure seekers lie riddled across the walkways, nibbled clean by the fat rats.
locations.background: The tower sewers were built to give the mad king a means to drain the waste produced by his experiments that he conducts daily. Villagers from the area believe that treasure lie at the end of the sewer maze, but this can be no further from the truth. The mad king cackles with glee as he hears the cries of those poor fools getting eaten alive by the fat rats.

travel_descriptions.out: There is no treasure to be found here. All you see is filth. Dirty murky water and fumes rising from it burns your eyes. You see animals roaming around. Are they small dogs? No they are rodents, big rats. They glisten with the filth they are covered with. It is dark and difficult to see much else. Something tells me you don't want to know much of why it smells so bad down here.

Iron Grate.name: Iron Grate
Iron Grate.description: A rusty iron grate that covers the sewer pipe.
Iron Grate.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, this stout iron grate appears to be rotting away with rust. It's laden with lots of slimy filth and refuse that is too big to escape through its bars into the dank sewers below.

Rusty Dagger.name: Rusty Dagger
Rusty Dagger.description: An old, rusty dagger, possibly left by a previous treasure seeker.
Rusty Dagger.examine_text: You see an aged oxidized blade with a cracked wooden handle. It's rusty and stained with a hint of dried blood. While it doesn't look effective, it may still be good for self-defense against rats or worse.

Human Skeleton.name: Human Skeleton
Human Skeleton.description: The scattered bones of a human, likely once a eager treasure hunter.
Human Skeleton.examine_text: The bones are gnawed clean, pounded and sun-bleached, interspersed with tattered clothes and the rare small coin. The skull grins up at you, a permanent reminder of the tower's lethal history.

Ratty.name: Ratty
Ratty.description: Ratty is a colossal rat the size of a wolf, with beady red eyes that glint in the darkness. His matted fur, a mingling of black and red, is slick with grime and filth from the sewer.
Ratty.persona: I am the king of the sewers, yes indeed I am. Mankind...bah! They fear me and scurry at my feet, just as the rest of my subjects do. The sewer is my domain and I rule with an iron paw.
Ratty.goal: To continuously rule over the sewers.

Rat Fang.name: Rat Fang
Rat Fang.description: A sharp tooth from Ratty, the Rat King.
Rat Fang.examine_text: This fang, larger than those of average rats, is a clear sign of Ratty's reign in the sewers. It's pointed and slightly curved, with a gleaming white surface stained at the root with a hint of fetid sewer ooze.

Fat Rat Tail.name: Fat Rat Tail
Fat Rat Tail.description: The tail of Ratty, the Rat King, fat from feasting on the remains of past adventurers.
Fat Rat Tail.examine_text: The tail, a lengthy appendage covered with slick, greasy fur, appears strong and flexible. Though it might cause disgust to those faint of heart, in the sewers, it is a symbol of power and dominance.

Lost Treasure Seeker.name: Lost Treasure Seeker
Lost Treasure Seeker.description: A frail figure of a man, bones poking out of his sunken skin. His clothes, once richly woven, now in tatters clinging for dear life to his body. His eyes, an empty abyss of a lost spirit.
Lost Treasure Seeker.persona: I am a ghost of the man I once was. I came for gold, only to lose everything. The rats...they did this to me. Doomed to wander these fetid sewers until my spirit finally gives in.
Lost Treasure Seeker.goal: To finally find the rest he so desperately craves.

Torn Map.name: Torn Map
Torn Map.description: A ragged piece of parchment with barely readable inscriptions.
Torn Map.examine_text: The old, faded map is torn into several pieces. It's challenging to make out the details, but you can see some markings that could point to a location somewhere in the sewer maze. The original beauty of the map has been marred by the filth and ooze of the sewers.

Rusty Dagger.name: Rusty Dagger
Rusty Dagger.description: A rusted, weathered dagger with a dull blade.
Rusty Dagger.examine_text: The dagger is old and coated in rust. The blade is dull and its edge chipped in a few places. However, it might still offer some defense against the rats. Judging by the bloodstains, it seems the original owner fought for his life.

Mysterious Sewer Hag.name: Mysterious Sewer Hag
Mysterious Sewer Hag.description: She sits in the dark corners, barely noticeable. Bent and broken by time, her skin is rough and scaly. Her hair, a stringy cascade of sliver and white, tumbles down to her hunched shoulders. Her coal-black eyes smile maliciously.
Mysterious Sewer Hag.persona: I am but a humble hag, dwelling among the waste and filth. The foolish men, they come for the king’s gold, only to be claimed by the rats. Yet, I live in peace. The vermin knows not to trifle with me.
Mysterious Sewer Hag.goal: To watch the world outside crumble while staying safe in the sewers.

Scrap Bone.name: Scrap Bone
Scrap Bone.description: A large, gnawed bone discarded by the sewer rats.
Scrap Bone.examine_text: This is a sizable bone, likely belonging to some unfortunate soul who dared to tread the sewer's perilous paths. The rats have gnawed it clean, lending it a bleached appearance.

Glowing Mushroom.name: Glowing Mushroom
Glowing Mushroom.description: A luminous, eerie fungi that thrives in the humid condition of the tower sewers.
Glowing Mushroom.examine_text: Upon closer look, the mushroom's glow takes on a pulsating rhythm, almost as if it possesses a heartbeat. Its stem is slimy to the touch, yet sturdy, and its cap radiates a bioluminescent gleam lighting the darkness around.

Rat Skull.name: Rat Skull
Rat Skull.description: The cleanly picked skull of a large sewer rat.
Rat Skull.examine_text: The skull bears the marks of a sizable rat, its sharp teeth still intact. This macabre relic is a stark reminder of the omnipresent danger lurking in the sewer's shadows.

locations.name: Tower Kitchen
locations.description: A large Stone oven is placed in the center by the wall at the end of the room, next to it are placed many baskets containing specific kinds of food, like eggs, bread, potatoes. On the left wall beside the oven is a big table with pans and pots hanging from the ceiling above it. Many rolling pins, knives and cutting boards are scattered around the table. On the right wall beside of the oven are standing sacks of flour above which are settled small jars of powers and liquids of all kinds, and closer to the door, right next to them are hanging aprons and protective caps of the cooks who work in that kitchen. The place is very clean, shiny almost.
locations.background: The kitchen prepares meals for everyone in the tower and cooks have to make sure the quality of meals is excellent, therefore any uncleanliness is not tolerated, especially by high officials residing in the tower, ensuring the standard is the highest. The cooks are asked to wear aprons and caps at all times and the cleanliness is being checked twice a day. All this is due to an accident that happened one day when one of the highest officials in the tower fell sick with the stomach upset, and eventually died.

travel_descriptions.east: Exiting the kitchen, you enter a magnificent tower. The marble walls, trimmed in gold, ascend around a winding staircase leading to the observation deck. The ivy-lined exterior sprawls up the tower, stopping just below the top. The tower, an ornate part of the castle, stands in the corner, towering over the beautiful farmland in the countryside. It serves as a protective marker and storeroom for the kingdom's valuables.

Stone oven.name: Stone oven
Stone oven.description: A large, circular stone oven that gives out a warmth
Stone oven.examine_text: The stone oven is massive, capable of baking several loaves of bread at once. It has an iron door with a small glass viewport. It's lit from within, and you can feel the heat pulsating from the oven.

Food basket.name: Food basket
Food basket.description: Various baskets of food ingredients arranged neatly
Food basket.examine_text: These are woven baskets. Each one is filled with a specific type of fresh ingredient. One has freshly collected eggs, another has various kinds of bread, the third one has potatoes.

Cook's apron.name: Cook's apron
Cook's apron.description: An apron hanging beside the sacks of flour
Cook's apron.examine_text: This is a well-cleaned professional chef's apron. The white fabric is neatly folded, it's been hanged with care. In the front are some pockets where you can put your cooking tools.

Cook's cap.name: Cook's cap
Cook's cap.examine_text: The chef's cap is white as snow. It seems to have been ironed recently. The fabric is crisp and smells clean.

Knife.name: Knife
Knife.description: A kitchen knife with a wood handle and a shiny steel blade
Knife.examine_text: The knife's steel blade is polished to a shine. It's very sharp, and the handle feels good in your hand.

Chef Gordan.name: Chef Gordan
Chef Gordan.description: A tall, robust man with red hair and freckles, covered in a white apron and matching chef's hat on his head, always carrying a large wooden spoon combo with a fork around the kitchen.
Chef Gordan.persona: As I like to say, the beast way to a man's heart is his stomach, so cooks should be highly respected! Keeping things clean is my top priority, more so after we lost a high official to food poisoning. That incident still sends shivers down my spine.
Chef Gordan.goal: My aim is to prepare the highest quality meals and ensure the kitchen’s cleanliness is maintained at all times.

wooden_spoon.name: Wooden Spoon
wooden_spoon.examine_text: The spoon, made from solid oak, shows signs of wear and tear. Some faded stains of past meals are present. It feels comfortable in your hand, well balanced and perfect for stirring.

chef's_hat.name: Chef's Hat
chef's_hat.examine_text: This pristine hat stands impressively tall. The fabric is thick and white, symbolizing the cleanliness and professionalism of the kitchen. It carries a faint aroma of yeast and spices, a testament to many meals prepared under its peak.

white_apron.name: White Apron
white_apron.examine_text: The apron is impeccable, without a single stain or crease. Thick fabric provides ample coverage and protection. A symbol of Gordan's commitment to the cleanliness of his kitchen. Pockets are present, perfect for carrying needed utensils.

food_thermometer.name: Food Thermometer
food_thermometer.examine_text: This appears to be an expensive piece of equipment, crafted from sturdy stainless steel. It is meticulously clean, and the red mercury line is visible, ready to measure the temperature of any dish to ensure it is cooked to perfection.

Apprentice Tim.name: Apprentice Tim
Apprentice Tim.description: A young boy with tousled hair and a face covered in flour, he wears a slightly oversized apron and continuously scribbles notes in a small handbook.
Apprentice Tim.persona: I'm learning new recipes and techniques every day. It's a challenge to keep pace with Chef Gordan, but I'm determined to become as good as him one day.
Apprentice Tim.goal: To become a well-respected chef and maintain the cleanliness standards as set by Chef Gordon.

Small Notebook.name: Small Notebook
Small Notebook.description: A small, well-worn notebook filled with various recipes and notes.
Small Notebook.examine_text: This notebook has a sturdy leather cover that has been softened from use. Inside, the lined pages are filled with handwritten notes, underlined and circled words, and many, many different recipes, some in different stages of completion.

Pencil.name: Pencil
Pencil.description: A standard graphite pencil, perfect for quick note-taking.
Pencil.examine_text: This pencil has been well-used, and the graphite tip has been worn down to a nub from all the notes that have been written with it. The eraser on the other end has also been used quite a bit, leaving pink streaks on the wood of the pencil where it's been worn down.

Measuring Cups.name: Measuring Cups
Measuring Cups.description: A set of stainless steel measuring cups of different sizes.
Measuring Cups.examine_text: These measuring cups are all nest within each other, the smallest having a handle that fits neatly into the larger cup's handle. The cups have measurements engraved into the handles, ranging from a quarter cup to one whole cup.

Kitchen Maid Ellen.name: Kitchen Maid Ellen
Kitchen Maid Ellen.description: An older, graceful woman with graying hair pinned into a tight bun, she has a stern face and wears a well-worn apron.
Kitchen Maid Ellen.persona: I have been part of this kitchen for decades now. It's like my second home. Keeping it sparkling clean is something I take pride in.
Kitchen Maid Ellen.goal: To keep the kitchen spotless and ensure no such mishap happens again.

cleaning_supplies.name: Cleaning Supplies
cleaning_supplies.description: A variety of cleaning products used by Kitchen Maid Ellen to maintain the immaculate condition of the tower kitchen.
cleaning_supplies.examine_text: Numerous bottles and cans of various sizes filled with colorful liquids, each labelled with its purpose. Some for keeping bugs away, some for sanitizing surfaces, and others for polishing metals. There are also several scrubbing brushes and a pair of waterproof gloves.

dustpan_and_broom.name: Dustpan and Broom
dustpan_and_broom.description: Simple floor cleaning implements that Kitchen Maid Ellen often uses.
dustpan_and_broom.examine_text: The broom has a long, smooth wooden handle that feels sturdy. Its straw bristles are tightly bound and quite effective at gathering dust. The dustpan is made of sturdy metal with a thin edge for easy collection of dust and dirt.

mop.name: Mop
mop.description: A mop Ellen uses to clean the floors.
mop.examine_text: The mop has a long handle made of wood, topped with a two-part head consisting of a rotating mechanism, and a lot of strands of absorbent material. It has been used frequently but is still in good shape. It looks like it can handle quite a lot more cleanings.

locations.name: Kitchens
locations.description: The kitchens of the tower are a giant kabob of tables and cans of herbs and various condiments. Some VERY fresh meats are found here as well. So fresh they are... well, alive. You see holding cells for various fowl and beast in a pen in the room. The smell is not very pleasant, but the food generally tastes a lot better.
locations.background: This kitchen was built when the tower was finished. It was a clear need to have food to distribute throughout the tower. The food here is also shared with paying customers who stop in. The king himself likes to come here every so often. but the kitchens aren't completely to his desires in culinary expertise.

travel_descriptions.north: Exiting the busy, bustling kitchens, you journey northwards towards the Dining Hall. The aroma of delicious food being prepared follows you, gradually blending with the rich smell of polished wood and old tapestries as you approach the grand dining area.

CookingPot.name: Cooking Pot
CookingPot.description: A large, iron cooking pot, suitable for soups and stews.
CookingPot.examine_text: The pot is slightly worn from years of use, but it's still sturdy. There are remnants of the previous meal clinging to the sides.

Chicken.name: Chicken
Chicken.description: A live chicken, squawking and flapping in a pen.
Chicken.examine_text: The chicken is plump and has a healthy-looking coat of feathers, suggesting it's been well cared for to provide a good meal.

Table.name: Table
Table.description: A large, wooden table, covered in cooking ingredients and utensils.
Table.examine_text: The table is solid and a little bit battered from years of chopping and meal preparations. Scattered atop are various cooking utensils and ingredients like spices, vegetables, and flour.

Knife.name: Knife
Knife.description: A sharp, chef's knife. Useful for both cooking and defending oneself.
Knife.examine_text: The blade gleams menacingly. It's been sharpened to a fine edge, clearly maintained with a lot of care.

Chef Gustavo.name: Chef Gustavo
Chef Gustavo.description: A large, burly man clad in a flour-dusted apron, with a twirly mustache and glistening sweat on his forehead from the steamy heat of the kitchen.
Chef Gustavo.persona: I am Chef Gustavo, the head chef of this mighty kitchen. Nothing pleases me more than serving delicious meals to the tower's residents and guests, though the King's critical palate does add a layer of stress...
Chef Gustavo.goal: To precisely fulfill the king's intricate culinary preferences

Daisy.name: Daisy
Daisy.description: Daisy is a skinny, middle-aged woman with brawny arms. She's covered in flour from head to toe, has frizzy brown hair sneaking out of a bandana that's meant to keep it contained away from the food.
Daisy.persona: I’m Daisy, Gustavo's right hand. I clean, cook, feed the animals and occasionally taste the new dishes. It's hard work, but I love the hustle and bustle of the kitchen.
Daisy.goal: To keep the kitchen clean and running smoothly

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A small feather duster for cleaning surfaces.
Feather Duster.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the fine ostrich feathers of the duster, they are worn but clean. It's clearly well loved and often used.

Wooden Spoon.name: Wooden Spoon
Wooden Spoon.examine_text: The wooden spoon is medium-sized, made from good-quality oak. It's well worn from constant use but is still solid and reliable.

Bucket of water.name: Bucket of water
Bucket of water.description: A large bucket filled almost to the brim with clean water.
Bucket of water.examine_text: The bucket is simple and utilitarian, made of metal and quite sturdy. The water inside is clean and clear. This is used for washing dishes or mopping the floors.

Max.name: Max
Max.description: Max is a lanky boy, not older than 14 years. He has freckles all over his face, and his hands are always jumbling with some ingredient or the other.
Max.persona: I'm Max, sort of an apprentice here. I joined the crew not long ago, dreaming of becoming a great chef like Gustavo someday. I usually help Daisy with chores and learn recipes.
Max.goal: To learn the secrets of culinary expertise from Chef Gustavo

Peeler.name: Peeler
Peeler.description: A standard kitchen peeler with a comfortable grip.
Peeler.examine_text: The peeler is worn out a bit and there are stain marks. Clearly, someone uses this frequently. It has a firm grip and a sharp blade that can easily peel off any skins.

Learning Cookbook.name: Learning Cookbook
Learning Cookbook.description: A cookbook for beginners, stained with various ingredients.
Learning Cookbook.examine_text: You find plenty of common recipes which the young apprentice Max often practices. Some of the pages are stained with food, suggesting that the book is heavily used.

Bag of Potatoes.name: Bag of Potatoes
Bag of Potatoes.description: A large burlap bag packed with potatoes.
Bag of Potatoes.examine_text: Upon seeing, the bag is full with unpeeled potatoes. Although the outside is dirty, the potatoes inside are clean and fresh, ready to be turned into any delicious dish.

locations.name: Tower
locations.description: The inside tower is made from a combination of wood and brick. It also has some metal to hold all the doors in place. There are three doors and a staircase that leads up to the guards quarters.
locations.background: This inside tower is used as a guards hangout. It allows the guards to have a place to call their own. They sleep here between shifts and sometimes eat here.

travel_descriptions.west: Exiting the tower requires you to pass through a disappointingly ordinary door of stone. As you step out with broom and mop bucket nearby, you sense the humble functionality of the tower that prioritizes practicality over grandeur.
travel_descriptions.inside: As you venture further into the tower, you're welcomed by the grandeur of marble walls adorned with gold and draped with ivy. The path twists upwards, daunting yet beguiling, presenting a rich panorama of the farmland beyond as it stands tall, a marker of strength and protection.

WoodenTable.name: Wooden Table
WoodenTable.description: A stable wooden table located at the center of the room.
WoodenTable.examine_text: The table is heavy and made from oak. There are scratches and stains that narrate countless meal times and meetings.

BrickFireplace.name: Brick Fireplace
BrickFireplace.description: An old brick fireplace warms up the room.
BrickFireplace.examine_text: The bricks of the fireplace are darkened by years of smoke and use. A comforting heat radiates from it.

MetalDoor.name: Metal Door
MetalDoor.description: A sturdy metal door, leading to another part of the tower.
MetalDoor.examine_text: The door is made of strong iron, a testament to the defensive nature of the tower.

GuardUniform.name: Guard Uniform
GuardUniform.description: An official uniform of the tower guards.
GuardUniform.examine_text: The uniform is made from sturdy material. A badge is stitched onto the breast, displaying the symbol of the tower's ruling house.

LoafOfBread.name: Loaf of Bread
LoafOfBread.description: A fresh loaf of bread, presumably for the guard's meal.
LoafOfBread.examine_text: It's a well-baked loaf, perfect for a hearty meal.

Old Guard Fredrick.name: Old Guard Fredrick
Old Guard Fredrick.description: With a craggy face marred by weather and time, Fredrick always carries an air of sternness. His gray hair is cropped short and his eyes show weariness yet alertness.
Old Guard Fredrick.persona: I've been part of this guard family for almost three decades. No one knows safety and strategy as I do
Old Guard Fredrick.goal: To ensure the safety and security of the tower.

Old Short Sword.name: Old Short Sword
Old Short Sword.description: A well-worn, but sturdy short sword that's seen plenty of action.
Old Short Sword.examine_text: This sword might be old, but it still holds a sharp edge. It has a worn wooden handle that's wrapped in faded leather. The blade has several nicks and scratches showcasing its history. You see an inscription that's partially eroded, but you can make out the words, 'To Fredrick, for years of service.'

Guard Uniform.name: Guard Uniform
Guard Uniform.description: A uniform proudly worn by the guards of the tower.
Guard Uniform.examine_text: The uniform consists of a light-weight chainmail shirt under a simple tunic, emblazoned with the Tower's emblem. A pair of hard-wearing trousers and leather boots complete the outfit. All the pieces show signs of age and use, but are meticulously maintained.

Pocket watch.name: Pocket Watch
Pocket watch.description: A silver pocket watch, signaling the status of an experienced guard.
Pocket watch.examine_text: This pocket watch is a symbol of honor. It's silver, with a sturdy lid that opens to reveal a clock face. Its hands are precise, ticking in perfect rhythm, despite its age. On its back, engraving reads 'Fredrick - The Tower's Watchman'.

Young Guard Ethan.name: Young Guard Ethan
Young Guard Ethan.description: A fresh face among old souls, Ethan is tall and forged by hard training. His eyes are full of energy and ambition.
Young Guard Ethan.persona: I'm excited to be part of the guard team. I'm eager to learn and rise from a rookie to the best guard.
Young Guard Ethan.goal: To rise in the ranks and become the best guard.

New Long Sword.name: New Long Sword
New Long Sword.description: A shiny, brand new sword still gleaming with the slide scent of blacksmith's oil.
New Long Sword.examine_text: The sword is long with a sharp double-edged blade. The handle is made of an intricate design of metal and leather, providing a solid grip.

Guard Uniform.name: Guard Uniform
Guard Uniform.description: A clean, neatly pressed guard uniform. The uniform is dark blue and has a shiny golden emblem on the chest.
Guard Uniform.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the uniform appears to be made of a strong, sturdy material. The emblem on the chest represents the royal crest.

Bread Loaf.name: Bread Loaf
Bread Loaf.description: A fresh loaf of bread, the aroma is filling the air.
Bread Loaf.examine_text: The bread is golden brown, and it appears to be just out of the oven. It's crispy on the outside and soft on the inside with steam still drifting off of it.

Cook Bertha.name: Cook Bertha
Cook Bertha.description: A plump woman in her 50s, Bertha is always seen with an apron and a warm, welcoming smile. Her hair is tied back as she prepares food for the guards.
Cook Bertha.persona: I've always taken care of my boys, cooking their meals, listening to their stories.
Cook Bertha.goal: To keep the guards well-fed and comfortable.

Wooden Ladle.name: Wooden Ladle
Wooden Ladle.description: A large wooden ladle that's seen a lot of use.
Wooden Ladle.examine_text: The ladle appears to be made of solid oak. It's well-worn with clear signs of constant use in cooking. It feels sturdy in your hand, an essential tool for a cook.

Apron.name: Apron
Apron.description: A white apron stained with various food splatters.
Apron.examine_text: The apron is crafted from a rough but durable fabric. It's stained from countless meals prepared and served. A large pocket in front is ideal for holding utensils or ingredients.

A basket of fresh apples.name: A basket of fresh apples
A basket of fresh apples.description: A wicker basket filled with crisp, red apples.
A basket of fresh apples.examine_text: The basket is well made and filled with fresh, juicy apples. They're bright red, and their fresh scent fills the air. Perfect for a healthy snack or baking into a pie.

locations.name: Throne Room
locations.description: The throne room is a lavishly adorned stone fortification, with large purple and gold tapestries hanging on the walls. Between each tapestry there is a painting of the previous ruling families' patriarchs. At the center of the back wall sit's a large throne adorned with gold and silver, with a red silk cushion on it's seat.
locations.background: The throne room is where the king of the castle meets with other diplomats and rules over his kingdom. Only those close to and trusted by the King are allowed into this room, and it is heavily defended by the knights of the castle.

travel_descriptions.west: Journeying west from the opulent Throne Room towards the King's Dorm, you traverse the wide marbled corridor lined with rich velvety tapestries and high-arching windows offering panoramic views of the sprawling kingdom.

Throne.name: Throne
Throne.description: A large grandiose chair made from gold and silver
Throne.examine_text: The throne features intricate designs carved in gold and silver, with a plush red silk cushion on the seat. It looks like it is designed to fit the posterior of the Citadel's king.

Tapestries.name: Tapestries
Tapestries.examine_text: These beautifully woven wall hangings depict scenes of previous victories and royal coronations. They give the room a sense of rich history and illustrious lineage.

Paintings.name: Paintings
Paintings.description: Portraits of the previous ruling families' patriarchs
Paintings.examine_text: Each frame contains the visage of a stern and dignified patriarch. Generations of leadership are represented here; men clad in royal robes and regalia, their eyes echoing the weight of their reign.

King Roderick.name: King Roderick
King Roderick.description: A regal looking man with a full beard, grey hair, and piercing brown eyes dressed in royal robes. He wears a majestic golden crown studded with sparkling gems.
King Roderick.persona: I am King Roderick, ruler of this kingdom. I am wise yet firm, just yet kind, and always looking after my people.

golden_crown.name: Golden Crown
golden_crown.description: A bright golden crown adorning small jewel clusters
golden_crown.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the golden crown is incredibly intricate. The gold is brightly polished, almost glowing in the light. Ruby and sapphire clusters are embedded into the gold. The design is regal, a symbol of King Roderick's power and dignity.

royal_scepter.name: Royal Scepter
royal_scepter.description: An impressive golden scepter presenting a large emerald at the top
royal_scepter.examine_text: The Royal Scepter is made of the finest gold. It is top-heavy, bearing a large, glowing emerald encased in a golden eagle's claw at its peak. The scepter serves as an emblem of the ruling power of King Roderick.

royal_decree.name: Royal Decree
royal_decree.description: Scroll containing a newly issued decree from King Roderick
royal_decree.examine_text: The Royal Decree is a scroll of aged parchment, sealed with the royal emblem in wax. It contains the latest orders from King Roderick, outlining the laws and rules of his realm. The handwriting is neat, confident, and authoritative; a reflection of Roderick's demeanor.

Ser Duncan.name: Ser Duncan
Ser Duncan.description: Ser Duncan is a towering man, with broad shoulders and a stern face. He is outfitted in gleaming armor and carries a large sword at his waist.
Ser Duncan.persona: As the personal guard of King Roderick, my loyalty and duty knows no bounds. I take my responsibility seriously and I am willing to give my life for my King.
Ser Duncan.goal: Protect King Roderick from any harm.

great sword.name: Great Sword of Duncan
great sword.description: This is a massive sword, adorned with intricate carvings. The hilt is finely laced with gold and silver.
great sword.examine_text: The sword is quite large and looks very heavy. The blade is decorated with intricate carvings telling tales of past battles, victories and displays of knightly valor. The hilt is wrapped in gold and silver twine which glimmers in the light.

shield.name: Shield of Duncan
shield.description: A large, round shield, emblazoned with the sigil of King Roderick.
shield.examine_text: This large, round shield has been made with great care. The front is painted with the royal colors and bears the emblem of King Roderick. Despite being battle-worn, it still shines with the pride of its wielder.

knight's armor.name: Knight's Armor of Duncan
knight's armor.description: This is an impressive set of plated armor embellished with golden trimmings and royal sigils.
knight's armor.examine_text: The armor is clearly well-maintained despite seeing many battles. Intricate engravings on the chest plate tell the tale of Ser Duncan’s endless loyalty and bravery in the face of danger. The royal emblem is proudly displayed on the heart's place, symbolizing Duncan's allegiance to the King.

Lady Isobel.name: Lady Isobel
Lady Isobel.description: An elegant woman with meticulous braids, adorned in a richly decorated gown, with delicate hands either holding a book or shuffling through scrolls.
Lady Isobel.persona: I am the King's advisor, Lady Isobel. I have sound judgment in political matters and I carry out my role judiciously to ensure the prosperity of our kingdom.
Lady Isobel.goal: Advise King Roderick on matters of the kingdom.

ancient_scrolls.name: Ancient Scrolls
ancient_scrolls.description: A bundle of age-worn scrolls sealed with the King's seal.
ancient_scrolls.examine_text: These scrolls are yellowed with age, each one tied shut with a regal wax seal bearing the King's insignia. They appear to contain records of old kingdom matters or perhaps long-lost lore of the kingdom.

quills.name: Quills
quills.description: A set of sharp-tipped quills for writing.
quills.examine_text: These quills are sharpened to a fine point and are used for penning letters or recording information. They are kept in a charming pot that is carefully stained with ink, giving it a unique pattern.

locations.name: The King'S Quarters
locations.description: Decadent, sensual, and tranquil, the King's Quarters sparkles with the various diamonds and gold-laced furniture comprising the entire room.  Self-portraits of the king himself, his queen, and various demigods line the walls leading up to the bed.  Smooth, bear- and tiger-skin rugs cover the entire floor to protect the bare feet of scantily clad virgins who serve to the beckon and call of the king and his queen.  There is a faint smell of sandalwood wafting to and from each section of the room at all times.
locations.background: The king's quarters served as the king's royal bedroom for centuries.  It used to be the astrologist's laboratory but has since been blessed by various fertility shamans and is physically and spiritually cleansed daily by a powerful wizard.  Daily offerings are made to the paintings of the deities--various fruits, nuts, and sometimes bloodletting into a golden dish is not uncommon.

travel_descriptions.down: Made of strong granite and oak timbre, it ascends to the highest room in the tower. The granite glitters in the light from the torches that line the walls. The oak is sleek and coated in a glistening protectant. This staircase was built by the great grandfather of the current king. At the top of the staircase, in the highest tower, lies an vital scroll that holds the secret to protecting the castle.

King's Crown.name: King's Crown
King's Crown.description: A shining golden crown encrusted with numerous precious gems.
King's Crown.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the crown is not merely golden, but made of an alloy of gold and an unknown magical metal. The intricate designs convey its royal importance and the gems represent the different dominions of the king.

Sandalwood Incense.name: Sandalwood Incense
Sandalwood Incense.description: A stick of fragrant sandalwood incense, still smouldering.
Sandalwood Incense.examine_text: Up close, the sweet, woody smell of sandalwood is almost overpowering. The incense stick is placed in a delicate gold holder, the ash falling neatly into the base. A thin trail of smoke curls up from the tip, filling the room with its pleasing aroma.

Golden Fruit Bowl.name: Golden Fruit Bowl
Golden Fruit Bowl.description: A lavish golden bowl brimming with a variety of exotic fruits.
Golden Fruit Bowl.examine_text: This isn't just any fruit bowl-- it's a royal fruit bowl. Each piece of fruit in the bowl seems plumper, juicier, and more vibrant than the next. The golden bowl itself is adorned with intricate carvings depicting scenes of past royal feasts.

King Elizur.name: King Elizur
King Elizur.description: King Elizur is a middle-aged man with dark eyes, a strong jawline, and muscular physique under royal attire. His hair is medium-length and styled back, adding to the aura of regality.
King Elizur.persona: I am King Elizur, the ruler of this tower. I carry the worth of my kingdom in gold and jewels, but the true value of royalty is in the people and our shared culture. I spend my days making decisions and protecting my sovereignty.
King Elizur.goal: Maintain peace and prosperity throughout his realm.

Crown of Eternity.name: Crown of Eternity
Crown of Eternity.description: A magnificent crown encrusted with the finest jewels
Crown of Eternity.examine_text: You see an intricately designed crown, with gold intertwining like vines through emeralds and diamonds.

Royal Scroll.name: Royal Scroll
Royal Scroll.description: A scroll filled with the laws and decrees of the kingdom.
Royal Scroll.examine_text: The scroll is worn and weathered, full of intricate calligraphy and seals from past rulers. It tells of the history and commandments of this great kingdom.

Golden Goblet.name: Golden Goblet
Golden Goblet.description: A stunning golden goblet, studded with precious gems.
Golden Goblet.examine_text: This goblet is a work of art. Gold and gems glint as they catch the light, and the cup is cool and heavy in your hands.

Queen Valeska.name: Queen Valeska
Queen Valeska.description: Queen Valeska is a statuesque beauty with thick, raven-black hair that is always adorned with a jewel-studded tiara. Her emerald green eyes are captivating and her demeanor, though calm, radiates authority.
Queen Valeska.persona: As Queen Valeska, it is my duty to rule alongside my husband, King Elizur. I am his confidant, his partner, and the heart of this kingdom. My wisdom and grace guide our actions for the benefit of our people.
Queen Valeska.goal: To ensure the prosperity of their kingdom and the welfare of their citizens.

Jewel-studded Tiara.name: Jewel-studded Tiara
Jewel-studded Tiara.description: An exquisite tiara, encrusted with various precious stones, indicating royalty and wealth.
Jewel-studded Tiara.examine_text: Made with pure gold and studded with various precious gemstones, the tiara sparkles with a regal allure under the palace lighting. The craftsmanship is breathtaking, with each jewel meticulously placed within the golden frame. The tiara is heavy with the weight of the jewels and the authority it represents.

Silken Fan.name: Silken Fan
Silken Fan.description: A luxurious fan made of pure silk, often used by the queen for cooling and show.
Silken Fan.examine_text: The fan, made out of pure, brightly colored silk is soothing to touch. It is embedded with small pieces of polished ivory at the edges. The frame, made of polished teakwood, opens smoothly with a gentle flick of the wrist to reveal an intricately designed pattern made with gold lace on the fan blades.

Pearl Bracelet.name: Pearl Bracelet
Pearl Bracelet.description: A beautiful bracelet strung with perfect white pearls, a symbol of Queen Valeska's grace and elegance.
Pearl Bracelet.examine_text: The pearls in the bracelet, all perfectly matched in size and lustre, glow with an ethereally soft light. Each pearl is strung tightly against the next, revealing meticulous craftsmanship. It's a piece of art and a symbol of timeless elegance. You can't help but notice Queen Valeska's initial 'V' is subtly engraved on a tiny gold pendant on the bracelet.

Astrologist Zephyr.name: Astrologist Zephyr
Astrologist Zephyr.description: Astrologist Zephyr is an elderly man, adorned with toga-like clothes, etched with the symbols of the cosmos. His long grey beard is tangled and wild, and his eyes have a certain twinkle - like that of distant stars.
Astrologist Zephyr.persona: I'm Astrologist Zephyr, equipped with the wisdom of stars, providing counsel for the king and queen. My duties also include ensuring the spiritual purity of this sacred room.
Astrologist Zephyr.goal: To maintain the spiritual purity of the King's Quarters and help navigate the reign through predictions.

Astrologer's Crystal Orb.name: Astrologer's Crystal Orb
Astrologer's Crystal Orb.description: A large, clear crystal ball, filled with swirling nebulous colors.
Astrologer's Crystal Orb.examine_text: Looking into the ball, you see swirling colors and sparks of light, like a miniature galaxy suspended within the crystal.

Cosmic Star Charts.name: Cosmic Star Charts
Cosmic Star Charts.description: A collection of intricate star charts, providing a guide to the constellations.
Cosmic Star Charts.examine_text: Each chart depicts various constellations and celestial bodies, marked with notations in Zephyr's hand. Information on alignments and celestial events is densely packed into the margins.

Royal Decree.name: Royal Decree
Royal Decree.description: An official document signed by the king, sealed with the royal seal.
Royal Decree.examine_text: The decree, written on fine parchment, bears the king's command with his signature and the imprint of the royal seal in red wax.

locations.name: Prison Room
locations.description: Up at the top of the tower, among the gray clouds, is the prison room. The room is round, with a circumference of about 15 feet. The walls are barren and made of stone; only one barred window gives a view out onto the vast landscape. A small bed and a dirty wooden bucket are the only decorations. The desolate princess spends day and night laying on that small bed, wondering where things went wrong
locations.background: Daughter of the strapping king and his oriental wife, the young princess was the most beautiful girl in all the land. She was sweet and kind, and everyone loved her. When she reached adolescence, however, what the clergy called the 'devil's spell' took hold of her. No force in the world could keep her away from young men. Embarrassed, the king had this tower built specifically to hold his daughter.

travel_descriptions.south: Descending from the round prison room, you traverse a cold, winding stone staircase that seems to spiral endlessly into the gloom. The air grows increasingly stuffy and dank, heavy with the smell of moss and mildew. As you reach the bottom, you're greeted by the ominous sight of the formidable jail room.

Old Bed.name: Old Bed
Old Bed.examine_text: An old bed with a tattered mattress and threadbare sheets. The metal frame is rusty, and the whole thing creaks ominously if you so much as touch it. It's a depressing sight, and you wonder how long the princess had to sleep on such a thing.

Wooden Bucket.name: Wooden Bucket
Wooden Bucket.examine_text: The dark, worn wood of the bucket is stained and grimy from years of use. It's nearly falling apart and looks like it hasn't been cleaned in decades. There's an awful smell wafting from it.

Barred Window.name: Barred Window
Barred Window.description: A small window with iron bars.
Barred Window.examine_text: The window is just large enough to allow a glimpse of the outside world. Rusty iron bars are secured on it, through which is a view of the endless landscape. You can feel a brisk wind seeping in through the tiny gaps. The view is a cruel reminder of freedom that's only an arm's reach away.

Princess Adelaide.name: Princess Adelaide
Princess Adelaide.description: Princess Adelaide is a beautiful young woman with long black hair and blue eyes, dressed in a faded silk gown.
Princess Adelaide.persona: I am but a prisoner in my own home. Bound by my father's shame and fear, I long for liberty and the right to love as I choose.
Princess Adelaide.goal: To escape the tower and reclaim her freedom.

locket.name: Adelaide's locket
locket.description: A beautiful gold locket, worn with age.
locket.examine_text: On closer inspection, the locket contains a faded portrait of a handsome young man. You realize this must be a token of a forbidden love from Princess Adelaide's past. The clasp appears to be broken.

old diary.name: Princess Adelaide's diary
old diary.description: A worn-out diary with pages of handwritten notes.
old diary.examine_text: Upon closer examination, it is revealed that the diary belongs to Princess Adelaide.  It contains entries that narrate her longing for freedom and the opportunity to love freely without the constraints imposed by her royal title.

hand mirror.name: Ornate hand mirror
hand mirror.description: A beautiful hand mirror with an ornate gilded frame.
hand mirror.examine_text: The mirror reflects an image tinted with the years of loneliness and longing. Along the edges, you can make out the hand-painted embellishments bright with shades of gold.

Shadowy Figure.name: Shadowy Figure
Shadowy Figure.description: An ominous figure cloaked in darkness, with only their intense eyes visible underneath the hood.
Shadowy Figure.persona: I am but a guardian of secrets, keeper of the king's dark deeds.
Shadowy Figure.goal: To keep the princess in the tower at the king's command.

Iron Key.name: Iron Key
Iron Key.examine_text: The key is heavy and solid, despite its rusty exterior. It looks old and used. It's definitely not decorative, but rather the key to something important.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.examine_text: The dagger is around one foot long, with a sharp pointy edge. The handle is wrapped in aged black leather and is worn from use. There's a chilling aura surrounding it, whispering of countless secrets and deeds.

Little Mouse.name: Little Mouse
Little Mouse.description: A small gray mouse with sparkling eyes, living off crumbs and scraps.
Little Mouse.persona: As a wee creature, I know every nook and cranny of this grim place.
Little Mouse.goal: To survive another day in the harsh conditions of the tower.

grains.name: grains
grains.description: A small pile of grains scattered on the floor.
grains.examine_text: Looking closer, you notice the grains are a mix of wheat and barley, probably remnants from the meal of the prisoners here.

straw.name: straw
straw.description: A clump of straw from the prison bedding.
straw.examine_text: As you examine the straw, you notice that it's old and brittle, but dry. It could serve as excellent tinder for a fire, should you need it.

locations.name: Alchemists Bedroom
locations.description: This room holds a small bed, a table and several work benches. More flasks, beakers, candles, alembics, decanters, herbs, kettles, and the like may be found. Several books of forbidden lore sit upon the table. A circle, nine feet across and adorned with words of power is etched into the floor.
locations.background: It is here that the Alchemist performs his most dangerous and forbidden experiments. If forced to accept a visitor, the interloper will only be shown what is in the laboratory above and never allowed to see what goes on at the end of the hidden stairway. Inside a flask, slowly growing is a tiny purple stone, which the Alchemist hopes will enable the creation of a powder that will allow him to disguise himself as anyone he wishes.

travel_descriptions.west: Ascending the hidden stairway leads you to the Alchemist's Lab, a mysterious chamber rife with the peculiar and the arcane. As you traverse the path, the potent aroma of strange brews and burning herbs becomes incredibly potent, and the faint sputtering of the lab's fireplaces echo eerily in the confines of the stairwell.

copper beaker.name: copper beaker
copper beaker.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the beaker contains some kind of strangely colored liquid. It's a tad heavy and feels cold to the touch.

alembic.name: alembic
alembic.examine_text: This alembic appears to be made of glass and copper. It's used in alchemical processes, possibly for the distillation of magical potions.

forbidden book.name: forbidden book
forbidden book.description: A dusty old tome bound in dark leather
forbidden book.examine_text: The book's pages are filled with ancient runes and illicit knowledge. It's clear that whoever reads this will learn secrets they may not be prepared for.

purple stone.name: purple stone
purple stone.examine_text: The small purple stone pulsates with a strange energy. It floats aimlessly inside a glass flask, an element of the Alchemist's greatest experiment.

Olivier the Alchemist.name: Olivier the Alchemist
Olivier the Alchemist.description: Olivier is a stooped, gray-haired man with a long, sparse beard, he's covered in soot and always seen in his tattered alchemist robes, donned with various vials and components.
Olivier the Alchemist.persona: I am Olivier, a seeker of forbidden knowledge. I dive deep into the sciences, uncovering the hidden truths of existence itself.
Olivier the Alchemist.goal: Create a transformational powder that allows the user to take the form of any person

Alchemy Books.name: Alchemy Books
Alchemy Books.description: Piles of old, dusty books containing vast knowledge about Alchemy.
Alchemy Books.examine_text: The books are filled with mystical symbols, complex formulas, and ancient texts. Numerous bookmarks peek out from within the pages indicating important references. Their musty smell gives away their age.

Alembic.name: Alembic
Alembic.description: An equipment used by alchemists for distillation.
Alembic.examine_text: The Alembic, made of an opaque glass, is intricately designed with a coiling snake forming the spout. It appears fragile but with a sheen that suggests it's highly resistant to heat.

Mysterious Purple Stone.name: Mysterious Purple Stone
Mysterious Purple Stone.description: A slowly growing tiny purple stone inside a flask.
Mysterious Purple Stone.examine_text: The tiny stone exudes a faint glow of purple light, pulsating in a rhythm that is almost hypnotic. The aura surrounding it is thrilling, filled with a promise of unknown mystic powers.

Raven the Talking Cat.name: Raven the Talking Cat
Raven the Talking Cat.description: Raven is a sleek, black cat with striking green eyes. He possesses an unsettling ability to speak in human tongue and seems to carry an air of wisdom in his attitude.
Raven the Talking Cat.persona: I, Raven, am not your ordinary cat. I am a walking repository of knowledge and tales, always with my ears pricked, observing the world and its secrets.
Raven the Talking Cat.goal: To stay forever knowledgeable by observing the Alchemist's experiments and endeavours

Tattered Charm.name: Tattered Charm
Tattered Charm.description: An old charm, frayed and worn.
Tattered Charm.examine_text: This charm, although tattered and old, hums with an energy that suggests it was made by powerful hands. Upon further examination, you notice it is marked with faint, arcane symbols.

Dried Fish.name: Dried Fish
Dried Fish.description: A dried fish. Perfect snack for a cat.
Dried Fish.examine_text: This fish, meticulously dried and preserved, gives off an alluring aroma. Perfectly portable, it's a great snack for a travelling translator cat.

Phillius the Ghost.name: Phillius the Ghost
Phillius the Ghost.description: Phillius is an ethereal, faintly glowing apparition, seemingly eternally trapped within the confines of the tower. He's dressed in an old-fashioned attire, suggesting he might have been an alchemist in his life.
Phillius the Ghost.persona: I'm Phillius, bound to this physical realm by my unfinished business. I can't rest until I pass on the secrets I've discovered in my living days.
Phillius the Ghost.goal: To pass on his old alchemy secrets to Olivier

Ancient parchment.name: Ancient parchment
Ancient parchment.description: An old parchment displaying faint etchings in an unknown language.
Ancient parchment.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the parchment appears to be made from a material not quite paper. The etchings show images of various alchemical symbols and celestial bodies intertwined with lines of text written in an archaic language. The parchment exudes an air of ancient wisdom and well-kept secrets.

Invisible quill.name: Invisible quill
Invisible quill.description: A concealed quill that Phillius uses to write.
Invisible quill.examine_text: Exposed only to those attuned to the spectral plane, the quill appears as a faint shimmer in the air. Despite its spectral nature, it leaves behind tangible ink, allowing Phillius to communicate with the physical world. It carries an energy, vibrating as if it is eager to share the secrets it holds.

locations.name: Debtor'S Prison
locations.description: A dank and dark prison located in the tower of the castle. There is a single bench made of stone and a bucket for eliminating waste. There are no windows and the prisoners never see the light of day.
locations.background: The debtor's prison is where the King locks people away for not paying their debts. They stay in the tower until someone can repay them. If no one does, then they stay there till they die.

travel_descriptions.north: Moving north from the Debtor's Prison leads you to a more dreadful place - the Tower Dungeon. The journey is chilling, as you ascend the cold, stone spiral staircase, echoing with the wails and sobs of incarcerated debtors. A guard leads the way, his torch flickering on the damp walls. With each step, the air becomes increasingly dank, and the thin slivers of light from the torch reveal more and more dreadful scenes. The ruthless atmosphere swallows any hope the tower's inhabitants might have clung onto.

Stone bench.name: Stone bench
Stone bench.description: A bench carved out of stone, serving as the only seat in the prison.
Stone bench.examine_text: The bench is cold and deformed because of the many prisoners who have sat on it. It is hard, uncomfortable, and worn out.

Old bucket.name: Old bucket
Old bucket.description: An old bucket, used by the prisoners for eliminating waste.
Old bucket.examine_text: The bucket is dirty and it smells terrible. It's made of old, rusty iron and shows signs of long-time use.

Prisoner's chains.name: Prisoner's chains
Prisoner's chains.description: Heavy iron chains, used to limit the prisoner's movements.
Prisoner's chains.examine_text: These chains are solid and heavy, the rust on them revealing their age. They have a keyhole for opening but the key is nowhere to be found.

Benny the Broke.name: Benny the Broke
Benny the Broke.description: He is a scrawny man, with unkempt hair and a despair in his eyes. His clothes are ragged, reflecting his broke status.
Benny the Broke.persona: I used to be a merchant, but business went south and now I'm stuck here. If only I could repay my debts...
Benny the Broke.goal: He is hoping to somehow pay his debts and live a free life again.

Chamber Pot.name: Chamber Pot
Chamber Pot.description: A grimy bucket used as a toilet.
Chamber Pot.examine_text: The chamber pot is a rusty old bucket, uncleaned for what seems like an eternity. Its stench is unbearable and the sight is sickening.

Rat Bones.name: Rat Bones
Rat Bones.description: The gnawed remains of a rat. Poor creature must have been desperate for food.
Rat Bones.examine_text: The rat bones are small, brittle and picked clean. The creature had clearly been eaten out of desperation rather than choice, teeth marks embedded into the bones.

Guard Locke.name: Guard Locke
Guard Locke.description: He is a tall, burly man with a stern face. He wears a guard’s uniform and a sword hangs at his side.
Guard Locke.persona: I'm here to make sure these fools don’t escape. I've no sympathy for those who cannot pay their dues.
Guard Locke.goal: Maintaining order and discipline in the prison and preventing escapes.

Leather Armour.name: Leather Armour
Leather Armour.description: A sturdy set of leather armour, worn and scratched from years of trusty service.
Leather Armour.examine_text: The leather armour is made of high-quality materials. Though it shows signs of wear and tear, it's been well-maintained. You can see the guard's crest emblazoned on the chest.

Short Sword.name: Short Sword
Short Sword.description: A short, sharp blade with a well-used handle.
Short Sword.examine_text: The sword shines with a deadly gleam despite its disdained state. One edge is slightly notched, hinting at the battles it's seen. The handle is leather-wrapped, darkened by the sweat of countless hours of handling.

Keys to the Cells.name: Keys to the Cells
Keys to the Cells.description: A heavy iron keyring filled with a multitude of keys.
Keys to the Cells.examine_text: The heavy iron keyring is crammed with an impressive number of keys, each marked with a series of worn etchings - no doubt the numbers of the various cells. They clank together with a satisfyingly authoritative noise.

Lady Bella.name: Lady Bella
Lady Bella.description: A richly dressed, distressful lady with reddened eyes as if she's been crying. She appears out of place in such a grim location.
Lady Bella.persona: I've come to pay off the debt my foolish brother incurred. This place....it's horrible.
Lady Bella.goal: Rescue her brother from the debtor's prison by paying his dues.

Purse of Gold.name: Purse of Gold
Purse of Gold.description: A small leather purse lined with silk and filled with gold coins
Purse of Gold.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the purse is very old, with weathered leather that is surprisingly still strong and sturdy. The silk lining glistens in a faint light. Gold coins within sparkle with pure wealth, enough to pay off even the largest of debts.

Decorative Handkerchief.name: Decorative Handkerchief
Decorative Handkerchief.description: An ornate handkerchief, embroidered with the initials 'LB'
Decorative Handkerchief.examine_text: The handkerchief is made from fine silk, delicate to touch. Detailed embroidery of 'LB', presumably standing for Lady Bella, is weaved in fine gold thread on one corner. It's clear this object is more than just a tool for personal hygiene, it's a symbol of high status and wealth.
